story:
Each time you send a notice out to your network your shipping

            cost will be reduced. All you need to do is: 

        1. Post our campaign to your network on the icons on the left side of the page.   

        2. Pledge for a Pedicure Pedestal on the right side of the page, then share the                 Indiegogo Campaign with your friends and family, 

        3.Send your posts to us at info@PedicurePedestal.com and be rewarded with                 shipping credits for FREE SHIPPING!  Every post = $1 off !

 

What You Get

FREE SHIPPING: as easy as the clicking the mouse.

COLORS: In our research the 4 most popular colors chosen were black, pink, purple and red, so we'll work with the manufacturer to come up with options using these colors.  

BEST POSSIBLE PRICE: If we have a huge demand for the Pedestal our costs can go down because of volume discounts in production and shipping. This savings will be passed along to you for helping us make this whole program work. 

NO RISK: This is going to be an All or Nothing Campaign. I will do everything I possibly can to make this work, but I don't want anyone to feel that I have taken advantage of them. The fulfillment of Material Perks (listed on the right side of the screen) will only be started at the point where our goal is reached and we are able start manufacture. Otherwise all funds will be returned.


In the mean time look forward to some PERKS and being able to comfortably reach your toes.


Our FREE Perk, Game Apps ...

"Pure Web Fun" are games for your enjoyment. Download 
to your cell phone anytime.

http://www.pedicurepedestal.com/get-free-gifts/


Our $10 Perk, a Personalized Video saying thank you...

You will have your name and, if you like, your photo OR your company name and logo posted in a "Thank You Video" on all Pedicure Pedestal Social Media venues, plus a copy sent to you to post as you please.



Our $25 Perk, the 

      Make the Classic Black Pami Pocket cell phone purse your go-to accessory. Stay hands-free, connected and looking great at a nightclub, party, concert, on a date, even traveling! 

      




See Models of Pami Pocket...
 Pami Pocket (@pamipocket) • Instagram photos and videos


Our $60 Perk, Your own 

Plus the opportunity to direct where donations are made to charity.

One more Perk...Lobster/ Crab Dive, you choose

In addition to Perks 1, 2 and 3 you will have Mark accompany you or the scuba diver in your life for a day of diving for your choice of lobster or stone crab and show how to catch them.




Your Impact

Your contributions can help...

- Send a Pedicure Pedestal to your front door to make doing your own pedicure more comfortable and less messy.

- Help raise funds for charitable donations.       

- Make it possible for someone with limited flexibility to keep their independence  with little things like putting on their shoes.

- Give those with health situations that require extreme care for their feet a way to    do it comfortably for themselves.    


Other Ways You Can Help

Everyone  has at least one lady in their life: a Mother, Sister, Wife, Daughter, Girlfriend or Business associate who's life would be made easier with a Pedicure Pedestal. It would be a HUGE help to us if you tell them about the Pedicure Pedestal and send them to Indiegogo ( http://igg.me/at/PedicurePedestal ) to check it out. 

Another way you can really help us is to use the "Share" boxes on the left side of the page to spread the word to your social media friends.  


What We Need

We need to raise $65,000 to go into production for the Pedicure Pedestal with the tooling quotes we have so far (in the US and offshore).

$40,000 will go for tooling and shipping. Turn around time...up to 90 days.

$25,000 will go for a production run. Turn around time...averages 30 days.

If we have a huge demand for the Pedestal our costs can go down because of volume discounts in production and shipping. This savings will be passed along to you for helping us make this whole program work.



Who We Are

  Jeanette Peterson, my wife, is a retired hair dresser with a strong sense of fashion. I'm Mark Peterson, I was a zookeeper who was prototyping for inventors and myself before I retired from zookeeping. We started pursuing development of the Pedicure Pedestal when she and I were talking about the inventing process and she said she'd like us to invent something to make polishing her toes easier.  

Jeanette had been using the Pedicure Pedestal for a couple months and we knew there are a lot of people who have the same issues that the Pedicure Pedestal had resolved for her, so we decided to try and bring it to market. 

Most people don't know the great number of obstacles and pitfalls an individual has to overcome to bring a new product to market. Your contributions will help make the Pedicure Pedestal a success in spite of the pitfalls. With your help we'll be able to pay for the manufacture of the molds and a small production run, proving the concept and bringing the Pedicure Pedestal and comfortable pedicures to you. 

Challenges

It's been my experience and understanding that most of the companies that advertise that they help individual inventors bring their ideas to market...actually don't help! 

It takes persistence to weed out the hustlers from people or companies who are honest and really do what you're paying them to do. A group has come together over the last seven years of pursuing the idea of bringing new products to market. A group that I can count on to do what they say they're going to do. Some of them are listed here on the Team Page.

The biggest challenge facing us right now is to find the vendors that will produce the best possible product at the lowest possible cost. We have quotes from several manufacturers, both on and off shore and are looking into other possibilities.

For those of you wondering if I can juggle all this, I retired from zookeeping after 36 years at Busch Gardens, Tampa, Florida. The last 4 years I was the Stable Manager for the Budweiser Clydesdale Hamlet with a half million dollar annual budget. For each of the 4 years the Hamlet came in well under budget while still maintaining Anheuser-Busch's high standards.

Another way you can really help us is to use the "Share" boxes on the left side of the page to spread the word to your social media friends.  

                                          Thank You for all your help!

story:
FREE SHIPPING TO ALL OVER THE WORLD 

Designed for Performance and Freedom with an unapologetic commitment to Excellence. 

Ever feel frustrated by switching clothes for water sports? Ever dreamed of owning activewear that can last for years? Evanana durable do-it-all activewear helps you to feel free and achieve excellence in a morning run, a sweaty session at the gym and a quick swim in the ocean.

                              

FEATURES:

1. Made with high-techno sustainable fabrics from ECONYL® yarn - Allows seamless transition between different activities like gym, running and water sports. Exceptionally durability and value for money, with mother earth in mind. 

       

2. Wide double-layer elastic waistband - Ensures a flattering look and provides the best support and coverage for high-intensity workouts. 

         

3. Hidden waistband - Keeps your leggings/shorts firmly in place. Imagine that you will never have to stop again to adjust your curl-up leggings.     

                                

4. Two deep side pockets - Fits virtually for every phone. Listen to your favourite music and enjoy a hands-free experience while running and hiking! 

          

5. Hidden back pocket - Want to get a coffee after running? We got it covered! The double-layered back pocket is designed specifically for your bank cards and key chains. Feel comfortable and secured with those leggings on every occasion. 

                             

6. Mesh panel - Bestie for the do-it-all women. Not only ensures a flattering and slimming look on your legs but also increases the breathability if you like to SWEAT, A LOT. 

           

                              

Features: 

1. Same as our leggings. They are made with high-techno sustainable fabrics from ECONYL® yarn - Allows seamless transition between different activities like gym, running and water sports. Exceptionally durability and value for money, with mother earth in mind. 

2. Adjustable bands - Tired of buying sports bras that are not fit perfectly? Want to jump to work right after the gym? We added adjustable bands with two rows of clips so that you can adjust them easily on different occasions.            

                             

 3. Mesh panel at back - Like our leggings. For increased breathability without making aesthetic compromises.

         

                                 

4. Premium teardrop bra inserts - Made from natural materials. Bring cleavage, shape, contour and support to your favourite workouts. They are ultra-soft, breathable, lightweight and quick dry. 

   

 

Our team spent 5 months sourcing the right sustainable material for Evanana activewear, and found that ECONYL® regenerated yarn was the best. This yarn is regenerated from fishnets and other nylon discarded with no new resources. 

Our fabrics can resist chlorine and UV rays (UPF 50+), and is not affected by sun creams and oils. It helps to protect your skin under the sun and put you at ease for outdoor activities. 

This breathable fabric features two-way stretch. It can help you to achieve high performance at the gym by boasting significant muscular compression, aimed at decreasing the production of lactic acid during exercise to enhance recovery and boost energy.

At Evanana, we believe in inclusivity, and that every woman should feel beautiful anytime, anywhere. 

This is why we design leggings with a high waistband, rear-lifting cut and mesh panel, giving you a slender look that is flattering in all the right places. We also design our sports bras based on minimalist concepts, with a small cut at the front and mesh panel at the back. They make you look cute and feel secured.

                               

In our initial collection, we decided to go extra miles and offer sizes from XS to XXXL, and we will include more sizes once we have the capacity to produce larger quantities with your valuable support. 

     

 

 

       FREE SHIPPING TO ALL OVER THE WORLD

 

FREE GIFTS:

Free Gift: 1-pack no-show leggings underwear (made from bamboo) when you order  1 Hot Topic set +1 Have-it-all set  

Free Gift: 2*1-pack no-show leggings underwear (made from bamboo) when you order 2X Hot Topic Set+2X Have-It-All-Set. 

ADD-ONS:  

No-show sustainable bamboo sports underwear 

No panty line bamboo intimates - make you feel safe and secured in your workout session

Sustainable bamboo fabrics - Anti- bacteria. Super soft and breathable. Care for the planet and care for your skin.

Seamless and minimal designs that allow you to move freely and comfortably.

 

 After AU$ 35K, we will have Sangria Red Unlocked and after

 AU$ 51K, we will have Fresh Mint and Light Grey Unlocked

We knew that only the best would do, so we spent months looking for our manufacture partners. After searching high and low, we carefully selected only the best. All of our manufacturing facilities are fair-wage workplaces that take pride in providing the highest quality of workmanship available. 

We also expect each of our manufacturing partners to uphold the highest quality standards through continuous QC checks and best practices. We want to be trend setters when it comes to quality and technology. That’s why we routinely work with each of our facilities to update or upgrade machinery and processes to make sure you get the quality and performance you need from our gear. We also use 100% biodegradable packaging. 

We aim to work towards a world in which people and nature flourish together. We support Conservation Volunteers Australia by donating $1 of every Evanana piece we sell. Conservation Volunteers Australia (CVA) is a national organisation working with communities to rebalance nature for a stronger, more resilient future.

 

The development process has been a success. We have had four rounds of comprehensive testing and are pleased with the final prototypes of our multi-functional activewear.

                      

Now is the time that we need your help to reach the minimum order quantity to begin production and bring our dream of making multi-functional activewear for do-it-all women into a reality! 

Great gift for you or your girl friends - Stay active and adventurous with multi-functional activewear.  Leave a pledge today and start to enjoy your do-it-all life! 

 

Risks and challenges

The world wide covid 19 situation may have an impact on our orders and shipment. However, all of our factory workers have come back from holidays, and will work on the project as soon as our project gets funded successfully. Our delivery business partner will provide fast and secured solutions to make sure your Evanana arrives within the estimated time frames. Once our project gets successfully funded on Kickstarter, we will send out a survey enquiring about all of our backers' measurements and size needed. We will also send emails to notify you when we have all of our products ready, when we dispatch your orders and your tracking numbers. You are very welcome to send us an email anytime or make an enquiry on our campaign page directly if you have any questions in regards to orders details, shipping times and so on. Our staff members will work on your request as soon as possible.

 

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design

All of our activewears have a minimalist, stylish and functional design. The sports bras are adjustable for different intensity level of trainings and our activewear sets are suitable for all kinds of sports. The ultrachlorine resistant and UV protection features also make it perfect for outdoor trainings and water activities. In addition, our activewears are made by ECONYL® regenerated nylon, featuring high quality, long-lasting and sustainable fabrics.

Reusability and recyclability

Our activewears are all using sustainable fabrics, which are made by ECONYL® regenerated nylon yarn derived from pre and post industrial waste such as discarded fishing nets, carpet fluff (the top part of Nylon carpets which have got to the end of their useful life), tulle etc. All such materials, once they have reached the end of their useful life, instead of being disposed of in the landfill, are recovered and regenerated by means of a complex chemical-physical process. The fabric has the same features as virgin nylon in terms of performance and quality, but with the plus of not having been produced with the use of non renewable fossil raw materials. We will also be using 100% degradable packagings for our activewears to minimise our waste as much as possible.

Sustainable materials

We will be using a sustainable techno-fabric, made of a ECONYL® regenerated Nylon, which boasts excellent recovery power and always the perfect muscular compression aimed at decreasing the production of lactic acid, thus boosting a faster recovery of energy. Soft and pleasant on the skin, compact and breathable, it is also highly UV protective ( UPF 50+).

Environmentally friendly factories

Our partnered fabrics suppliers have qualifications to show their commitment to the environment such as HIGG Facility environmental module, Certificate ISO 14001:2015 and so on. Both our fabric suppliers and manufacturers strictly follow global recycled standards and policies to contribute to the environment and ensure a safe and ethical working environment.

Sustainable Distribution

Our product packaging will all use environmental-friendly solutions such as 100% biodegradable bags. We are aiming to compensate for the CO2 emissions caused by the shipment of our products and leave the environmental footprint as low as possible.

story:
Chantel Martinez, nineteen (19) years old, born on September 18 in the year 1993 in the city of New York where he still resides to Dominican parents. Chantel has always had a great passion and interest in education and modeling. Graduated with honors from high school Health Careers & Sciences in Washington Heights, is currently studying Criminal Justice at John Jay College.

At eleven, his mother was diagnosed with breast cancer, something that was hard to take but that helped to mature and see life from another point of view, "It was very hard not only for me but for my entire family, thank God my mom is healthy, I learned that we must seize every minute every second we have on this earth with the people we love. I strongly encourage everyone always medical checkups, my mother was saved because he detected early, "said Ms. Martinez. A beautiful brunette is 5'9 "tall likes to play football, soccer, baseball, study math and history.

During her reign as Miss Dominican Republic U.S. ® 2012 Foundation work with the DREAM Project, a foundation dedicated to providing education and development programs for children in rural areas of Puerto Plata, Dominican Republic.

Chantel is also preparing to represent the Dominican community fromthe  United States in the next Miss Dominican Republic Universe 2013 this upcoming spring.

 

_______________________________________________________________________

 

Hey Guys...it's my time to chase The Miss Universe Crown. But first I'm one step away as I have to go to my native land The Dominican Republic an compete for the the title. The truth is that I can't do it without the help of all my friends, family, and fans. So...I need you! If you are willing to help me raise at least $5 dollars per Facebook fan...I can reach my goal! 

I really appreciate all your support! Thanks!

xoxoxo

~ Chantel

story:
Hey friends - we're Jaunt!

Since 2013, we've specialized in making the most sleek and organized fanny packs for keeping the essentials secure and out of mind on your journeys. We believe worrying about your belongings can often be a distraction and the goal behind Jaunt packs is to help focus less on our stuff and hopefully more on fully enjoying the moments at-hand.

 

 

Over the past year, we've received an inflow of requests to create a bigger version of the Jaunt pack. We realized there's a number of items that are really useful for longer journeys (some examples below) that weren't fitting as comfortably into our core, minimalist Jaunt pack.

 

 

So we've been working on perfecting a larger version and are stoked to introduce the new Jaunt pack XL with this campaign.

 

 

The new XL is about 15% bigger than the original Jaunt pack.

 

 

The interior includes a new elegant lining and a new magnetic button interior pocket. 

 

New with the XL: 100% Poly with 2D embossed lining

 

 

The design of the XL also incorporates the core features of the original, ultra-organized Jaunt pack, including: 

  • 3 built-in cardholders made-up of highly memorable elastic
  • Interior elastic loop for holding glasses
  • Additional interior zipper pocket
  • Back phone pocket placed closest to body so can feel phone vibrate (pocket lined with mesh)
  • Side seam pocket with hook-and-loop secured closure (pocket lined with mesh) 
  • Poly-based lightweight and durable exterior fabric 
  • Black webbing strap with adjustable slide bar (strap comfortably fits waist sizes 24" - 38", strap extensions available for additional purchase)
  • Snap buckle closure

The XL comfortably holds more while maintaining the Jaunt pack's sleek shape.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

At this point, we have a finalized prototype that we love (pictured above) but to move forward into production, there's certain minimums we need to reach to be able to sell the XL at an affordable price. As such, we're looking for your help to bring the XL into production and are excited to offer 4 different styles with this campaign in exchange for your support! 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Practical & Versatile

 

 

Rock the XL by the hip or cross-body.

 

 

 

No matter the journey, the Jaunt pack XL can help secure your stuff and unburden your mind, whether:

 

 

Fly through airport security.

 

A Big Thanks!

 

We really appreciate you checking out the project and hope you'll help bring it to life. As a small team that's incredibly passionate about our product, we strive to make the most functional, highest quality packs at the best possible price.

We're living in a golden era of technology but our generation is so connected online that we're putting ourselves at risk of becoming disconnected offline. Technology brings so many positives but it can be important to find your balance with it; to make time to step away, get outside, and enjoy experiences to the fullest, distraction-free. From the beginning, our goal with Jaunt has been to create packs that help maximize those moments.

Hope to have your support with our newest XL version!

story:
"If time has proven anything, it’s that vision moves your world forward."
The Heirloom is the founders’ sole intent of crafting an unpretentious mechanical watch for generations to come. 

We based our design on four philosophies that every TRAVISLEON watch embraces

Crafted for Legacy
Detailed with Purpose
Horological Artistry
Comfort and Style

"The Heirloom" is inspired by the 1930s Calatrava-styled watches. “Calatrava” refers to a classic style of watch introduced in the 1930s by Patek. The style is inspired by the Bauhaus principles that based on a minimalist approach, which feature clean lines with bold, simple coloration.

We aimed to create a fine classic watch that is modern luxury, but also fitting to be passed on to the next generation. We consider watches as something more than a means of telling the time - it holds valuable memories too. We believe that our attitude towards time today determines our tomorrow.

Crafted for Legacy
Each TRAVISLEON watch earns its keep as a heritage model by its unwavering tribute to artisan craftsmanship. Masterfully constructed with a discerning selection of the finest materials, it's built to withstand not just a lifetime, but generations after yourself.


Detailed with Purpose
Elegant architecture meets a discerning selection of the finest materials in each TRAVISLEON watch. With TRAVISLEON, you’re putting on an ornate statement in intricacy every time.


Horological Artistry
Horolophiles, be assured. Each TRAVISLEON watch has been endowed with a masterfully engraved & decorated mechanical movement, regulated individually so astute precision is ensured.


Comfort Meets Style
Classic styling meets elegant proportions, resulting in a frame that sits comfortably on the wrist. Look to TRAVISLEON’s signature artisan leather straps that fit intimately for the debonair touch.


The choice for the use of the Miyota 9015 Automatic movement for the Heirloom series was a natural one. Reliable, robust and practical engine to drive this classic watch, fit to be passed on to future generations to come

  • Customized Japanese Miyota 9015 
  • 24 Jewels
  • 42 Hours Power Reserve
  • 28,800 bph (4Hz) Operating Frequency
  • Automatic or Handwinding
  • Hacking Seconds
  • Balance staff shock absorber
  • Customized rotor with Rose Gold PVD-IP and “TRAVISLEON” logo Engraving

  • Case: 40mm case in 316L Steel / 316L Steel with Rose Gold PVD-IP
  • Lug width: 20mm
  • Lug to Lug: 46mm
  • Case Thickness: 10mm
  • Dial: Enamel-coated White or Black Velvet Dial  
  • Crystal: 2.0mm Double Dome Sapphire Front-glass
  • Caseback: 6-screws Exhibition caseback
  • Strap: 20mm Genuine croc-grain leather with engraved tang buckle
  • Water resistance: 3ATM / 30 Meters
  • Features: Date window at 6 o’clock position, Serialized limited edition with Founder’s Edition engraving


We are committed to deliver the best quality product to our wearers. Every TRAVISLEON  Watch comes a limited warranty of flaws in workmanship and materials for one (1) years after original purchase.



Today, the TRAVISLEON brand bears testament to the founders’ vision of smart luxury - of elegant style and mechanical movement in an affordable timepiece.

Impeccable on the gentleman and elegantly befitting of a lady - every TRAVISLEON timepiece speaks volume about its wearers, who are an advocate of world-class values - driven by passion, and powered by ideals. Ambitious with foresight, and inspired by conscience and hard work.

Each refined TRAVISLEON timepiece reflects the individual’s appreciation of luxury, backed by practical sensibilities.

Getting people to know our product has been the primary challenge. Besides brand awareness, creating and delivering a new product has always been a very complicated process. 

As with most products, manufacturing is often subjected to delays and setbacks. We are able to minimize such issues by engaging top manufacturers trusted by major international brands. A strong working relationship has been built with months of communication with the manufacturer. 

Transparency will be key for the confidence from our backers. We will notify all backers of our progress and we can be easily contacted via Indiegogo or support@travisleon.com


We love to share our passion for mechanical watches with editors, stylist, and television. For press kit, CLICK HERE or contact travis@travisleon.com, watch available for borrow upon request.


We love sharing our travel experience with our wearers, hashtag #travisleonwatchco and Follow us on Instagram @travisleonwatchco

story:
What is XIX BackPack?


The X shaped buckle attached to the bag allows the straps to be converted into an X shape as well allowing for equal weight distribution between the shoulders and the hips relieving overall stress and fatigue from extended period of carrying.

Differences between traditional backpacks & XIX 

Existing backpacks are designed to have two straps on each side and this places 100% of the weight on your back and shoulders.

XIX backpack uses the X buckle and the side straps to create and X-shape with the straps, transferring weight distribution to be 60% on your back and 40% to your front relieving your back and lower back from unnecessary fatigue. This design proves helpful for those that have back issues and especially helpful for children to carry around a lot of weight on their back due to school or other activities. 


When you connect the X buckle and tighten the the straps at the bottom, more than 40% of the weight will be distributed to the front of your body and not your back.

1. Body Correction

Carrying heavy bags during growth can cause spine issues in younger children. 

<By: Nicole Phillips, Intern APU>

Especially for children that carry more than 3.5 kg on average putting all the pressure on their back moving their center of gravity requiring them to lean forward in order to compensate. This can cause negative effects on their spines. 
From our previous statement, XIX Backpacks uses its X buckle to create an X shape with the straps distribution weight from 100% to the back to 60/40 back front. 

2. Fatigue Relief

In today's day and age, people must carry around multiple items to adapt to today's highly developed society. Bags are used to carry laptops, tablets, smartphones, etc. and these can be carried all at the same time.

When walking around while carrying your bag, there is one thing in common you will find with others like yourself.

Even if each person has their own car, on average each person will carry around their own bag for about an hour a day experiencing discomfort in their shoulder, waist, or back. Most people repeat this behavior on a daily basis.

XIX Backpack and its X buckle allows you to secure your bag tightly to your body for when doing other activities like hiking, bike riding, or other activities where having a secure bag helps reduce energy consumption and weight distribution.

Details


  • To accommodate for people that carry around the most common items like laptops, tablets, smartphones, etc. there are specialized and separate compartments for each so you know exactly where each of your devices is located for easy retrieval. Also, the side pockets have a space for an external battery to charge your devices while never exposing the battery or any cables to the outside. There's a hole on that leads into the main compartment of the bag allowing instant access for charging. 
  • The bag is constructed of extremely durable 100% nylon and on the inside and outside. And with its waterproof coating, the bag will stay dry in rain or now and will not damage the bag. 


Extra Bettery Pack
●Dual Charge Port Samsung SDI Cell powered external battery at 15,000mAh

▶Portable External Battery:
 *Smartphone, Tablets
 *Digital Camera, MP3 players, etc

▶Default Specifications:
 *Internal Contents: Lithium Ion (Manufactured: Samsung SDI)
 *Capacity:  3.7V 15,060mAh (Inside 3.78V 14,750 mAh)
 *Input: DC 5V, 1A ~ 3.5A (Micro USB)
 *Output: DC 5V, 2A Dual (USB x 2)
  (Simultaneous port usage equals 2.5A each)

▶Functions:
 *Dual Charging: 2 USB ports for simultaneous charging
 *LED Indicator: Battery status indicator
  ㆍ1 Light: 0 ~ 25 % Remaining
  ㆍ2 Lights: 26 ~ 50 % Remaining
  ㆍ3 Lights Remaining: 51 ~ 75 % Remaining
  ㆍ4 Lights Remaining: 76 ~ 100 % Remaining
 *Built-in flashlight

▶Safety:
 *Prevent Overcharging
 *No load discharge

▶Contents:
 *Batter pack, charging cable
 *Charging cable: micro USB, mini USB

Perks


Supporters

story:
The Smart Strap

Modillian smart strap connects to most wristwatches, and pairs with your Android phone over Bluetooth®. The smart strap then provides discrete vibrating alerts on incoming calls, text messages, and other important events. This way, you can attend meetings and events where you cannot access your smartphone, and get those notifications - while wearing your favorite old watch, without having to replace it with a bulky "smart-watch". 

The smart strap is the brainchild of Eran Reuveni, an industrial engineer and lover of both electronic gadgets and classic analog watches. Looking to enjoy the benefits of smart-watch notifications, while not having to depart from his favorite wristwatch, Eran joined electronics engineer Gilad Kirshenboim and started developing the Modillian smart strap.

We've completed the product design and specification, and we feel it's a winner! it is really smart, focused, and fits the purpose. We want the world to enjoy it. This is where you can help.

By reaching our funding goal, we'll be able to manufacture and deliver the smart strap to our backers, and later - to consumers. Check out the many perks we're offering to show our appreciation and provide greater value for all who contribute to our campaign.


What Makes Modillian's Smart Strap So Smart?

Think of all those times when you had to put your phone away, in business meetings or personal events. Think how much more relaxed you would be knowing that you're not missing out on any important call or message. Yes, a smart watch provides such notifications, but - wouldn't you prefer wearing your lovely old watch?

This is where our solution really shines! Because:

  • It's not a bulky "mini-phone on your wrist": it just provides the alerts you need.
  • It is discrete and low-profile. Most people won't even notice you are wearing it. Which is great when you want to show the person you're with you are giving them your undivided attention.
  • It consumes very little energy. Even if you use it all day every day, you wouldn't have to charge it more than once a week.
  • It is really simple to use.

Modillian's unique product design is patent pending.

About The Perks We're Offering

All perks offered include delivery of a finished, fully functional, packaged, high-quality product with 12 months guarantee. Only exceptions are the basic $10 "support" option, and the Beta Tester option (which actually includes both an early model and the finished product).

We are not selling prototypes or pre-production samples. We respect our supporters and early adopters, and will not compromise on the quality of products provided.

Prices include international shipping, so no additional funds will be required: the price you're seeing now is all-inclusive.

Some perks include delivery of additional items or quantities of more than one smart strap. Details are provided in perk description where relevant.

Please note the different versions offered. Modillian smart-straps differ in band type, width and color. Some perks allow you to choose your preferred version: where relevant, available choices are mentioned in perk description, and you will be emailed prior to delivery to ask about your preferred version.

Production Timeline

FAQ

FUNCTIONALITY

Q: Can I configure the smart strap to notify only on certain types of events, or on calls from specific numbers?

Absolutely, any type of notification can be turned on or off individually. Plus, you can specify which caller, SMS sender, or Email sender, you wish to get notified of.

Q: Do notifications create any visual or aural indication?

The smart strap only vibrates. The device is intended to provide discrete notifications which would only be sensed by the wearer - not seen or heard by anyone else.

Q: Do you plan to add more functions and alert types in the future?

Yes we do. This will only require updating the mobile app, there will not be any need to replace or upgrade the smart strap components.

STRAP & BUCKLE

Q: Which wristwatches can the Modillian strap connect to?

We currently offer straps that are 20 or 22 mm wide, which fit many modern men’s watches with matching lug width of 20/22 mm.

Q: How can I check the strap fits my watch?

If your watch lug width is 20 or 22mm, and it does not use special straps that can only be replaced by the manufacturer, you’ll find a Modillian strap that fits. Not sure about your watch lug width? you can measure your current strap’s width, check with a local watch store, or send us the model reference no. and we’ll try to help!

Q: How do I attach the Smart Strap to my wristwatch?

It is quite a simple operation, which you can complete in 10 minutes at home, if you have steady hands: read this article to learn how to change strapsquickly and easily. Or if you prefer, have it done at a local watch store, they’ll probably do this service at minimal fee (or free, if they’re nice).

Q: What straps are you using?

There are currently a number of strap options available to pre-order – all of them are very high quality leather straps manufactured by renowned Hirsch AG.

Q: Can I attach just the Modillian buckle to a strap of my choice?

Yes you can! The Modillian buckle, which contains the smart device, can be attached to any strap with 20mm width at the buckle end.

MOBILE APP

Q: Which smartphones is the Modillian App compatible with?

Our app currently supports any smartphone using Android version 4.0-4.3.

Q: Is the app free?

Yes of course, the Modillian App is completely free.

Q: Why do I need to download an app to use the Smart Strap?

The app is the software that lets you decide which alert notifications you’ll receive on the smart strap. The app catches relevant events happening on your smart phone, and creates the alerts.

Q: Does the app collect any data about me and my phone usage?

No it does not. What you do with your smartphone is your business, our business is just producing smart devices...

Q: Does the app affect the normal operation of my phone?

The app is very “low profile”, and with most phones its impact should be completely unnoticeable.

Q: Why don’t you have an iOS app?

Capturing events like phone calls on iOS is more difficult, and at this stage we prefer to focus our attention on providing the product with the highest quality, rather than chasing a bigger market. We certainly hope to do an iOS app in the future, which will work with the same device.

CHARGING

Q: How does the smart strap get charged?

The strap gets charged using a standard micro-USB connector. The connection is hidden in the buckle, and is not visible while wearing it.

Q: How often would I need to charge it?

With everyday use, we expect a full charge to last for about a week. If you only wear the smart strap occasionally, it might last much longer.

THE TEAM

Q: Who are you, Modillian?

The team is lead by Eran Reuveni, an industrial engineer, entrepreneur, co-founder of a successful software company that now employs 120 people, and inventor of the Smart Strap; and Gilad Kirshenboim, an experienced electronics engineer who participated in the development of many products before. We’re working with a great team of professional designers and developers.

Q: Who created the detailed design of the product?

The industrial design of the smart strap (mainly, the buckle) is the work of the very talented team at Tenenbaum Hazan Design studio.

INDIEGOGO & PRE-ORDERS

Q: What is the Indiegogo crowdfunding platform?

Indiegogo enables inventors like us to bring our dreams to life while focusing on what’s important: our customers – which is a lot better than chasing after venture capital investors. Learn more here.

Q: What assurances do I get that you will deliver the product I am ordering?

Once we reach our funding goal you’re in good hands (if we don’t reach the goal, then you don’t pay anything). Technologically, we are not doing anything too complex or risky, so we are very confident of our ability to deliver on our promise. Also: learn how Indiegogo protects you from frauds.

Q: How can I follow up on my order and get updates?

Please follow our Indiegogo campaign page for general updates on the development of the Modillian smart strap. When we begin manufacturing the final products, we will contact you about your specific delivery.
story_txt:
The Smart StrapModillian smart strap 
		connects to most wristwatches, and pairs with your Android phone over 
		Bluetooth®. The smart strap then provides discrete vibrating alerts on 
		incoming calls, text messages, and other important events. This way, you can attend meetings and events where you cannot access your smartphone, and get those notifications - while wearing your favorite old watch, without having to replace it with a bulky "smart-watch". The smart strap is the brainchild of Eran Reuveni, an industrial engineer and lover of both electronic gadgets and classic analog watches. Looking to enjoy the benefits of smart-watch notifications, while not having to depart from his favorite wristwatch, Eran joined electronics engineer Gilad Kirshenboim and started developing the Modillian smart strap.We've completed the product design and specification, and we feel it's a winner! it is really smart, focused, and fits the purpose. We want the world to enjoy it. This is where you can help.By reaching our funding goal, we'll be able to manufacture and deliver the smart strap to our backers, and later - to consumers. Check out the many perks we're offering to show our appreciation and provide greater value for all who contribute to our campaign.What Makes Modillian's Smart Strap So Smart?Think of all those times when you had to put your phone away, in business meetings or personal events. Think how much more relaxed you would be knowing that you're not missing out on any important call or message. Yes, a smart watch provides such notifications, but - wouldn't you prefer wearing your lovely old watch? This is where our solution really shines! Because:
It's not a bulky "mini-phone on your wrist": it just provides the alerts you need.
It is discrete and low-profile. Most people won't even notice you are wearing it. Which is great when you want to show the person you're with you are giving them your undivided attention.
It consumes very little energy. Even if you use it all day every day, you wouldn't have to charge it more than once a week.
It is really simple to use. 
Modillian's unique product design is patent pending.


About The Perks We're Offering


All perks offered include delivery of a finished, fully functional, packaged, high-quality product with 12 months guarantee. Only exceptions are the basic $10 "support" option, and the Beta Tester option (which actually includes both an early model and the finished product).

We are not selling prototypes or pre-production samples. We respect our supporters and early adopters, and will not compromise on the quality of products provided.Prices include international shipping, so no additional funds will be required: the price you're seeing now is all-inclusive.Some perks include delivery of additional items or quantities of more than one smart strap. Details are provided in perk description where relevant.Please note the different versions offered. Modillian smart-straps differ in band type, width and color. Some perks allow you to choose your preferred version: where relevant, available choices are mentioned in perk description, and you will be emailed prior to delivery to ask about your preferred version.

Production TimelineFAQ
FUNCTIONALITY
Q: Can I configure the smart strap to notify only on certain types of
events, or on calls from specific numbers?
Absolutely, any type of notification can be turned on or off
individually. Plus, you can specify which caller, SMS sender, or Email sender,
you wish to get notified of.
Q: Do notifications create any visual or aural indication?
The smart strap only vibrates. The device is intended to provide
discrete notifications which would only be sensed by the wearer - not seen or
heard by anyone else.
Q: Do you plan to add more functions and alert types in the future?
Yes we do. This will only require updating the mobile app, there will
not be any need to replace or upgrade the smart strap components.
STRAP & BUCKLE
Q: Which wristwatches can the Modillian strap connect to?
We currently offer straps that are 20 or 22 mm wide, which fit many
modern men’s watches with matching lug width of 20/22 mm.
Q: How can I check the strap fits my watch?
If your watch lug width is 20 or 22mm, and it does not use special
straps that can only be replaced by the manufacturer, you’ll find a Modillian
strap that fits. Not sure about your watch lug width? you can measure your
current strap’s width, check with a local watch store, or send us the model
reference no. and we’ll try to help!
Q: How do I attach the Smart Strap to my wristwatch?
It is quite a simple operation, which you can complete in 10 minutes at
home, if you have steady hands: read this article to learn how to change strapsquickly and easily. Or if you prefer, have it done at a local watch store,
they’ll probably do this service at minimal fee (or free, if they’re nice).
Q: What straps are you using?
There are currently a number of strap options available to pre-order –
all of them are very high quality leather straps manufactured by renowned
Hirsch AG.
Q: Can I attach just the Modillian buckle to a strap of my choice?
Yes you can! The Modillian buckle, which contains the smart device, can
be attached to any strap with 20mm width at the buckle end.
MOBILE APP
Q: Which smartphones is the Modillian App compatible with?
Our app currently supports any smartphone using Android version 4.0-4.3.
Q: Is the app free?
Yes of course, the Modillian App is completely free.
Q: Why do I need to download an app to use the Smart Strap?
The app is the software that lets you decide which alert notifications
you’ll receive on the smart strap. The app catches relevant events happening on
your smart phone, and creates the alerts.
Q: Does the app collect any data about me and my phone usage?
No it does not. What you do with your smartphone is your business, our
business is just producing smart devices...
Q: Does the app affect the normal operation of my phone?
The app is very “low profile”, and with most phones its impact should be
completely unnoticeable.
Q: Why don’t you have an iOS app?
Capturing events like phone calls on iOS is more difficult, and at this
stage we prefer to focus our attention on providing the product with the
highest quality, rather than chasing a bigger market. We certainly hope to do
an iOS app in the future, which will work with the same device.
CHARGING
Q: How does the smart strap get charged?
The strap gets charged using a standard micro-USB connector. The
connection is hidden in the buckle, and is not visible while wearing it.
Q: How often would I need to charge it?
With everyday use, we expect a full charge to last for about a week. If
you only wear the smart strap occasionally, it might last much longer.
THE TEAM
Q: Who are you, Modillian?
The team is lead by Eran Reuveni, an 
		industrial engineer, entrepreneur, co-founder of a successful software 
company that now employs 120 people, and inventor of the Smart Strap; and Gilad Kirshenboim, an experienced electronics engineer 
who participated in the development of many products before. We’re working with 
a great team of professional designers and developers.
Q: Who created the detailed design of the product?
The industrial design of the smart strap (mainly, the buckle) is the
work of the very talented team at Tenenbaum Hazan Design studio.
INDIEGOGO & PRE-ORDERS
Q: What is the Indiegogo crowdfunding platform?
Indiegogo enables inventors like us to bring our dreams to life while
focusing on what’s important: our customers – which is a lot better than chasing after
venture capital investors. Learn more here.
Q: What assurances do I get that you will deliver the product I am
ordering?
Once we reach our funding goal you’re in good hands (if we don’t
reach the goal, then you don’t pay anything). Technologically, we are not doing
anything too complex or risky, so we are very confident of our ability to
deliver on our promise. Also: learn how Indiegogo protects you from frauds.
Q: How can I follow up on my order and get updates?
Please follow our Indiegogo campaign page for general updates on the
development of the Modillian smart strap. When we begin manufacturing the final
products, we will contact you about your specific delivery.

story:
Deerfield Beach's footwear design firm Brigands Militia www.brigmi.com brings you its Spring Collection with "Sandals For The Homeless" partnering with South Florida's Homeless Voice www.homelessvoice.org to  donate an  Exuberant amount of sandals PLUS 20% of all proceeds will be donated to the Homeless Voice!




Who is Brigands Militia?

Brigands Militia is a footwear design company, that designs and distributes the Brigmi Hybrid Sandal from Deerfield Beach, FL,  The sandals are designed to be lightweight like a flip flop, yet strong like a heavy sandal for durability, without the need to harm animals (shhh...  they are vegan sandals!)  

President of Brigands Militia, Carlos Lopez Avery  "When it comes to sandals, we boot our best foot forward!" he said  smiling "Were hoping to be able to donate close to 500 pairs of sandals plus we are donating 20% of all proceeds to  the HOMELESS VOICE , with your help and that of our community!  Every Little Bit Helps!  Don't forget to tell a friend and a family member!"





The Perks

For every sandal that you purchase, there will also be a sandal donated to a homeless person, this is our One 4 One motto.  We will be starting off by allowing contributors to choose which price they wish to pay!  You can get a quality pair of sandals for your self and a homeless person for as little as $1!


YES I said $1!!!!


Each reward is limited to a certain amount so get yours at the best price before they are gone.

Each Perk up to the $25 gives you (1) One Pair of sandals for YOU & (1) One Pair for a Homeless person!! 

The $25 Reward, will be unlimited, allowing the community the leverage to drive this campaign as far as they wish.  This perk allows for the financial balancing of the loss of the sandals, and helps to gather more funds for the Homeless Voice.


Why Are We Doing This?

The homeless in South Florida have to struggle through some of the roughest heat spells that Spring and Summer bring to South Florida YEARLY, that most of use don't pay much mind too, because most of us have shoes, sandals or both, but not EVERYONE.  The heat can cause blistering on your feet from the high temperatures on the street.  The homeless should have adequate footwear to help prevent potential blister infections and diseases caused from walking barefoot on the streets.

.....they deserve better!!.  

The Homeless Voice, is the voice of the homeless in South Florida.  

They are a small non-profit that runs the #1 emergency and response shelter in South Florida. They serve, house, and care for 500 homeless every day, and have costs like any other business: water, power, rent, programs, staff and legal help. 

 The Homeless Voice is extremely effective. It is a place where anyone in need will get help. It is a safe place for people to go when they have nowhere else to turn. They take no government funds. They run on donations averaging about 33 cents. They Need You Help!

If helping people is important to you as it is important for us, Click on a Perk and buy a sandal for the cause, remember its One 4 One!


Some of the wonderful people that work there are Director Sean Cononie, Editor Mark Targett, and Coordinator/Manager Christine Jordan.

              


You buy a sandal, we donate a sandal, its as easy as that!

How can we do that??  We believe in community capitalism, we make a small profit to run the business and we pay it back by making a significant impact on our community.   




Our Success Is Up to You!  Every Penny Helps!!!!!!!!!

We need your help to make this a reality!


The Sandals

The Brigmi Hybrid Sandal is on its third design, and we know your going to love the designs for the Spring-Summer time.  

                             


The sandals bottom sole will be approximately 30% thicker, the upper sole will be a faux suede leather that feels soft to the touch, yet extremely durable. We have also added arch support to all our sandals.

                               

The Colors have gone through a redevelopment also. Now we have Rustic Red, Naval Blue, Camo Green and the Original Brigmi Orange

The Brigmi Sticker

This Sticker in Included in the $100 Perk! its a 6x6 and looks stunning!

Don't forget to tell us your size and color

SANDALS SIZES AVAILABLE:  Sizes 8 - 9 - 10 - 11 - 12

Why Do We Need $16,700?

We need to make a minimum order purchase to get the 4 colors manufactured, so we need a minimum of $16,700 to manufacture the sandals.  The inventory will be large enough where we should have more than enough sandals to fill all the orders.
This includes Everything


We need your help to make this a reality!



Risks & Challenges

Working with our manufacturer our timeline will be as follows:

  • January: Campaign Ends/Orders are Placed. 30 day turnaround
  • Febuary 15-28: Production run ending in approx 30 days. Sandals Shipped
  • April: Shipping can take approx 30 days, by Mid April, sandals have arrived.

All Shipping to contributors will occur immediately once shipment has arrived in Deerfield Beach, FL. 

We have been in communication with the footwear production company & we do not expect any delays.  All logistics are already set for shipping.


Sandals for the homeless will be transported by truck to the Homeless Voice, and distribution will occur there.  We plan on Streaming live the distribution of the sandals or recording the distribution, this has not been fully decided yet which, You The Community can decide, message us! ***


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, and we totally understand but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Help us out by asking folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign and what we are doing.
  • Remember to share us out to the world using  Indiegogo,  Facebook, and Twitter!!  Tell your friends and family!!


Thank you All for your generosity and Kindness!  The Sandals For The Homeless Team, The Homeless Voice and the homeless of South Florida are very very grateful for your contributions, Thank You!!!!!!!!!

                              Blessing to you all

 Our Team:  Carlos Lopez Avery, Christian Pareja, Maritza Tobon and Frankie Nordelus

We have been in communication with the footwear production company & we do not expect any delays.  All logistics are already set for shipping.

story:
As a young woman raised within a religious cult, many aspects of my upbringing, particularly my social life and how I dressed, was heavily controlled.

Ultimately, a secluded upbringing and the inability to explore fashion became the driving force behind my desire to create a vehicle which promoted self expression and unity. Girls United is devoted to that vision, a platform where women express and share their sense of style in a fun uplifting community.



Statistics indicate that the quantity of mobile app users will continue to rapidly increase. Although the project began as a website, I chose to deliver the GU platform on a mobile application to ensure it supported a wider audience that's on the go. Your support towards the goal of $50,000 gives me the green light to help place fashion at your fingertips- regardless of your location.

FEATURES

The HOTT Point system helps promote the fun of sharing fashion. Giving a HOTT Point unlocks the retail mystery to the outfit of interest! GU members will be notified upon receiving a HOTT point. 


Follow Me! feature allows you to build an audience of fashionistas. 

Social Media Integration: Share your style within GU with the option to link across other social media platforms (e.g. Facebook, Pinterest). Doing so will maximize your exposure and may garner you more HOTT points.

Filter:  Tailor your app. by age and/or fashion style to customize your account.

Fashion Icons encompass the outfit details. At minimum, a member must input retail details of her top (i.e blouse, sweater) and bottom (i.e. jeans, skirt) for the outfit to upload.



Chat:  Connect with fellow fashionista's in real-time from around the world. 

GU gives you the option to upgrade to its In-App subscription. The subsciption includes all the perks of a free membership in addition to added benefits.  GU's focus is always to give back to its members. The $1.99/monthly subscription helps fund the following fun:



 A COPY OF THE BOOK, 'THEY MADE ME DO IT'. This memoir unveils the driving force that propelled the passion and motivation behind the conception of GU.


GU BOOKMARK: Made using recycled paper and vegetable based ink. Because we love fashion and our earth too.


HONORARY FOUNDERS BRACELET (women): Crafted of .925 sterling silver, this charm bracelet commemorates the participation of our supporters on this exciting journey. Two mini dog tag charms come custom engraved with the text: "Honorary Founder" (charm 1) "Girls United" (charm 2).  Please be sure to indicate desired length:  7", 7.5" or 8"

HONORARY FOUNDERS BRACELET (men): This ID bracelet commemorates the participation of our supporters on this exciting journey. Crafted of .925 solid sterling silver and featuring 350 gauge curb links, this bracelet is available in the following lengths of 8" or 9". Front engraving: "Honorary Founder".  Inner engraving: "Girls United".

story:
The Plain Film Jacket____
clear and elegant design, full transparency, high functionalities for an incredible comfort

  • A simple and well proportioned shape / A chic-and-sport look
  • Many functionalities with elegant details
  • A clear and transparent charcoal grey, to play with the colors of your clothes and create layered effects


The Plain Film Jacket combines 6 qualities

  • wind and waterproof material 100% polyurethane
  • waterproof seams
  • double opening and waterproof zip + protective under flap.
  • comfortable knit cuffs in cotton and spandex > Vertical stripes blue/ charcoal and   grey, have been created exclusively for the Plain Film Raincoat. This means that you   will never see such a detail in another brand
  • stretch tape in a black reflective material to tighten the sleeves
  • polyamide drawcord to adjust hood and bottom of the garment



FOCUS

       

LOOK

         

         THE PREMIUM JACKET DESIGNED FOR THE FUTURE
                               > DESIGN + PERFORMANCES

MATERIAL

THE PLAIN FILM > smooth / superfine / transparency / tearproof / light weight      

100% polyurethane, made in Italy, the PLAIN FILM is the perfect material to prevent the penetration of water.

Although this material is 0,25mm thick, it has High strength and High performances > > smooth / superfine / transparency / tearproof

SOFTNESS and SUPPLENESS

 the PLAIN FILM > as soft as a skin

                    

                                    

EASY CARE : no special cleaning required thanks to its feature stain repellent and dirt repellent> ideal to pack along on all your adventures                                  

                        

The breathable mesh sewn under the armholes, cuffs and pockets lining adds comfort and thermal regulation.


PLEDGES


FIT  > same look for men and women

straight shape, three-quarter length > see our size chart to select your right size.


SIZE CHART


How do i choose my size and the style (men and/or women) ?

At the end of the campaign, we will send you a link to a page where you can choose your size(s) and your style(s). 


OUR PHILOSOPHY / OUR TEAM


In 2012, we decided to launch the first fashion brand DESIGN TO COST.

Our concept is a direct offer to avoid a middlemen from creation to final sale. We call it Design to Cost.

So you can take advantage of wholesale prices as retailers for a premium positioning.This honest proposition is based on the following observation  > the market prices are disconnected from the actual value of the products, raising questions about the sincerity of the offer.

catalogue De built clothes with functional fabrics : airy fluidity, smooth technology, sense of well-being and comfortable elegance. Light and clever clothes  to escape the rules of fashion trends. We use the most innovative and intelligent fabrics available to offer  you a feel good effect, the best protection and comfort. Their lightness, their textile structure, their transparency, their surprising and special touch is a strong feature of our style.

Manufacturers

Our clothes are carried out by experienced and reliable manufacturers who kept their production tool since several generations. Their struggle has allowed them to keep most European brands in premium sportswear. We prefer a manufacturing "made with" rather than "made in". We choose carefully among the world's best manufacturers in the field of textile technology. 

Team

catalogue De is a successful team of Young fashion and design school graduates surrounded by experts to ensure coordination, consistency, and a high quality of products. Our goal is to give voice and a showcase to Young graduates. their source of proposal is a plan for the future covering all aspect of creation : « each new upcoming generation is a breeding ground for innovation ». For this first session, we have selected the best post graduates from MOD’ART International school (fashion/Paris-France) and MARYSE ELOY school ( graphic design/Paris- France). Each of them, like us, is deeply involved in this project. The only compensation paid to each of them, like us, is a percentage depending of the success of this project.


Tiphaine Deguelle : art direction / co-founder

Romain Dilhac : marketing / pricing / co-founder

Paul De Saint Germain : graphic designer

Elsa Kostic : graphic designer

Stan Ng : photography

Bihui Wei : fashion designer

Aino Salo: fashion designer

Marion Tran: fashion designer

Quoc-Anh Truong : social media manager


...AND YOU !


              In the next episode...


The Insulation Power Knit
story_txt:
The Plain Film Jacket____clear and elegant design, full transparency, high functionalities for an incredible comfort





A simple and well proportioned shape / A chic-and-sport look


Many functionalities with elegant details

A clear and transparent charcoal grey, to play with the colors of your clothes and create layered effects





The Plain Film Jacket combines 6 qualities



wind and waterproof material 100% polyurethane
waterproof seams
double opening and waterproof zip + protective under flap.
comfortable knit cuffs in cotton and spandex > Vertical stripes blue/ charcoal and   grey, have been created exclusively for the Plain Film Raincoat. This means that you   will never see such a detail in another brand
stretch tape in a black reflective material to tighten the sleeves
polyamide drawcord to adjust hood and bottom of the garment




FOCUS




       
LOOK


         





         THE PREMIUM JACKET DESIGNED FOR THE FUTURE

                               > DESIGN + PERFORMANCES


MATERIAL

THE PLAIN FILM > smooth / superfine / transparency / tearproof / light weight      

100% polyurethane, made in Italy, the PLAIN FILM is the perfect material to prevent the penetration of water.
Although this material is 0,25mm thick, it has High strength and
High performances > > smooth / superfine / transparency / tearproof
SOFTNESS
and SUPPLENESS
 the PLAIN FILM > as soft as a skin

                    

                                    
EASY CARE : no special cleaning required thanks to its feature stain repellent and dirt repellent> ideal to pack along on all your adventures                                  





                        

The breathable mesh sewn under the armholes, cuffs and pockets lining adds comfort and thermal regulation.





PLEDGES





FIT  > same look for men and women
straight shape, three-quarter length > see our size chart to select your right size.
SIZE CHART



How do i choose my size and the style (men and/or women) ?
At the end of the campaign, we will send you a link to a page where you can choose your size(s) and your style(s). 

OUR PHILOSOPHY / OUR TEAM



In 2012, we decided to launch the first fashion brand DESIGN TO COST.
Our concept is a direct offer to avoid a middlemen from creation to final sale. We call it Design to Cost.
So you can take advantage of wholesale prices as retailers for a premium positioning.This honest
proposition is based on the following observation  > the market prices are disconnected from the actual value of the products, raising questions about the sincerity of the offer.
catalogue De built clothes with functional fabrics : airy fluidity, smooth technology, sense of well-being and comfortable elegance. Light and clever clothes  to escape the rules of fashion trends. We use the most innovative and intelligent fabrics available to offer  you a feel good effect, the best protection and comfort. Their lightness, their textile structure, their transparency, their surprising and special touch is a strong feature of our style.

story:
Born in Barcelona and surrounded by the Mediterranean, Nolands is a small business devoted to change the rules of fast fashion consumerism by providing premium, eco and sustainable sunglasses for a brighter tomorrow.

 

"DID YOU KNOW THAT 98% OF THE LENSES, FRAMES & PACKAGING ARE MADE OUT OF PETROLEUM-BASED PLASTIC?"

 

Numbers don’t lie: this year 1 billion sunglasses will be produced worldwide. 95% of those will be manufactured entirely —100%— using petroleum-based plastics from Asia. They are non-biodegradable objects containing chemicals highly polluting for our health and our environment and produced under extremely harsh labour conditions. ​

Our product is robust, durable, and fairly crafted in Italy only using organic and recycled materials that are 100% biodegradable and completely eliminating the use of petroleum-based plastics.

 

 

 

 

Our new collection is inspired by retro shapes and colors that are aligned with our notion of urban style and nature. The Nolands collection is available in 6 styles and 3 colors for each style... choose yours!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Besides our sunglasses, we also have decided to launch our new collection of prescription lenses & non-prescription lenses with blue light blocking included to enjoy freely with our sustainable frames. 

Due to changing habits and new technological advances (computers, tablets, smartphones, etc.) we are currently exposed to a high (and harmful) amount of blue-violet light that reaches our eyes (radiation until 410 nm).

 


Our Nolands blue light safe treatment with a 1.6 refractive index achieves the ideal balance of eye protection against the harmful part of the light. It allows the passage of the beneficial fringe while maintaining the maximum lens transparency.

 

 

 

 

NEED PRESCRIPTION LENSES?

NO EXTRA FEE!

If you are looking for prescription lenses our optical lab facility will award our backers at Indiegogo with a free ophthalmic grading service.

Send us your optometric test for graduation at optical@nolandseyewear.com

 

 

 

 

 

SUSTAINABLE PREMIUM GLASS LENS

During the years, sunglasses have become a fashion accessory to the detriment of their qualitative and protective properties. Nowadays, in the splendour of the low-cost era, 99% of lenses are made using oil-based plastics of different range and quality. 

Nolands polarized glass sun lenses provide the highest optical sharpness on the market. Such a statement is backed up by the prestigious Italian house Barberini and his more than 50 years in the ophthalmological sector. Their precision lenses have been successfully applied to photography, video or telescopes, achieving the highest vision definition and maximum protection.

 

 


LONG-LASTING SUN PROTECTION

The importance of enjoying the optical features of the product over time.

Initially plastic lenses can assure high protection levels. Its serious issue comes over time. Plastic scratches and wears out much faster resulting in the quick loss of its protective coatings and sun protection, that can easily amount to a 100% loss in a matter of weeks.

 

 

 

ADVANTAGES

The technology used in the making of Nolands lenses allows for the reduction in thickness, a reduction in the traditional weight of glass lenses, and an increase in their strength, robustness and hardness.

 

 

All lenses are strictly UV400 to provide UV protection over the standard UV100%. To guarantee the total visual comfort, all lenses come with the multilayer antireflection and the hydrophobic and oleophobic treatments as well.

Our sustainable lenses have a lifetime warranty.

 

 

Today, optic and fashion stores all over the world are selling sunglasses, whose frames, lenses and packaging are low-costly produced in Asia using extremely harmful plastics.  As a result, their emissions of C02 and highly polluting waste are not only threatening the health of our planet but the lifespan of their employees.

We manufacture all our components in Europe in a sustainable and certified manner as a way of claiming things done right. We fully respect the policies that protect our environment and our labour rights. We only manufacture timeless and long-lasting products fairly produced.

 

 

AWARENESS AND BEING SMART

The Spanish saying goes: «lo barato sale caro». Meaning that buying cheap is expensive. Whenever you are buying any kind of low-cost and low-quality product you are doing it at the expense of the planet, its labourers health and at the expense of your own pocket, because rather soon than later you would have to replace the product. Low-cost products are not only transient but also thrive at the cost of slowly destroying craftsmanship and small traditional
businesses. It is a matter of awareness. Remember, remember: ‘Lo barato sale caro’.

 

 

DESIGNED IN BARCELONA, HANDCRAFTED IN ITALY

We value craftsmanship and dedication over productivity at any cost and senseless velocity. We believe in true rhythms and free flow. Our final product is the result of a research that balances creativity and integrity, innovation and clarity, quality and design.

 

 

​

​

 

At Nolands we want to lead a change in the optic industry towards greater sustainability. Nonetheless, our environment awareness and our corporate social responsibility go way beyond simple intentions. 

Our goal is to empower communities at risk of poverty, increase people’s well-being and to protect our most precious treasure: the planet. Hence for every pair of glasses we sell we carry out definite actions and campaigns.

That is why this year we are focusing our efforts on one super appealing project.

 

 

REDUCING CARBON FOOTPRINT & BRINGING BACK WILDLIFE

We strive to reduce the carbon footprint by planting trees in the Atlantic Forest of Brazil for each glasses sold, collaborating hand in hand with WeForest & WWF. Helping to improve the native forest ecosystem devastated by fires and agricultural expansion, and also giving protection and care to wildlife injured by deforestation. We hope that with your help we can help plant more than 10,000 trees.

We humbly want to contribute. Will you help us?

 

 

 

 

WARRANTY​:

Our highly resistant lenses have a lifetime warranty and our bio frames a 5-year one.

 

 

SHIPPING:

WORLDWIDE FREE SHIPPING INCLUDED IN ALL ORDERS AND COUNTRIES.

Please check out the following duty information in case you have any doubt:

 

Europe:

Backers with a shipping address in any of these 27 countries will not have to pay any additional duties:

Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain and Sweden.

 

Rest of the World:

Backers from all other countries may have to pay additional import duties or other applicable taxes depending on the import policies of their respective countries upon receipt of their goods.

Custom policies and tax rates vary from country to country and we are unable to help you determine that for your shipment. Please contact your local customs office for further information.

 

 

RETURNS POLICY:

 

Can I return my Nolands and get a refund?

>> Yes, indeed our returns policy allows you to return unused glasses within 30 days of receiving them. We'll refund them back once we get them back at our warehouse. 

>> ONLY PRESCRIPTION LENSES WON’T BE ACCEPTED. However if you have any problem with your prescription lenses please contact us at optical@nolandseyewear.com

>> Nolands will cover the refund of the pledge paid by the backer except for the shipping fee. The shipping price will be established according to our couriers' fares. The additional duties and taxes will always be paid by the backer. 

>> Please note we cannot accept returns that show visible signs of use. The sunglasses must be returned in their original condition. If that is not the case, the refund will not occur. Return shipping costs are not covered by Nolands.

 

Can I exchange my Nolands?

Unfortunately, it is not possible to exchange the sunglasses. However, if for any reason you are not happy with your new pair, you can always return the ones you received by sending them back to us, and place a new order by contacting our customer service at nolands@nolandseyewear.com.

 

 

 

 

And for more interesting content and daily updates please follow us on:

story:
You are entering KLYNT’s universe to discover its modern vision; born from its passion for creativity to its strong bond with Switzerland, welcome to Horlogerie Contemporaine.

When Contemporary Architecture meets Swiss Watchmaking

 They talk about KLYNT Genève:

FratelloWatches: KLYNT Genève - An introduction and interview          

     “KLYNT attempts to walk the same path as haute horlogerie brands but in a way that it is more accessible for the average watch lovers.” FratelloWatches.

Monochrome: Creative design and reliability of the Swiss watchmaking tradition without the hefty price tag

Le Temps : «La marque horlogère Klynt peut maintenant rebondir»

 Access our press kit here: PRESS KIT KLYNT

The Passion to Create

 

At KLYNT, we believe that following your passion will let you discover an open door to the world. This mindset is at the heart of everything we do, up to our logo! KLYNT is all about creativity, and we strive to bring fresh ideas and designs to the classic Watchmaking tradition. 

Massimo, one of our passionate designers @Studio Divine

 

Based in Geneva, KLYNT perpetuates the secular Watchmaking tradition at the service of Quality and Precision to offer high end Swiss Made timepieces.

Inspired by architecture and modern design, this first collection goes far beyond the boundaries of classic watchmaking. 

Far from minimalism and simplicity, we believe that harmony is even more subtle in complex structures. Contemporary architecture gives us the key to encapsulate those vibrant lines, lights and shades, as well as texture effects in a modern envelope.

 This exceptional design is the result of the collaboration with Studio Divine, a brilliant team of designers from Bienne. 

Introducing Elegance Contemporaine, made of four variations, that take you to a different universe from the sportiest with the full black edition to the fanciest gold model.

Elegance Contemporaine Collection

 All models share the same construction and specifications:

  • Swiss Mechanical automatic movement SW 290 
  • Stainless Steel 316 L Case (Diameter: 43,5mm / Thickness: 11,3mm)
  • Top Domed Sapphire with AR coating, back flat sapphire
  • Multi-Layer Dial 
  • Skeleton Hands and Second Disc 
  • Calf Genuine Leather Strap with Steel Buckle

KLYNT EC-01 Steel

 

 

KLYNT EC-02 Gold

Case, dial, crown, hands and buckle are of GOLD 4N color.

 

KLYNT EC-03 Gold & Black

Case, dial and buckle are of GOLD 4N color. Bezel, crown, hands and caseback screws are of BLACK color.

 

KLYNT EC-04 Black

Case, dial, crown, hands and buckle are of BLACK color.

 

 

 

 Strongly attached to its terroir and values, KLYNT collaborates with local suppliers to perpetuate the Swiss Watchmaking tradition. Our way to give back to this unique location, and ensure the reliability and quality of our pieces.

Every watch is hand-assembled and controlled here in Switzerland to guarantee the quality of our timepieces as well as the accuracy of the movement.

Every choice that was made was toward designing a contemporary masterpiece. We worked to refine each component until was reached the harmony we were looking for.

Finishing on the case

The spectacular watch case features a subtle combination of the most advanced finishing techniques used in Haute Horlogerie. Starting from a traditional round shape, the lugs, crown & protector, caseback and bezel received a careful attention to get their contemporary identity.

Deep dive in the incredible dial of the EC-03

One of the most complex dial ever made, expressing KLYNT’s creativity at its paroxysm. The light is successively reflected on each layer of the dial, highlighting the fine balance of textures and depths. To complete this landscape, the smoked glass and the triangular honeycomb, KLYNT signature, offer a discreet glance at the movement.

Selecting the "petite seconde" movement enabled this incredible design, where keen observers can detect that the dial is shaped as KLYNT logo.

 Enjoying a solid reputation and used by Tag Heuer, Bulgari, IWC... our mechanical automatic movement is engraved, decorated with Côtes de Genève and finely set by our Watchmaker.

Harmonious as a whole

Every detail of the bracelet was carefully studied, from the different grains of leather, the lining with the stamped signature pattern, to the custom manly buckle.

Stamped lining with the signature pattern on the strap

To complete the package, each timepiece will be packed in the original KLYNT ELEGANCE CONTEMPORAINE Box, adopting the visual codes of the collection.

KLYNT Box

If you want more pictures and videos of the collection, have a look at our Youtube, Facebook and Instagram!

Diameter:          43,5 mm 
Lug to Lug:        50 mm
Thickness:         11,3 mm 
Strap width:       22 mm 
Weight :             96 g 

Movement:

Swiss Mechanical automatic SW 290 31 Jewels - Frequency 28,800 vph (4 Hz) - Power reserve: 38 hours - Average rate: 7±7s/d set by our Watchmaker.

Straps are genuine calf leather with suede lining, 22m wide and equipped with a fast release system to be easily interchangeable. 

To get additional straps with your watch, add USD 60 per strap to your pledge. 

 This Founders' Edition is limited to 500 pieces, each one individually numbered on the caseback. A special pledge is available to get one of the first ten watches ever produced for each variation, numbered K001 to K010.

First come, first served, numbering will be attributed by chronological pledge order.

 

 As we are firmly standing behind our high quality standards,  KLYNT timepieces are covered against manufacturing defects for two years from the date of purchase.

 Our Watchmaker will also be responsible for Customer Service, should any be required.

We are very happy to offer to all our our backers:

Keep in mind that International backers are responsible for duties and taxes charged by their respectives countries.

If you are not 100% satisfied by your watch, you will be able to enjoy our 

KLYNT is the story of two guys, Bruno and Clément who met around their passion for creativity. Both coming from an engineering background, the founders were attracted by mechanical structures. Growing around Geneva’s Watchmakers, no surprise their hearts were falling for Haute Horlogerie pieces, for they are truly pushing the boundaries of technicity and presenting astonishing complications. Unfortunately, such timepieces were out of their reach, and the two friends could only afford the classic and sober mainstream watches.    

 

KLYNT was born from their entrepreneurial motivation to remedy this lack of creativity, and for more people to access such exceptional timepieces. This was the starting point to create contemporary watches with unique designs the Swiss way.  

Why adopting the name KLYNT? In reference to a Swedish artist Hilma af Klint, who at her time pioneered Contemporary Art to fully satisfy her passion for creativity.

ELEGANCE CONTEMPORAINE Collection is the result of a year and a half of work, on the design, development and supply chain set up. We are now fully ready to unlock production with your support!

It's time to thank you all for your amazing support you expressed all along the project. For the advices, for your honest feedback to improve the prototypes, and for your enthusiasm when wearing the watches! 

Thank you to Studio Divine for their hard word and nice pictures, as well as Balázs Ferenczi for your great photos!
