KLYNT EC-02 GoldCase, dial, crown, hands and buckle are of GOLD 4N color. KLYNT EC-03 Gold & BlackCase, dial and buckle are of GOLD 4N color. Bezel, crown, hands and caseback screws are of BLACK color. KLYNT EC-04 BlackCase, dial, crown, hands and buckle are of BLACK color.    Strongly attached to its terroir and values, KLYNT collaborates with local suppliers to perpetuate the Swiss Watchmaking tradition. Our way to give back to this unique location, and ensure the reliability and quality of our pieces.Every watch is hand-assembled and controlled here in Switzerland to guarantee the quality of our timepieces as well as the accuracy of the movement.Every choice that was made was toward designing a contemporary masterpiece. We worked to refine each component until was reached the harmony we were looking for.Finishing on the caseThe spectacular watch case features a subtle combination of the most advanced finishing techniques used in Haute Horlogerie. Starting from a traditional round shape, the lugs, crown & protector, caseback and bezel received a careful attention to get their contemporary identity.Deep dive in the incredible dial of the EC-03One of the most complex dial ever made, expressing KLYNT’s creativity at its paroxysm. The light is successively reflected on each layer of the dial, highlighting the fine balance of textures and depths. To complete this landscape, the smoked glass and the triangular honeycomb, KLYNT signature, offer a discreet glance at the movement.Selecting the "petite seconde" movement enabled this incredible design, where keen observers can detect that the dial is shaped as KLYNT logo. Enjoying a solid reputation and used by Tag Heuer, Bulgari, IWC... our mechanical automatic movement is engraved, decorated with Côtes de Genève and finely set by our Watchmaker.Harmonious as a wholeEvery detail of the bracelet was carefully studied, from the different grains of leather, the lining with the stamped signature pattern, to the custom manly buckle.Stamped lining with the signature pattern on the strapTo complete the package, each timepiece will be packed in the original KLYNT ELEGANCE CONTEMPORAINE Box, adopting the visual codes of the collection.KLYNT BoxIf you want more pictures and videos of the collection, have a look at our Youtube, Facebook and Instagram!Diameter:          43,5 mm Lug to Lug:        50 mmThickness:         11,3 mm Strap width:       22 mm Weight :             96 g Movement:Swiss Mechanical automatic SW 290 31 Jewels - Frequency 28,800 vph (4 Hz) - Power reserve: 38 hours - Average rate: 7±7s/d set by our Watchmaker.Straps are genuine calf leather with suede lining, 22m wide and equipped with a fast release system to be easily interchangeable. To get additional straps with your watch, add USD 60 per strap to your pledge.  This Founders' Edition is limited to 500 pieces, each one individually numbered on the caseback. A special pledge is available to get one of the first ten watches ever produced for each variation, numbered K001 to K010.First come, first served, numbering will be attributed by chronological pledge order.  As we are firmly standing behind our high quality standards,  KLYNT timepieces are covered against manufacturing defects for two years from the date of purchase. Our Watchmaker will also be responsible for Customer Service, should any be required.We are very happy to offer to all our our backers:Keep in mind that International backers are responsible for duties and taxes charged by their respectives countries.If you are not 100% satisfied by your watch, you will be able to enjoy our KLYNT is the story of two guys, Bruno and Clément who met around their passion for creativity. Both coming from an engineering background, the founders were attracted by mechanical structures. Growing around Geneva’s Watchmakers, no surprise their hearts were falling for Haute Horlogerie pieces, for they are truly pushing the boundaries of technicity and presenting astonishing complications. Unfortunately, such timepieces were out of their reach, and the two friends could only afford the classic and sober mainstream watches.     KLYNT was born from their entrepreneurial motivation to remedy this lack of creativity, and for more people to access such exceptional timepieces. This was the starting point to create contemporary watches with unique designs the Swiss way.  Why adopting the name KLYNT? In reference to a Swedish artist Hilma af Klint, who at her time pioneered Contemporary Art to fully satisfy her passion for creativity.ELEGANCE CONTEMPORAINE Collection is the result of a year and a half of work, on the design, development and supply chain set up. We are now fully ready to unlock production with your support!It's time to thank you all for your amazing support you expressed all along the project. For the advices, for your honest feedback to improve the prototypes, and for your enthusiasm when wearing the watches! Thank you to Studio Divine for their hard word and nice pictures, as well as Balázs Ferenczi for your great photos!

story:
RRROAD offers you the possibility to protect yourself and the ones around you in these troubled times while maintaining your commitment with the environment. This face mask is made from 100% recycled polyester and uses the latest advances: Silver Ions technology.

The problem

Since the beginning of the Corona outbreak worldwide, we are witnessing the rise of single use plastic and millions of single use masks being thrown away every day. This environmental disaster is already being suffered by nature all over the world as we are witnessing tides of masks floating in our seas.

The Solution

RRROAD was founded as a tool to fight against climate change thus we needed to contribute to put an end to this out of control face mask situation. After a long research and studying prototypes with different suppliers, the result is a Mask that is good for you and the planet. 

A unique design made to perfectly fit your face, suitable for men (L size) and women (M size). 

It helps our cause in two ways: first of all it is made from 100% recycled polyester, giving trash a second chance; secondly it is reusable and washable up to 60 times. 

It is the result of RRROAD’s manifesto: a mask that helps REDUCE production, helps you REUSE it for a long time and it is made from RECYCLED fibers.

SILVERPLUS® TECHNOLOGY

The leading silver ion technology for hygiene, protection, and freshness in everyday life as well as under extreme conditions. Test method for filtration efficiency EN14683:2019+AC:2019 Antimicrobial / Protection against bad odors. OEKO-TEX® and bluesign® approved, eco-friendly. This product is washable at low temperatures, reducing energy consumption.

WARNING

In order to properly use this mask in public, it is important that you follow these instructions: If you are ill, this mask is unsuitable. Seek advice from your doctor. This mask is not a medical device as defined by the Directive 93/42/CEE or Regulation EU/2017/745 (surgical masks) nor is it personal protective equipment in the sense of Regulation EU/2016/425 (respiratory protective devices). Always check that the mask is correctly fitted and covers your nose, mouth and chin. It is recommended that this mask be worn on bare skin; beards can reduce the filtration efficiency to below the set standards. If applicable: Masks are not suitable for children under 3 years of age. It is recommended that children between 3 and 12 years are supervised while wearing these masks. A mask which hinders the user's ability to breathe when first put on is deemed unsuitable. It can take time to become accustomed to. This community face covering does not replace protective measures (regular hand-washing, physical separation, reduced contact with other people). It minimizes the user's projection of saliva droplets into the environment. Do not use when participating in vigorous physical activity. Stop using this product at the first signs of damage. The mask, specified as reusable, should be washed before the first use unless recommended by its manufacturer. Do not use dry cleaning and fabric softener. Clean the reusable mask after each use.

 

Our Certificates

story:
Why did we come up with Wiseward Essential wallet? Because you asked for it.

Reviewing the feedback from our users and prospective customers, we recognized a need for the specific version of Wiseward smart wallet: one that would include all new set of benefits like more storage, easier handling and lighter construction without electronic components.

 

 

In order to achieve that, we didn’t simply make a stripped down version of our Wiseward smart wallet and called it Wiseward Essential - what we did instead was create a whole new product, putting more effort in finding the top quality materials and producing design layout that would meet the requirements of our users: all in order to create simpler, essential wallet for people who love the original but live for the traditional.

 

 

Get to know it.

Details, the design choices and overall look of the Wiseward essential are derived from the same values and philosophy behind Baggizmo Wiseward smart wallet, but adapted to users like you: people who set a higher value on classic features of the wallet rather than the newest electronic technology.

 

 

Feel the quality.

Made with innovative eco-friendly fabrics that are water repellent, durable, strong yet soft and pleasant to touch. Its originality, beauty and high-quality textures emphasize the essence of the Made in Italy fashion and style.

 

 

Baggizmo Wiseward Essential is made with  FSC® certificated eco-friendly innovative high-quality durable materials that are water repellent, soft and pleasant to touch.

 

 

Stay safe all the way.

 

Using specialized encasing materials, the Wiseward Essential is RFID secured and will protect your cards against skimming devices, i.e. data theft. You don’t have to fear anymore while riding on a crowded bus, train or subway, or while standing in a queue close to other people.

The crooks of today don't have to be very intelligent or dexterous - all they have to do is stand near you to steal precious data from your credit cards. Luckily, this is where Wiseward jumps in. You see, the RFID chips embedded in your cards work by using radio waves to communicate, and that's what makes it possible to read them without actual physical contact. But, that also means that someone with a skimmer device can easily scan through your pocket, without you realizing it.

 

 

Fortunately, radio waves can be interrupted and blocked, and that’s exactly how Wiseward Essential wallet works: it encases your credit cards in a material that interferes with radio waves. No radio waves – no skimming; you don't have to fear anymore while riding on a crowded bus, train or subway, or while standing in a queue close to other people.

 

 

To make things more practical, Wiseward Essential has special two-zone card sections: one with RFID protection, and the other without protection. The section without RFID protection enables you to use the cards that must stay unblocked all the time - so you don't have to pull them out of the wallet if you want to open your garage, enter a subway station etc.

 

Go for practicality.

 

Wiseward Essential features practical minimalist design, well organized interior with two internal pockets that allow you for more storage space, and handy external pocket for quick access. It also comes in a wide choice of nicely balanced two and three tone colour combinations.

 

 

Due to the design of its compartments, it's only 0.4" (10 mm) thick when filled optimally (10 cards and cash).

Wiseward Essential can hold up to 10 credit cards in two RFID protected sections, plus up to 6 cards in two internal pockets, intended for non-protected cards. The section without RFID protection enables you to use cards that must stay unblocked all the time - so you don't have to pull them out of the wallet if you want to open the garage, enter the subway station etc.

Wiseward Essential can receive up to 15 credit cards and still remain slim, pocket-sized and easy to use.

 

Carry it with pride.

 

Wiseward Essential is designed and manufactured in the EU by an award winning product design team, skillfully made using first class materials and combining simplicity with good looks.

 

Baggizmo Wiseward Essential has been designed in Croatia and is completely made in Europe.

 

Personalize your Baggizmo Wiseward Essential.

Engrave your wallet with up to three letters of Alphabet, and create a unique gift that anyone would be proud to carry.

 

 

 

 

Baggizmo Wiseward Essential wallet is available in 8 different color combinations and in two different patterns.

 

 

Baggizmo Wiseward Essential - Pumpkin Vintage Brown

Vintage brown tweed pattern material on the outside, smooth matt chocolate brown material on the inside with orange smooth external pocket.


 

Baggizmo Wiseward Essential - True Blue

Minimalistic true blue diamond shaped pattern material on the outside and  smooth matt mint green material on the inside with smooth green mint external pocket

 

Baggizmo Wiseward Essential - Cardinal Red

Minimalistic cardinal red diamond shaped pattern material on the outside and smooth matt ivory beige material on the inside with smooth matt ivory beige external pocket

 

Baggizmo Wiseward Essential - Jet Black

Minimalistic jet black diamond shaped pattern material on the outside and smooth matt jet black material on the inside with smooth matt jet black external pocket.

 

Baggizmo Wiseward Essential - Noble Blue

Noble blue tweed pattern material on the outside and smooth matt midnight blue material on the inside with smooth matt midnight blue external pocket

 

Baggizmo Wiseward Essential - Sandy Beige

Sandy beige tweed pattern material on the outside and smooth matt ivory beige material on the inside with smooth matt ivory beige external pocket

 

Baggizmo Wiseward Essential - Vintage Brown

Vintage brown tweed pattern material on the outside and smooth matt chocolate brown material on the inside with smooth matt chocolate brown  external pocket.

 

Baggizmo Wiseward Essential - Limited Edition

Minimalistic true blue diamond shaped pattern material on the outside and smooth matt gray material on the inside with smooth matt gray external pocket.

 

Baggizmo Wiseward Essential wallet is packed in a sleek, black envelope and placed into electrostatic semi transparent envelope bag with a zipper

 

 

Baggizmo Wiseward Essential gift packaging is an elegant textile packaging bag like is often used for storing exclusive gift items. You can use it to store your wallet when you are not using it, and it makes a perfect addition if you are giving Wiseward Essential as a present.

 

 

 

Baggizmo’s team believes in timeless and smart pieces. They are guided by the philosophy that the design shouldn’t be dictated by seasons or trends; instead, it should be practical, comfortable and innovative. The entire Baggizmo team has been driven by this idea and this vision and it has resulted in the successive production of well-received wearable gadgets.

Baggizmo team members:

Ladislav Jurić _ Founder, CEO, product development manager
Izvorka Jurić _ Product development and branding manager
Tomislav Petković _ Prototype development
Igor Poturić _ Creative communication, copywriting
Matija Tolić _ Website development and tech support
Marina Ravlić _ Baggizmo Project Manager
Dinka Hadžović _ Operation and logistics associate
Kristina Ravlić _ Social network marketing, assistant and customer support
Jurica Kos _ Graphic design and visual presentation

and others who helped us in many ways.

We would like to thank the whole team for their effort and enthusiasm.

 

 

Baggizmo® is a wearable tech-fashion brand that includes a unique EDC bag and technologically the most advanced smart wallet - Wiseward™, that was born from a great vision of innovative and practical design.

After the successful Kickstarter campaign in 2015, Baggizmo® become the name on everyone’s lips. All coveted sites such as Mashable, Designboom, FashNerd, etc. gave great reviews of the revolutionary design and high quality of the Baggizmo bag. And that was the moment when the team decided to go the extra mile to “Tech Meets Fashion” segment with the creation of the Baggizmo® Wiseward™  smart wallet and run the second successful Kickstarter campaign in 2017.

From day one, Baggizmo has led the way in wearable technology, expanding with an intensity rarely seen in brands this young. Today, the Baggizmo bag is worn in more than 89 countries worldwide, and the smart wallet is on its way to conquer the world too.

 

If you have any questions or concerns, please shoot us an email at wiseward@baggizmo.me and we will answer as soon as possible!

story:
In a glimpse:

  •  World's first patented Cylindrical Bio-Gel Structure maximizes the ability of shock absorption and comforts your feet on standing, walking, and running activities in your daily life.
  • Internationally approved AEGIS Antibacterial Fabric absorbs the moist of shoes and aids in the prevention of athlete's foot and foot odor.
  • It fits perfectly in most types of shoes, including shoes for business, sports or casual activities.

 

Commuting

In most of the countries, people walk more than 4,000 steps a day, and American walks 3,000 to 4,000 steps a day (according to Statista). Many people commute with weight -- PC, smartphone, documents, wallet. Are you one of them?

Health experts even suggest to walk 10,000 steps a day to get more health benefits from it.

Working

According to the Bureau of Labor Statistics, USA, the following chart shows that most occupations include standing and walking time of more than 4 hours per day.

↑ Sitting(red) vs. standing and walking(blue) time percentage for selected occupations.

"Most jobs require some standing or walking and some sitting. Across all civilian jobs in 2016, workers needed to spend an average of 61.0 percent of the workday standing or walking and 39.0 percent of the workday sitting. The mix of standing versus sitting varied by the occupation. For example, waiters and waitresses spent 96.3 percent of their workday standing or walking and just 3.7 percent sitting." - Bureau of Labor Statistics

If you are one of them, you deserve ExpertGel, the best of all.

 

The patented ExpertGel gel insole forms an air-layered structure with excellent support, so it absorbs impact and simultaneously stimulates the soles of the feet. The following image show the shock absorption test comparing with the others.

↑ Foot pressure distribution graph showing before and after using ExpertGel expert insoles, with highest pressure (dark red), lowest pressure (dark blue) while standing, walking, and running.

You don't have to worry anymore about taking off the shoes in front of people in the same room. A highly breathable air layer structure with AEGIS antibacterial agent reduces bacteria's growth, with a deodorizing effect.

 

 "It was a typical night after a long day at the office - There usually isn't much traffic at that time, so I decided to drive home. As I was driving through a cross junction, a drunk driver unknowingly ran a red light and crashed into my vehicle. I sustained some minor injuries to my lower body and recovered within a month.

"A few years went by, and I began noticing changes in my body, like small discomforts while walking was becoming more prevalent. It made me realize that the trauma I sustained in that accident had negatively affected my body's ability to recover to normal fully.

"I went on a search for a suitable sole insert to alleviate my walking discomfort. After trying out a myriad of options in the sole insert industry, I could still find one that met my needs. As a result, I decided to design and make my own sole insert instead, and ExpertGel was born."

-- Chier, Founder of ExpertGel

"Bio-Gel", the core material we use in our sole inserts, is biodegradable, malleable, and environmentally friendly. There are endless applications and uses for it. We have spent countless hours researching and developing Bio-Gel, since a lot of what is known out there about these materials are carefully guarded secrets. It took some time, but we have successfully incorporated this technology into our products in their developmental stages.

Through stringent testing and actual test user inputs, we know that our designs are extremely efficient in reducing pain and eliminating symptoms. Today, we develop and utilize this technology extensively. Our team of experts dedicate themselves to one goal here at ExpertGel: making life more enjoyable. 

We want to share our fantastic product with you. Try ExpertGel out and experience the new comfort!

 

Check out the latest test from our manufacturer in Taiwan.

 

Certificates and Patents from USA, Taiwan, and more.

 

 

General foam insoles on the market last 3-6 months, while ExpertGel lasts 3-5 years. 

To save on production costs, general insole manufacturers often require consumers to trim to fit. This method limits the insole structure applications and increases the inconvenience of trimming incorrectly and risking injury.

The ExpertGel insole comes in 12 different sizes, engineered to meet the needs of everyone and provides consumers with the convenience of immediate use after purchasing and the safety of not needing to be trimmed.

 

Choosing the right size is a critical step for your best experience, the ExpertGel insole comes in 12 different sizes.

Please try not to choose by the shoe or foot size for your insoles, because:

  • Man and woman's shoe sizes are often different in many countries' system.
  • The insole size is often different than the shoe size and foot size.
  • For different shoe brands, the actual shoe sizes often vary on the same size numbers.

The most accurate way is to measure the legnth of the current insole of your shoe. Check the length on the tables  (check JP as CM or IN as inch) , and choose the right size in EU for the perks. If there are 2 fitting sizes, pick the smaller one.

If you don't have an insole to measure and would like to use the shoe size, ExpertGel's unisex styles are in men's sizing. Please covert the woman size to man size referring here.

The ExpertGel insoles are usually thicker than general insoles. Please make sure you have a little more space on top of your feet in the shoes. You may want to take the old insoles out to get more rooms before applying ExperGel.
story_txt:
In a glimpse:
 World's first patented Cylindrical Bio-Gel Structure maximizes the ability of shock absorption and comforts your feet on standing, walking, and running activities in your daily life.
Internationally approved AEGIS Antibacterial Fabric absorbs the moist of shoes and aids in the prevention of athlete's foot and foot odor.
It fits perfectly in most types of shoes, including shoes for business, sports or casual activities.
 CommutingIn most of the countries, people walk more than 4,000 steps a day, and American walks 3,000 to 4,000 steps a day (according to Statista). Many people commute with weight -- PC, smartphone, documents, wallet. Are you one of them?Health experts even suggest to walk 10,000 steps a day to get more health benefits from it.WorkingAccording to the Bureau of Labor Statistics, USA, the following chart shows that most occupations include standing and walking time of more than 4 hours per day.↑ Sitting(red) vs. standing and walking(blue) time percentage for selected occupations."Most jobs require some standing or walking and some sitting. Across all civilian jobs in 2016, workers needed to spend an average of 61.0 percent of the workday standing or walking and 39.0 percent of the workday sitting. The mix of standing versus sitting varied by the occupation. For example, waiters and waitresses spent 96.3 percent of their workday standing or walking and just 3.7 percent sitting." - Bureau of Labor StatisticsIf you are one of them, you deserve ExpertGel, the best of all. The patented ExpertGel gel insole forms an air-layered structure with excellent support, so it absorbs impact and simultaneously stimulates the soles of the feet. The following image show the shock absorption test comparing with the others.↑ Foot pressure distribution graph showing before and after using ExpertGel expert insoles, with highest pressure (dark red), lowest pressure (dark blue) while standing, walking, and running.You don't have to worry anymore about taking off the shoes in front of people in the same room. A highly breathable air layer structure with AEGIS antibacterial agent reduces bacteria's growth, with a deodorizing effect.  "It was a typical night after a long day at the office - There usually isn't much traffic at that time, so I decided to drive home. As I was driving through a cross junction, a drunk driver unknowingly ran a red light and crashed into my vehicle. I sustained some minor injuries to my lower body and recovered within a month."A few years went by, and I began noticing changes in my body, like small discomforts while walking was becoming more prevalent. It made me realize that the trauma I sustained in that accident had negatively affected my body's ability to recover to normal fully."I went on a search for a suitable sole insert to alleviate my walking discomfort. After trying out a myriad of options in the sole insert industry, I could still find one that met my needs. As a result, I decided to design and make my own sole insert instead, and ExpertGel was born."-- Chier, Founder of ExpertGel"Bio-Gel", the core material we use in our sole inserts, is biodegradable, malleable, and environmentally friendly. There are endless applications and uses for it. We have spent countless hours researching and developing Bio-Gel, since a lot of what is known out there about these materials are carefully guarded secrets. It took some time, but we have successfully incorporated this technology into our products in their developmental stages.Through stringent testing and actual test user inputs, we know that our designs are extremely efficient in reducing pain and eliminating symptoms. Today, we develop and utilize this technology extensively. Our team of experts dedicate themselves to one goal here at ExpertGel: making life more enjoyable. We want to share our fantastic product with you. Try ExpertGel out and experience the new comfort! Check out the latest test from our manufacturer in Taiwan.

 
Certificates and Patents from USA, Taiwan, and more.  General foam insoles on the market last 3-6 months, while ExpertGel lasts 3-5 years. To save on production costs, general insole manufacturers often require consumers to trim to fit. This method limits the insole structure applications and increases the inconvenience of trimming incorrectly and risking injury.The ExpertGel insole comes in 12 different sizes, engineered to meet the needs of everyone and provides consumers with the convenience of immediate use after purchasing and the safety of not needing to be trimmed. Choosing the right size is a critical step for your best experience, the ExpertGel insole comes in 12 different sizes.Please try not to choose by the shoe or foot size for your insoles, because:
Man and woman's shoe sizes are often different in many countries' system.
The insole size is often different than the shoe size and foot size.
For different shoe brands, the actual shoe sizes often vary on the same size numbers.
The most accurate way is to measure the legnth of the current insole of your shoe. Check the length on the tables  (check JP as CM or IN as inch) , and choose the right size in EU for the perks. If there are 2 fitting sizes, pick the smaller one.If you don't have an insole to measure and would like to use the shoe size, ExpertGel's unisex styles are in men's sizing. Please covert the woman size to man size referring here.The ExpertGel insoles are usually thicker than general insoles. Please make sure you have a little more space on top of your feet in the shoes. You may want to take the old insoles out to get more rooms before applying ExperGel.

story:
The story of  my Little Snowdrops

 

It all started with my wife and I being godparents to a very beautiful fair hair, blue eyes little girl, just like a little snowdrop.  As any godparents, our duty is to take care of her. We always tried to find the best products she might need and along the way of doing this, we have decided to start a baby wear line after her name. 

We, my wife and I, are using the best micro-cotton fabric to create a soft and delicate baby wear, just as a snowdrop. 

The Little Snowdrops David and Julia you see below, is just one of our creation for your little bundle of joy. We invested all our passion and soul for creating this baby wear line. 

 

 

Help us, help your baby! Let's create together a softer world for our babies.

Thank you in advance! 

Yours sincerely, 

Ioan & Corina Cucu 

B Roll provided by Videezy

 

Risks & Challenges

As any start-up project, ours is not immune to risks. Indeed, there are some risks we can foreseen and we will do our best to overcome them in order to complete the project. 
These are the risks we thought we might face during the following period: 

  • a new wave of COVID-19 might affect supply chain (e.g. delayed transport of goods) .
  • textile suppliers might go into bankruptcy due to a new corona virus wave. We will have to find new ones which will amount into delays regarding delivery.
  • inability of gathering all the needed money to start up this project.

story:
The Sea Saviors uses recycled plastic from the sea to create sandals that perfectly adapt to the foot, guaranteeing maximum comfort and breathability with sustainable production Made in Spain.






Thanks to collaboration agreements with fishermen, NGOs and ocean cleanup programmes today it is possible to recover tonnes of plastic from the ocean. Waste that is turned into reusable fibres for making products, giving this rubbish a new life.

1 kilo of plastic waste produces 1 kilo of fibre prepared to form part of new products, thereby we reuse the 100% of the plastic that has been collected.

Thanks to our production process certified by SEAQUAL™, each pair of The Sea Saviors sandals manages to reuse marine plastic equivalent to 3.9 bottles.



We are facing an emergency situation.

- Every year 8 million tonnes of plastic end up in our oceans.
- A single plastic bottle can kill over 100 marine lives.
- Plastic litter may not decompose for 500 years.

Small decisions like choosing an eco-friendly product or saying no to single-use plastic makes a huge difference for the future of our planet. One pair of The Sea Saviors sandals can help recycling approximately 3.9 plastic bottles from our oceans. Be the change!



Join our project and get our sandals made with recycled marine plastic.

The Sea Saviors Limited Edition is an exclusive Indiegogo collection, and the colours available will not be on sale in stores.


 

The marine plastic contained in our sandals is certified by SEAQUAL™.

SEAQUAL™ FIBER is a premium 100% recycled PES fiber made in part from plastic marine waste.

SEAQUAL™ FIBER can only be bought or sold by companies that have signed a SEAQUAL™ TMLA. The licensing system ensures material traceability from polymer to finished product and fabric certification.




 

We produce our sandals in one of the places with the greatest tradition in shoe manufacturing in Spain: Alicante. A production that complies with all the requirements established by European regulations. Suitable installations, fair wages, compliance with working hours...

For us, a quality product requires production of equal quality that is sustainable and respects the workers in each part of the process.

Our factory also meets all the requirements established by our certified supplier of recycled marine plastic yarn, SEAQUAL™, guaranteeing a suitable process in line with strict production parameters.


We achieve much more! Our great motivation is to eliminate plastics from our oceans. That is why we will be donating a percentage of the total amount obtained from Indiegogo to THE OCEAN CLEANUP, an organisation that has developed a specific device for large-scale cleanup and collection of plastics in the oceans.

story:
Short Summary

More and more people are becoming aware of the challenges presented to our planet, and looking to consume more ethically. This product is a result of that same preoccupation. We, as friends try to live by that moto, and basically tried to create a pair of boots for ourselves! 

We know that a lot of people thinks like us, so, why not share this creation with the rest of the world?

Our aim is to create a product that is cruelty-free, sustainable, recyclable and fair! 

You can wear them in different contexts, and yes, our model is for males and females:

story:
日本語

 

 

 

 

 
 
 

 

 

 

 

With 8 pressure sensors embedded in the back panel, ZyneGo learns the pressure distribution across your back

 

 

The sophisticated sensors monitor pressure distribution, weight and time frame in real time. Check the adjustment suggestions on the companion APP.

 

 

 

Correctly adjusting the straps is key to having a pleasant wearing experience.

The ZyneGo app provides a customized animation strategy just for you. All you need to do is follow the steps.

 

 

Adjustable Torso-length

When the adjustable torso length matches the correct size, the hip-belt strap and the foam are at just the right place on your waist which allows the backpack's panel couture to your body perfectly.

 

 

Tuck the Hip belt

Wear the detachable hip belt to distribute most of the load to your waist and hip. 

 

 

Straps Adjustment

Follow the animation guide on APP to adjust the straps and feel up to 80% Lighter instantly.

 

 

ZyneGo uses deep learning algorithms to analyze the data to learn your everyday wearing habits and create the best adjustment strategy for you. 

 

 

 

  

The ZyneGo app generates regular summary of backpacking style and habits to Provide you the suggestions for raising good posture.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ZyneGo uses the customized 900D Nylon fabric with the durable water repellent coating and SBS waterproof zip to withstand the storm.

 

 

Yes, it carries stuff—a lot of stuff. The backpack is spacious enough for all of your essentials. It's your mobile studio on the go.

 

 

 

 

 

The interchangeable modular design offers the ultimate organization and flexibility for your life.

 

 

 

With the TSA ready laptop pocket, it will be so much easier when you go through the security.

Just a quick pullout from your ZyneGo and it will protect your laptop from scratch and collision.

 

 

Another best design for travelers, clamshell opening helps you get to gear easily and quickly. No matter you are in a hurry to pack for travel or trying to fit your camera set, ZyneGo can do it all.

 

 

The ergonomic design of ZyneGo transfer most load of the backpack to your waist and chest in order to provide you ultimate back protection.

 

 

Fix the straps so it won’t move.With the luggage pass-through design, simply slide ZyneGo onto the luggage handles, free your shoulder, and enjoy your trip.  

 

 

No more worries about losing your water bottles, the expandable side pocket can protect your personal items and can be hidden with the zipper when you do not use it.

 

 

No need to worry about lost your keys, with this crab and go key chain design, it is incredibly safe and convenient to keep your keys safe. 

Free your hand and pocket, relax and do more. 

 

 

 

With the customized waterproof zip and anti-theft design, ZyneGo is safe and sound whenever you go.

 

 

 

 

With the sim-card zipper on ZyneGo, feel free to go anywhere and no worry to lose your sim-card.

It even has the sim-card tray remover that helps you to switch sim-card no matter where you are in the world. 

 

 

One of the most humanization features on ZyneGo. With the sunglass pocket, you can switch easily from outdoor to indoor. Not only can protect your glasses from scratch but also save the space in your backpack. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

   

 

 

 

 

 

ZyneGo features the best possible materials for a backpack regardless of its cost. We applied customized 900D nylon with waterproof coating, and for more durability, the backpack also features waterproof zips.

We researched many factories in China since the country is a great option for the supply chain. China has plenty of resources to produce high-quality products in large quantities. After some deliberation, we finally decided to cooperate with a leading factory based in  ShiLing, Guangdong province which is known for “China's capital of leather goods”.

 

 

 

We are having the best factory manufacturing the high-quality backpack possible on the market. ZyneGo focuses on quality control of our product and wishes to provide the ultimate everyday use backpack on the market. We want the superior quality to help you use better with those incredible features on ZyneGo in multiple using the environment. At ZyneGo, we want everything to be the best.

 

 

 

We are proud to be a member of The Conservation Alliance, an organization whose mission is to engage businesses to fund and partner with organizations to protect wild places for their habitat and recreation values. We play an active role in helping them identify and fund organizations working to permanently protect our most precious landscapes.

Since its inception in 1989, the Alliance has contributed more than $20 million to grassroots conservation groups throughout North America. The results of their funding have been remarkable. Alliance funding has helped save 51 million acres of wildlands; protect 3,107 miles of rivers; stop or remove 34 dams; designate five marine reserves; and purchase 14 climbing areas. Together with them, we will do more for our nature.

 

 

Русский репортаж

     

Báo cáo tiếng việt

한국 보고서

 

 

 

 

※ Please note that all prices are in USD or HKD（Please Check the perk below. Due to your region settings or IP address, you might see prices in different currency when you check out.


※ An additional international transaction fee may occur during the payment, please check with the bank on how to eliminate/avoid this fee.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Everything started with a survey

In April of 2019, the ZyneGo team sent a survey to 100 backpack users around the world asking about their most-wanted features in a backpack. We never expected we would receive so much support and so, so many responses.

Most of the users placed the comfort and durability of their backpack as the most important feature.

 

 

It was this feedback that confirmed the notion that we needed to create a smart backpack that was extremely comfortable (and also stylish).

Thank you, ZyneGo community

In May of 2019, we built our own community to learn even more about what backpackers wanted in the perfect backpack. Now, there are over 2000 backpackers in the community.

Their support means the world to us—truly—without them, we could have never made the ZyneGo the awesome backpack that it is.

 

 

Check out these incredible features that were created by our fantastic community members!

 

 

ABOUT US

 

 

ZyneGo is a global team of designers, database engineers, and programmers based in Hong Kong, Singapore, Shenzhen, and San Francisco.

We love hanging around and exploring our respective cities, as well as trying high-tech gadgets and learning new things. Our goal was to make our busy, on-the-go lives healthier and easier.

Nowadays, everything is smart and has sensors. AI tech has changed our lives and made the things around us an extension of ourselves. We realized that if we could have smartphones, and smart homes, and smart toothbrushes, why couldn’t we have a smart backpack that learns and helps us to enjoy a healthier life and explore more in our life.

That’s why we made the ZyneGo,  a professional, compact and comfortable everyday backpack that improves every time you wear it.

But we didn’t just stop there.

To learn more about what our users want, we built a global community. This backpack is designed especially for each member of our community. Without their spirited conversations, we could never realize the ZyneGo Backpack.

After months of testing and countless modifications, the ZyneGo is finally just about ready to meet you all. We built it as a functional and durable backpack with deep learning tech. 

We are lucky to have tried the ZyneGo before anyone else, and we are thrilled by how great it is. It is the backpack we always wanted, and we can’t wait to share it with all of you. Support us today and try the wonderful ZyneGo Backpack. It will make all your future journeys better.

story:
What is Citytube?

The Citytube is a backpack in a new form. The first collection target is to be the more practical as possible in the allday needs.
It means, things that everyone needs in the allday at fast and easy reach.
Smartphones that get bigger and bigger can't find place in the pockets anymore,
Wallets derange in the back pocket and keys are never where you think they are.
For these reasons and more was the citytube designed.
Tru the special form from the citytube and tru extra specific inside pockets
you have the important things to you at an easy and fast reach.

The city tube is divided in two parts.
First you have a front pocket. In it you find: your keys hanging at a rollmatic key chaine system. With this system you can grab your keys in two moves , open your door and let them disapear in to your citytube as fast.
You don't need to search your keys again they will be hanging in your citytube.
The next compartment has the mass up to 5" wide to stow phones easily.
The last compartment can be used for the wallet. And Tablets till 7" find their place
directly in the front pocket.
The Citytube has another large pocket which is located on the back.
In it you can put a umbrella or clothing such as shirts, or even a keyboard.
The belt is adjustable and can vary at will and requires, tighter or wider.

      


Features

Your most important things you carry in Citytube always in your vision field.
This makes it difficult for pickpockets and other to steal your stuff.
Thus smartphone, keys and wallet are always well protected and also always ready to hand. If you are standing at a casse and you need your wallet , you do not need to take off the bag. You also do not need to rotate it forward, or get in a confusing bag search.
Open the front zipper pocket, pull out your wallet from the intended compartment and pay. So just like with the locked door, or the phone ringing.
The Citytube will be designet, developed and manufactured in Switzerland. It is a 100% Swiss Made product.



Goals

The first objective is to produce a series in three different materials.
Normal backpack fabric, Neopren and Kevlar. A Citytube Kevlar would provide further protection for the person, since a large part of the upper body is automatically covered by the shape of Citytube.
Next, various colors for interior and exterior materials would be available in order to obtain an individual bag.
The Citytube is also sold through an online store, in which it will be possible via a configurator to put together your citytube individually.
By adding other materials and colors more variations are possible.
As a final goal different models will be offered. As an example, one version for 10" Tablet. On this model the bag is extended on the back and comes with a hard case.


Status

A first prototype is produced. About 45 minutes drive away is a company focusing on the production of specialized bags and protective clothing. First contacts have already taken place.
The company tailors will do a professional prototype with all the changes and requirements that have already been collected.
In addition, professional CAD drawings and patterns will be created.
The next step would be already the production of the 1st Series to be able to send you your Citytube as soon as possible.
story_txt:
What is Citytube?The Citytube is a backpack in a new form. The first collection target is to be the more practical as possible in the allday needs.It means, things that everyone needs in the allday at fast and easy reach.Smartphones that get bigger and bigger can't find place in the pockets anymore, Wallets derange in the back pocket and keys are never where you think they are.For these reasons and more was the citytube designed.Tru the special form from the citytube and tru extra specific inside pockets you have the important things to you at an easy and fast reach.The city tube is divided in two parts.First you have a front pocket. In it you find: your keys hanging at a rollmatic key chaine system. With this system you can grab your keys in two moves , open your door and let them disapear in to your citytube as fast.You don't need to search your keys again they will be hanging in your citytube.The next compartment has the mass up to 5" wide to stow phones easily.The last compartment can be used for the wallet. And Tablets till 7" find their placedirectly in the front pocket.The Citytube has another large pocket which is located on the back.In it you can put a umbrella or clothing such as shirts, or even a keyboard.The belt is adjustable and can vary at will and requires, tighter or wider.


       



FeaturesYour most important things you carry in Citytube always in your vision field.This makes it difficult for pickpockets and other to steal your stuff.Thus smartphone, keys and wallet are always well protected and also always ready to hand. If you are standing at a casse and you need your wallet , you do not need to take off the bag. You also do not need to rotate it forward, or get in a confusing bag search. Open the front zipper pocket, pull out your wallet from the intended compartment and pay. So just like with the locked door, or the phone ringing. The Citytube will be designet, developed and manufactured in Switzerland. It is a 100% Swiss Made product.GoalsThe first objective is to produce a series in three different materials.Normal backpack fabric, Neopren and Kevlar. A Citytube Kevlar would provide further protection for the person, since a large part of the upper body is automatically covered by the shape of Citytube.Next, various colors for interior and exterior materials would be available in order to obtain an individual bag.The Citytube is also sold through an online store, in which it will be possible via a configurator to put together your citytube individually. By adding other materials and colors more variations are possible.As a final goal different models will be offered. As an example, one version for 10" Tablet. On this model the bag is extended on the back and comes with a hard case.
StatusA first prototype is produced. About 45 minutes drive away is a company focusing on the production of specialized bags and protective clothing. First contacts have already taken place.The company tailors will do a professional prototype with all the changes and requirements that have already been collected.In addition, professional CAD drawings and patterns will be created. The next step would be already the production of the 1st Series to be able to send you your Citytube as soon as possible.

story:
Redefining Function with Fashion 

A phone is not merely just a phone. It is no longer a functional device to just make and receive calls. Ironically, it is not bound to what an almighty smartphone is capable of doing. A phone is more than that.

A phone is a fashion statement.  


Meet HOST and CHARISM- the perfect duo that blends innovation and fashion.

HOST is a platform that houses CHARISM; a iPhone HOST is a phone case that will hold charms using patent pending magnetic twist to lock.  It’s time to get notice!




iPhone Host : The Sleek iPhone Case

iPhone HOST is a fine piece uniting 1.5mm thin bumper with 2.5mm magnetic slide platform. The 1.5mm neodymium magnet is mounted firmly on the 0.5mm stainless steel plate at the back of the case that will not disrupt the built-in compass.

iPhone HOST is also designed to ensure its compatibility with iPhone 5s dual LED flash light through its precise measurement for a camera window. The side buttons come with rubber extension for easy access to the volume & power buttons. 

iPhone HOST is made of High Grade Polycarbonate and Anodised Stainless Steel with UV & Scratch Resistance coating.

CHARISM : More Than Just a Charm


CHARISM is the line of charms that will attach to HOST with a patent pending magnetic twist to lock. CHARISM - the name is a combination of our company’s name, Charis with charms. CHARISM also means the ‘gift of God’.

We at CharisCalais Limited aim to create fashionable and creative CHARISM with great flexibility to attach to HOST in any way you like.

                                             THE CHARISM STAND TOOLS


The BiG "Ta-Da": So how did the idea come along?

"GET AN AWESOME IPHONE CASE!" That was what came to the creators’ minds when Jason, Suzie and Peggy first got their iPhone 5.

Jason wanted something cool and functional. Suzie and Peggy wanted a case that is fashionable to match their clothes. So Jason bought a £26 durable-looking case, Suzie got a £40 branded rubber-made case while Peggy customised hers within a £20 budget. Merely a week after, they got bored with these “one-timer” and wonder why they need to get a new case to give their phones a different.

Why can’t we have one that’s modifiable to be unique, irreplaceable and yet exclusive? The bottom line is: Why can’t we have ONE that fits all?

From there, they know exactly what the people needs but lacks of. They know fashion and trends never stop changing. "We want to create a multipurpose platform that suits all men & women!".

And the journey began...

Upon graduating from Manchester Metropolitan University, the creators were nervous yet excited. They want to make this vision comes true using all the knowledge gained from their Masters.

It is not easy to create a new platform that allows jewellery and functional accessories attached to the oh-so-common smartphone- the iPhone. Different ideas came and went. Every possible considerations and aspects were looked into to make sure that they have given their best.

The video above is the N's prototypes that the team had produced. It is by far the best yet!



PERKS : Some humble return from us 



Project Milestone : Where are we now?

Stretch goals: We wish to offer more!

How The Project Funds Will Be Used?

We will need at least £44,000 to make sure all the functions below are fulfilled. All the funds will go directly into R&D and manufacturing of the HOST and CHARISM including:


The Impact

We had put in a lot of efforts and money into R&D. We have faith in creating and delivering the best product to our backers and customers. We will continue to strive for a better quality and service until the minute we send HOST and CHARISM to your doorstep.

Unlike many established company with huge funds to invest, we are just a young start-up entrepreneurs with limited funds. Our ultimate goal is to bring innovation, fashion and function together. Hence, we need funds to continue the R&D and manufacturing.

•  We are not only building a project but an entire new innovation through "CharisCalais" to ease and beautify your daily life. 

•  We will never stop creating new HOST and CHARISM.

•  We pledge to create new CHARISM regularly for your HOST. 


Cheers!! Thank you!!! Backers!!!!

We would like to thank every backers for your support and contribution. Not forgetting those who shared and liked our Facebook, Twitter and Indiegogo pages too. No matter how small or big the contribution is, we are sincerely grateful and thank you.

For questions regarding our products, please feel free to email us: info@chariscalais.co.uk. Press inquiries: suzie@chariscalais.co.uk


FAQ

1. When will HOST & CHARISM be ready for shipment?

HOST and CHARISM are currently in final prototype phase. We have already made contact with reputable and trustable manufactures. This crowd funding campaign is meant to raise funds toward the production. Our goal is to have HOST and CHARISM ship by March of 2014. 

2. Why only HOST for iPhone 5/5s?

With the goal amount stated above we are only able to produce Tooling & Mould for one type of smartphone. However we are open to suggestion and once the volumes allowed we will definitely produce more varieties to bring HOST & CHARISM to your palm.  

2. Material used?

HOST for iPhone 5/5s - Sabic Lexan Polycarbonate Resin, UV and Scratch Resistance coating and Anodised Stainless Steel. 

CHARISM - Silver Plating, Neodymium Magnet and enamel. Stones and Sterling Silver only available after stretch goal due to the production cost.

3. How do i pick my favourite CHARISM? 

Don't worry, we will send out a detailed survey/email after the campaign to pick your favorite Host & CHARISM.

4. How do I add the shipping cost for international orders?

We only provide free shipping within UK. For international contributor, kindly add the amount specified in the perk description. Local import taxes may apply.

5. I contributed to a perk but I forgot to add the extra amount for shipping. How can I increase the amount?

No problem! If you'd like to add funds for shipping, you can make another contribution and select "No Perk, Just a Contribution." then insert the shipping amount.

6. Can I get more than one of each Perks?

Yes, simply multiply your perks and then enter the correct amount. 2 x £39 " The iPhone 5/5s HOST " = £78 for shipping to UK. Add £10 for international shipping = £88. etc..

7. Why set a £44,000 goal?

We have made contact with the manufacturers. Unlike many established company with huge funds to produce their product, we are a young start-up company with limited funds. Only with a minimum amount of £44,000 that we would be able to mass produce HOST and CHARISM. To offer the final product at a competitive price, we need to produce sufficient quantity to bring the unit costs down.

8. I can’t get my payment work through Paypal, what should I do?

Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com . They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.


Special Thanks to Devonn Lee & Stevan Lee!


ONCE AGAIN. THANK YOU!

   APPLE IS NOT A PARTICIPENT OR SPONSOR OF THIS PRODUCT AND  PROMOTIONS.

story:
System of Thinking: The Return

Hi! My name is James, I began a little project called System of Thinking in April 2011. It was an ethical clothing label and it was something that grew to exceed all my expectations. For many reasons, including my own sanity I had to shelve it in early 2013 to make way for other things. But many people have supported System of Thinking and expressed interest in seeing it return so I owe it to them to make it happen.

If you decide to contribute to this campaign to see System of Thinking raise from the ashes, you'll not only get the opportunity to support a small, independent and ethical business but you'll also have the option to own some limited and tasty exclusives.

It's over to you, let's make 2015 the year of System of Thinking.

What We Need & What You Can Get

£500 is the target, this will just about cover the costs of getting us up and running once more, printing and creating. There are a few perks to consider if you're thinking of getting involved. There is a chance to grab a limited edition Hope & Unity shirt in a fresh colour, a limited edition screenprint celebrating the return of System of Thinking and of course an option to get some stickers & badges... alternatively you can grab the whole lot in one package!

The Impact

In a world plagued by the ratrace for profit, System of Thinking is about creating inspiring, uplifting and important messages through art and placing them on ethical and environmentally friendly garments so you have the choice to shop independently, ethically and consciously.

Other Ways You Can Help

Get the word out, that's the most important aspect of this. It's what System of Thinking was built on. Tell the world and keep the message going.

story:
A high-performance retro-reflective backpack made from “CORDURA” fabric and built to reflect light even in the darkest times

 

There are many ordinary backpacks in the world created with various types of fabric.

 

There are also many types of reflective backpacks in the world.

 

But there are no backpacks in the world like LetMeLight-A backpack created entirely from retro-reflective fabric that offers high visibility and utmost safety.

 

 

 

 

 

Normal at Day, Reflective at Night

With its high presenting retro-reflective technology, our backpacks appear as regular backpacks during the day, but they transform and illuminate its magical reflection during night.

 

 

FULLY Reflective

Unlike many reflective backpacks that have a tape or film sewed on, the whole backpack is reflective--approximately 13 TIMES more reflective than regular reflective fabric.

 

 

Created for Your Safety

The 100% highly visible retro reflectivity ensures safety for riders, delivery drivers, and anyone who could be difficult to see in the dark.

 

 

High Quality Material

Fusiontex is created with cordura fabric-- a fabric widely used by many other high end backpack manufacturers. We are also the only reflective backpack in the world created with cordura fabric.

 

 

Fashionable

All reflective backpacks only allow a silver or gray color line because they coat their reflectivity with aluminum coating. LetMeLight, however, collaborates with cordura fabric to produce retro-reflective fabric utilizing the patented coating technology. INNO10 can make backpacks of any color with this special technology.

(This version will only include a black color; however, we plan on manufacturing different colors for future campaigns based on backers' feedback and comments.)

 

 

Comfortable

Experience breathability on a backpack like never before because the retro-reflective has premium air permeability--something that normal reflective tape does not have.

 

 

Easily Accessible

With various pockets and multiple functions, you can easily access any of your items in LetMeLight while maintaining a simplistic and minimal design.

 

 

 

Retro-reflection is the reflection that reflects light back to its source with a minimum of scattering.

By using a special printing technology, INNO10 was able to coat the glass beads directly on top of the fabric and film to create retro-reflectivity. Unlike most other reflective fabrics, INNO10's unique printing technology coats the glass beads directly on top of the fabric--something that no other company can do. Thanks to this technology, INNO10's retro-reflective fabric is highly breathable and can be used in apparel products as well. 

 

The mirrored side of the countless glass beads inserted into the fiber tissue reflects it directly as a light source.

 

 

 

 

Most reflective fabric uses a reflective tape (3M) or film and it is applied to the garment or backpack. During the day, the tape can be visibly seen, and it can be visually unappealing. Also, this type of reflection can only be produced in a silver colorway. The type of fabric that can be used to produce this reflective technology is also very limited. 

 

On the other hand, retro-reflective fabric by INNO10 is applied onto the entire backpack. It can function as a completely normal appearing backpack during the day, then transform into a highly reflective backpack at night. Our retro-reflective fabric can also be produced in many different colors and still exhibit the same level of retro reflection.  

Because we are directly applying it on fabric, we are able to produce high quality breathable and washable apparel as well.  

 

Reflective vs. Retro-Reflective Direct Comparison

 

 

 

Everyone is looking to pack their desired products, but no one enjoys a bulky backpack. With multiple pockets and wide space, LetMeLight will fit whatever you desire without it looking overwhelmingly bulky.

 

Easy Access Laptop & Tablet Pocket

You can fit up to a 13 inch laptop and seal it shut with the velcro seal to ensure maximum protection for your electronic goods.

 

 

Organization

LetMeLight has amazing organization options with plenty of extra pockets in each area of the backpack to ensure the most optimal space for our wearers. We experimented and tested the design for months to achieve the most ideal configuration that will get our users the most out of these pockets.

 

 

Nylon Zipper

The usage of Nylon zippers makes the backpack stronger than ever--you don’t have to worry about the zippers ever becoming a problem.

 

 

High Quality Water Bottle Pockets

Two mesh water bottle pockets have been added to carry around any water bottle or tumbler of your choice. You can even use it to carry around your umbrella.

 

 

Compression Strap OR Strap for Extra Gear--You Choose

Compression straps to help make your backpack less bulky and can also be used as an attachment to any bulky item you want to carry around.

 

 

Adjustable Sternum Chest Strap

No matter how big or small you are, the adjustable sternum strap makes it easy to maximize your comfort while wearing LetMeLight.

 

 

Ergonomically Designed Back & Shoulder Straps

The soft yet comfortable foam in the back keeps your back cool and dry while wearing LetMeLight at all times. The shoulder strap was also ergonomically designed to allow maximum comfort while wearing the backpack.

 

 

Unisex Design

LetMeLight was designed for both genders, so anybody can rock LetMeLight--literally!

 

 

 

 

LetMeLight wasn’t created with simply any type of fabric. It was created with the highest quality cordura fabric, and we can boast saying we are the world’s first and only backpack to use Cordura fabric and make it retro-reflective.

 

Benefits of Cordura Fabric

Cordura is approximately…
 

  • Ten times more durable than cotton fabric
  • Three times more durable than polyester fabric
  • Two times more durable than nylon fabric
  • Cordura fabric is 25% lighter than polyester fabric.
  • Cordura fabric is water-resistant and does not change colors.
  • Cordura is a synthetic material, so it’s built to last with its high tensile strength fibers and will withstand long term wear.
     

We could have chosen any other type of fabric, but we chose Cordura after experimenting and testing for many months to provide the highest quality product possible to our backers.

 

 

 

The highly advanced retro-reflective fabric has received interest even in the fashion industry, successfully leading to collaborations and partnerships with high-performing companies, such as H&M, The North Face and FedEx. 

INNO10 is also working with the Seoul Metropolitan Government in South Korea to create a revolutionary workwear for the streets with extravagant safety measures.

 

 

 

 Want LetMeLight, but a more compact version? We bring to you LetMeLight's very own sling bag! 

 

 With sling bags and fanny packs becoming the most recent new trend, your LetMeLight sling bag will carry all the same technology--just in a miniature version!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Established in 2015, INNO10 specializes in producing retro-reflective fabric. Our company’s mission has always been to strive to have the utmost highest quality when it comes to retro-reflective fabric. We wanted to not only ensure safety through retro-reflection, but we also wanted to showcase visual appeal with our products as well.  We were able to successfully develop an invisible type retro-reflective fabric back in November of 2017, and we were able to advance to open up our own factory in December of 2019.

Over the years, we’ve partnered with major fashion brands, such as H&M, The North Face, Jansport, Vans and Timberland to deliver the highest quality reflective fabric.

During our research, we’ve noticed that there are many retro-reflective backpacks, but most of them were attached with 3M tape, and often looked visually unappealing. By being able to uniquely apply the glass beads directly onto the fabric, we were able to apply retro-reflection on an ordinary looking backpack with the high quality Cordura fabric, so it would look like a regular backpack during the day, and it would reflect the light at night. We now present to you “LetMeLight” -- the world’s first and only retro-reflective backpack created from Cordura fabric. The journey also doesn’t stop here. We are planning on expanding to hats, clothes and other various apparel products so we hope you will join us on this fun and exciting journey.
