We experimented and tested the design for months to achieve the most ideal configuration that will get our users the most out of these pockets.  Nylon ZipperThe usage of Nylon zippers makes the backpack stronger than ever--you don’t have to worry about the zippers ever becoming a problem.  High Quality Water Bottle PocketsTwo mesh water bottle pockets have been added to carry around any water bottle or tumbler of your choice. You can even use it to carry around your umbrella.  Compression Strap OR Strap for Extra Gear--You ChooseCompression straps to help make your backpack less bulky and can also be used as an attachment to any bulky item you want to carry around.  Adjustable Sternum Chest StrapNo matter how big or small you are, the adjustable sternum strap makes it easy to maximize your comfort while wearing LetMeLight.  Ergonomically Designed Back & Shoulder StrapsThe soft yet comfortable foam in the back keeps your back cool and dry while wearing LetMeLight at all times. The shoulder strap was also ergonomically designed to allow maximum comfort while wearing the backpack.  Unisex DesignLetMeLight was designed for both genders, so anybody can rock LetMeLight--literally!    LetMeLight wasn’t created with simply any type of fabric. It was created with the highest quality cordura fabric, and we can boast saying we are the world’s first and only backpack to use Cordura fabric and make it retro-reflective. Benefits of Cordura FabricCordura is approximately… 
Ten times more durable than cotton fabric
Three times more durable than polyester fabric
Two times more durable than nylon fabric
Cordura fabric is 25% lighter than polyester fabric.
Cordura fabric is water-resistant and does not change colors.
Cordura is a synthetic material, so it’s built to last with its high tensile strength fibers and will withstand long term wear. 
We could have chosen any other type of fabric, but we chose Cordura after experimenting and testing for many months to provide the highest quality product possible to our backers.   The highly advanced retro-reflective fabric has received interest even in the fashion industry, successfully leading to collaborations and partnerships with high-performing companies, such as H&M, The North Face and FedEx. INNO10 is also working with the Seoul Metropolitan Government in South Korea to create a revolutionary workwear for the streets with extravagant safety measures.    Want LetMeLight, but a more compact version? We bring to you LetMeLight's very own sling bag!   With sling bags and fanny packs becoming the most recent new trend, your LetMeLight sling bag will carry all the same technology--just in a miniature version!        Established in 2015, INNO10 specializes in producing retro-reflective fabric. Our company’s mission has always been to strive to have the utmost highest quality when it comes to retro-reflective fabric. We wanted to not only ensure safety through retro-reflection, but we also wanted to showcase visual appeal with our products as well.  We were able to successfully develop an invisible type retro-reflective fabric back in November of 2017, and we were able to advance to open up our own factory in December of 2019.Over the years, we’ve partnered with major fashion brands, such as H&M, The North Face, Jansport, Vans and Timberland to deliver the highest quality reflective fabric.During our research, we’ve noticed that there are many retro-reflective backpacks, but most of them were attached with 3M tape, and often looked visually unappealing. By being able to uniquely apply the glass beads directly onto the fabric, we were able to apply retro-reflection on an ordinary looking backpack with the high quality Cordura fabric, so it would look like a regular backpack during the day, and it would reflect the light at night. We now present to you “LetMeLight” -- the world’s first and only retro-reflective backpack created from Cordura fabric. The journey also doesn’t stop here. We are planning on expanding to hats, clothes and other various apparel products so we hope you will join us on this fun and exciting journey.

story:
Hier klicken für die deutsche Version!


A better belt

I've had several belts in my life that I've loved and all of them have broken my heart when they fell apart. Seams popped, belt-loops fell off. I was a sad puppy.

It takes quite a long time to break a belt in properly, to mold it to your body and have it develop a patina.

If you've ever had something for a long time, you know how attached you get to this kind of item. Some of these belts, I wore every day for years and when they broke I was devastated.

Most belts I found in shops seem to either be made of plastic or intended for a rodeo.

After going through too many belt shaped atrocities to keep track of I had enough and didn't want another belt to just hang in the closet or go with that one pair of shoes I have.

I wanted The belt. The one belt to rule them all.


How cool is it to still have your grandfather's military jacket or his amazing tools? We love those things because they come with a story.


How we built the Tinkerbelt

It took me a long time but in the end I found an old Swedish army belt, that had been lying in someone's basement since World War II.

It wasn't perfect but it served as the inspiration to build something truly awesome.

I hit google and started looking for someone who could help me get my idea out of my head and onto my hips.

I live in Vienna, Austria and luckily we still have some amazing traditional workshops here that make beautiful handmade goods.

I spoke to dozens of people until I found Thomas. He is the young and passionate head of Karlinger, a traditional leather workshop that feels like it belongs to a different age.

Karlinger has been making suspenders and belts for over 60 years and Thomas as the young successor of this esteemed legacy has been instrumental in bringing the Tinkerbelt to life.

THE DESIGN

We adopted the indented lines and the folded back part of the Swedish army belt but changed the layout and outline of the belt to better fit our vision. The curved tip mirrors the bottom of the Tinker logo and the additional belt holes give you more flexibility when choosing a size.

The undyed leather is extremely important because it allows you to create the look of the belt while wearing it.

The patina and scratches are going to be uniquely yours and the belt will tell your story.

This belt isn't right for everyone, it comes to you raw and changes with wear.

We could offer a dyed version to appeal to more people but we won't because this is the belt we wanted to make.

You finish it by wearing it.



The leather is going to change dramatically over the lifetime of the belt and go from the initial sand color all the way to a deep brown. Just a couple of weeks wearing it will change it to a warm honey color.

But since it’s yours, you decide if that is what you want. Experiment: take some leather milk, beeswax or boot-fat and it becomes a different belt immediately.

We are going to include a piece of scrap leather with every belt so you can try your hand at dying, carving or painting the leather to your hearts content.

Since the buckle and screws are removable they won’t get in the way of your creative efforts and can of course be replaced with different ones if you so choose.

We designed it to last longer than the average lifespan so that your story, the life lived and embedded in the belt, lives on.

We are making a belt that you can be proud of, that you would choose over any other belt out there and that you will enjoy wearing every day.

This belt is made to be a companion, a record, a heirloom and a gift.

We are adventurers and we like to share our stories. Whether it's time you slapped a T-Rex or when you had to deal with a more urban threat like the common bouncer. The marks on your belt will be the record of your life. Your autobiography will be holding your pants up.

We have the prototypes and they're amazing but now we need your help to fund the first real production run.


THE LEATHER


The Tinkerbelt is made from full grain vegetable-tanned leather.

The process of tanning leather with vegetable tannins is a tradition that has been passed down from generation to generation of leather craftsmen. It is the classical method that gives the most beautiful results as it gives the leather unique characteristics. The tanning takes place in wooden drums, at a slow pace that allows the natural tanning acids found, in tree barks and leaves, to give the leather its warm light-brown hue, and a natural, woody smell.

In comparison to the other two popular tanning methods, which make use of harsh chemicals such as chromium and aldehyde, the vegetable tanning process takes considerably longer. While the other two methods take only one or two days, the veg-tanning takes months (sometimes as long as one year) but is an environment-friendly method and the result is a beautiful, all-natural leather.

The 4mm thick full grain leather ensures that this belt will outlast any other belt you may have in your closet. Full grain refers to leather that has not been sanded, buffed, or snuffed to remove natural marks on the surface of the hide. The grain that remains gives the fibers strength and durability. This also means the leather is more resistant to moisture, as the grain allows it to breathe.

The natural, warm toned leather makes for the ideal material for any long lasting accessory. Rather than getting worn out, it develops an amazing patina and looks better with age.

This leather does have some disadvantages, the top two being the long production time and the high price but the benefits far outweigh the costs and make it clearly the best choice.

These two images, found at www.leathermilk.com, show how beautiful veg tan leather gets with age and use.

SIZING


The Tinkerbelt will be available in the sizes 85cm, 90cm, 95cm, 100cm, 105cm, 110cm, 115cm. Measured from the middle hole to the buckle.

Most peoples body changes over the years and I know from experience that I’m no exception. So if we are going to make a belt that lasts for a lifetime, we have to account for those changes in the design of the belt. That is why the Tinkerbelt has 10 belt holes instead of the usual 5-7. We want you to be able to actually wear it as long as it lasts. With 10 holes you have some extra leeway up and down.

Measure your waist or your belt from the most used hole to the middle of the buckle and pick the right belt from our sizing chart.

(Everyone who chose one or more Tinkerbelts as their reward will be asked what size or sizes they want after the campaign has ended.)


WHAT WE WILL DO WITH YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS

With a successfully funded campaign we have enough money to afford our first real production run of the Tinkerbelt. We can order the screws, buckles and leather we need for the first order and pay Thomas and his Team at Karlinger who have so far been working for free.

It’s going to take several weeks for the leather and buckles to arrive so we can start to make the belts. That's why we’re very eager to get going as fast as possible.

The first production belts will be shipped directly to you, our Indiegogo Backers, as soon as they are ready.


OUR 100 YEAR GUARANTEE

We did everything we could think of to make sure this is the last belt you will ever need or want.

In fact we are so sure of it’s lasting power that we will replace any belt that doesn’t last at least 100 years of regular use.

As long as you use it for its intended purpose, as a belt, we will replace any Tinkerbelt that doesn't last at least 100 Years.


REWARDS

Here’s the loot my friends.

First and foremost we are offering the Tinkerbelt that you guys are helping us bring to life as rewards. As a thank your for your support Indiegogo backers are able to get the Tinkerbelt an average discount of 40€ per belt compared to the post campaign price.

Additionally we have some Indiegogo exclusive rewards for you in the form of the Tinker Keychain, Tinker Wallet and the Tinkerbelt Guitar Strap.



Thank you for your interest and support! You can help us tremendously by sharing our campaign with your friends!


German Campaign.

Deutsche Kampagne

Ein besserer Gürtel

Ich habe in meinem Leben einige Gürtel gehabt die ich wirklich geliebt habe und sie haben mir alle irgendwann das Herz gebrochen als sie auseinander gefallen sind. Egal ob die Nähte geplatzt sind oder die Schlaufen sich verabschiedet haben, ich immer sehr enttäuscht.

Es dauert ziemlich lange einen Gürtel richtig einzutragen, bis er sich deinem Körper anpasst und eine schöne Patina entwickelt.

Wenn du jemals etwas für lange Zeit in deinem Leben hattest dann weißt du wie sehr man, am Schluss, an diesen Gegenständen hängt.

Die meisten Gürtel die ich in Geschäften gefunden habe waren entweder aus Plastik oder sahen aus als ob Sie fürs Rodeo gedacht waren.

Nachdem ich mich durch unzählige Furcht erregende Gürtelatrappen gekämpft habe, hatte ich endlich genug. Ich will nicht noch einen Gürtel zum in den Schrank hängen oder der zu dem einen Paar Schuhe passt.

Ich will DEN GÜRTEL!

Den einen Gürtel auf den ich mich verlassen kann und der mich immer begleitet.

Wie cool ist es immer noch die Armee Jacke oder das Werkzeug von deinem Großvater zu haben? Wir lieben diese Sachen weil sie eine Geschichte haben.

Wie wir den Tinkerbelt gebaut haben

Es hat eine weile gedauert aber am Ende bin ich auf einen alten 2. Weltkriegsgürtel der schwedischen Armee gestossen.

Er war nicht perfekt aber er hat als Inspiration gedient um etwas wirklich großartiges zu bauen.

Ich habe mit Hilfe von Google angefangen nach jemandem zu suchen der mir dabei helfen kann diese Idee aus meinem Kopf und auf meine Hüfte zu bringen.

Ich wohne in Wien und zum Glück gibt es bei uns einige großartige, traditionelle Werkstätten die immer noch in Handarbeit wunderschöne Gegenstände herstellen.

Ich habe mit dutzende Menschen gesprochen bis ich Thomas gefunden habe.

Er ist der junge und passionierte Kopf von Karlinger, einem unglaublichen, Traditionsbetrieb der den Eindruck vermittelt noch aus einer anderen Zeit zu kommen.

Karlinger macht seit über 60 Jahren Gürtel und Hosenträger und Thomas als der junge Nachfolger dieser großartigen Tradition war instrumental dabei unseren Gürtel Realität werden zu lassen.

DAS DESIGN

Wir haben die seitlichen Linien und die umgeschlagene Schnallenhalterung des schwedischen Armee Gürtels übernommen aber das restliche Layout angepasst.

Die geschwungene Spitze spiegelt den unteren teil des Tinkerlogo wieder und die zusätzlichen Gürtellöcher geben dir mehr flexibilität bei der Größen Auswahl.

Das ungefärbte leder ist sehr wichtig weil es dafür sorgt das DU dem Gürtel den letzten Schliff gibst.

Dieser Gürtel ist nicht für jeden das richtige, du bekommst den Gürtel Roh und indem du ihn trägst, machst du ihn zu deinem Einzelstück.

Die Patina und Kratzer jedes Gürtels werden Einzigartig sein.

Wir könnten eine gefärbte Version anbieten um mehr Gürtel zu verkaufen aber das wäre nicht der Gürtel den wir machen wollen.

Du vollendest den Gürtel indem du ihn trägst.


Das Leder wird sich über die Lebzeit des Gürtels dramatisch verändern.

Die Farbe die zu Beginn an Wüstensand erinnert wird zuerst immer dünklere Honigtöne annehmen und in den folgenden Jahren ein immer tieferes Braun.

Aber da es dein Gürtel ist, entscheidest du was du mit dem Gürtel machen willst. Du kannst experimentieren: Nimm ein bisschen Ledermilch, Bienenwachs oder Stiefel Fett und es ist sofort ein ganz anderer Gürtel.

Damit ihr ohne gleich den Gürtel zu verändern, experimentieren könnt, werden wir zu jedem Gürtel ein Stück Restleder dazu packen an dem ihr das Färben und Schnitzen ausprobieren könnt.

Da ihr die Schnalle und Buchschrauben, die wir anstatt fixer Nieten verwenden, jederzeit entfernen und austauschen könnt, störten sie euch so bei eurer kreativen Arbeit auch nicht.

Wir haben den Gürtel so konstruiert dass er länger hält als der durchschnittliche Mensch, damit deine Geschichte, das Leben das auf dem Gürtel aufgezeichnet wurde, weiter lebt.

Dieser Gürtel wurde gemacht um ein Begleiter, eine Aufzeichnung und ein Geschenk zu sein.

Wir sind Abenteurer und wir teilen gerne unsere Geschichten. Egal ob es die Geschichte ist von damals als du dem T-Rex eine verpasst hast oder doch die vom gemeinen Türsteher, die Spuren auf deinem Gürtel sind die Geschichte deines Lebens. Deine Autobiographie hält deine Hose fest.

Wir wollen einen Gürtel auf den wir Stolz sein können, den wir jedem anderen Gürtel vorziehen und den es Spaß macht jeden Tag zu tragen.


Wir haben unsere Prototypen und sie sind großartig geworden aber jetzt brauchen wir eure Unterstützung um den nächsten Schritt machen zu können.

DAS LEDER

Der Tinkerbelt ist aus pflanzlich gegärbten Vollrind Leder.

Das pflanzliche Gerben ist eine sehr alte Tradition und diese klassische Methode bringt immer noch die besten Ergebnisse. Man bekommt ein einzigartiges Leder das mit chemie gegerbten Ledern einfach nicht zu Vergleichen ist.

Das gerben passiert in Holzfäßern in denen die natürlichen Säuren von Baumrinde und Blättern dem Leder das helle Braun und einen tollen holzigen Geruch verleihen.

Verglichen mit den zwei anderen populären Gerbungsarten die von starken Chemikalien wie Chromium und Aldehyd Gebrauch machen braucht das pflanzliche Gerben erheblich länger. Während die anderen Methoden nur ein oder zwei Tage brauchen, dauert das veg-tanning (pflanzliche gerben) Monate oder sogar bis zu einem Jahr.

Die pflanzliche Methode ist dafür komplett Umweltfreundlich und das Resultat ist ein wunderschönes, komplett natürliches Leder.

Das 4mm dicke Vollrind Leder sorgt dafür das der Tinkerbelt jeden deiner anderen Gürtel überleben sollte. Vollrind bedeuted das die Lederoberfläche weder geschliffen noch poliert wurde um die natürlichen Markierungen zu entfernen. Die intakte Oberfläche mit ihren Fassern sorgt für Stärke und Haltbarkeit. Ausserdem ist das Leder resistenter gegen Feuchtigkeit da es durch die Maserung besser atmet.

Das natürliche warme Leder ist ideal für lang haltbare Gegenstände. Anstatt kaputt zu werden entwickelt sich langsam eine unglaubliche Patina, die mit der Zeit nur noch besser wird.

Das Leder hat auch einige negative Punkte, unter anderem die lange Produktionszeit und der dadurch hohe Preis aber die vielen Vorteile überwiegen und machen es eindeutig zur besten Wahl.

FARB ENTWICKLUNG:

Diese Bilder, gefunden auf www.leathermilk.com, zeigen wie wunderschön pflanzlich gegerbtes Leder mit Zeit und Benutzung wird.

GRÖSSEN


Den Tinkerbelt Gürtel gibt es in den Größen: 85cm, 90cm, 95cm, 100cm, 105cm, 110cm, 115cm gemessen von der Mitte der Schnalle zum mittleren Loch.

Der Körper der meisten Menschen verändert sich über die Jahre und ich weiß aus Erfahrung das ich keine Ausnahme bin. Wenn ich also einen Gürtel bauen will der dich dein ganzes Leben begleiten soll muss ich diese Veränderungen auch mit einkalkulieren.

Deswegen hat unser Gürtel nicht die üblichen 5-7 Gürtel Löcher sonder ganze 10. Wir wollen das du den Gürtel auch wirklich so lange tragen kannst wie er hält. Mit 10 Löchern hat man mehr Spielraum.

Miss deine Hüfte oder deinen alten Gürtel von der Mitte der Schnalle bis zum meist benutzten Loch und such dir mit Hilfe unserer Größentabelle den richtigen Gürtel aus.
(Jeder der sich einen oder mehrere Tinkerbelt Gürtel als Belohnung ausgesucht hat wird nach dem Ende der Kampagne gefragt welche Größen gewünscht sind.)


WAS WIR MIT EURER UNTERSTÜTZUNG MACHEN

Mit einer Erfolgreich finanzierten Kampagne haben wir genug Kapital um in Produktion zu gehen.

Wir können Schrauben, Schnallen und Leder bestellen und Thomas und sein Team mit der Produktion beauftragen. Das ganze Karlinger Team hat uns bis jetzt gratis geholfen!

Die fertigen Gürtel werden zusammen mit den anderen Belohnungen direkt an euch, unsere Indiegogo Unterstützer versandt.


UNSERE 100 JAHR GARANTIE

Wir haben alles was uns eingefallen ist getan um sicherzustellen das der Tinkerbelt der letzte Gürtel ist den du brauchst oder willst.

Wir sind so überzeugt von diesem Gürtel das wir versprechen jeden Gürtel der nicht mindestens 100 Jahre normalen Gebrauch aushält, zu ersetzen.

So lange er als Gürtel benutzt wurde, ersetzen wir jeden Tinkerbelt der nicht mindestens 100 Jahre hält.


BELOHNUNGEN

Hier sind die Schätze!

Als erstes und wichtigstes bieten wir den Tinkerbelt Gürtel den wir mit eurer Hilfe produzieren werden als Belohnung an. Hier auf Indiegogo gibt es den Gürtel für mindestens 40€ unter dem Preis für den wir ihn nach der Kampagne verkaufen werden.

Zusätzlich haben wir uns speziell für Indiegogo ein paar exklusive Belohnungen einfallen lassen: Die Tinker Geldtasche, den Tinker Schlüsselanhänger und den unglaublich coolen Tinker Gitarrengurt.


Danke für euer Interesse und eure Unterstützung! Ihr könnt uns auch sehr helfen indem Ihr unsere Kampagne mit euren Freunden teilt!

German Campaign.Deutsche Kampagne


Ein besserer Gürtel

Wenn du jemals etwas für lange Zeit in deinem Leben hattest dann weißt du wie sehr man, am Schluss, an diesen Gegenständen hängt.
Die meisten Gürtel die ich in Geschäften gefunden habe waren entweder aus Plastik oder sahen aus als ob Sie fürs Rodeo gedacht waren.
Nachdem ich mich durch unzählige Furcht erregende Gürtelatrappen gekämpft habe, hatte ich endlich genug. Ich will nicht noch einen Gürtel zum in den Schrank hängen oder der zu dem einen Paar Schuhe passt.
Ich will DEN GÜRTEL! Den einen Gürtel auf den ich mich verlassen kann und der mich immer begleitet.


Wie cool ist es immer noch die Armee Jacke oder das Werkzeug von deinem Großvater zu haben? Wir lieben diese Sachen weil sie eine Geschichte haben.
Wie wir den Tinkerbelt gebaut haben
Es hat eine weile gedauert aber am Ende bin ich auf einen alten 2. Weltkriegsgürtel der schwedischen Armee gestossen.
Er war nicht perfekt aber er hat als Inspiration gedient um etwas wirklich großartiges zu bauen.

Ich habe mit Hilfe von Google angefangen nach jemandem zu suchen der mir dabei helfen kann diese Idee aus meinem Kopf und auf meine Hüfte zu bringen.
Ich wohne in Wien und zum Glück gibt es bei uns einige großartige, traditionelle Werkstätten die immer noch in Handarbeit wunderschöne Gegenstände herstellen.
Ich habe mit dutzende Menschen gesprochen bis ich Thomas gefunden habe.Er ist der junge und passionierte Kopf von Karlinger, einem unglaublichen, Traditionsbetrieb der den Eindruck vermittelt noch aus einer anderen Zeit zu kommen.



Karlinger macht seit über 60 Jahren Gürtel und Hosenträger und Thomas als der junge Nachfolger dieser großartigen Tradition war instrumental dabei unseren Gürtel Realität werden zu lassen.



DAS DESIGN

Wir haben die seitlichen Linien und die umgeschlagene Schnallenhalterung des schwedischen Armee Gürtels übernommen aber das restliche Layout angepasst.
Die geschwungene Spitze spiegelt den unteren teil des Tinkerlogo wieder und die zusätzlichen Gürtellöcher geben dir mehr flexibilität bei der Größen Auswahl.
Das ungefärbte leder ist sehr wichtig weil es dafür sorgt das DU dem Gürtel den letzten Schliff gibst.

Dieser Gürtel ist nicht für jeden das richtige, du bekommst den Gürtel Roh und indem du ihn trägst, machst du ihn zu deinem Einzelstück.
Die Patina und Kratzer jedes Gürtels werden Einzigartig sein.
Wir könnten eine gefärbte Version anbieten um mehr Gürtel zu verkaufen aber das wäre nicht der Gürtel den wir machen wollen.
Du vollendest den Gürtel indem du ihn trägst.

Das Leder wird sich über die Lebzeit des Gürtels dramatisch verändern.
Die Farbe die zu Beginn an Wüstensand erinnert wird zuerst immer dünklere Honigtöne annehmen und in den folgenden Jahren ein immer tieferes Braun.
Aber da es dein Gürtel ist, entscheidest du was du mit dem Gürtel machen willst. Du kannst experimentieren: Nimm ein bisschen Ledermilch, Bienenwachs oder Stiefel Fett und es ist sofort ein ganz anderer Gürtel.
Damit ihr ohne gleich den Gürtel zu verändern, experimentieren könnt, werden wir zu jedem Gürtel ein Stück Restleder dazu packen an dem ihr das Färben und Schnitzen ausprobieren könnt.
Da ihr die Schnalle und Buchschrauben, die wir anstatt fixer Nieten verwenden, jederzeit entfernen und austauschen könnt, störten sie euch so bei eurer kreativen Arbeit auch nicht.
Wir haben den Gürtel so konstruiert dass er länger hält als der durchschnittliche Mensch, damit deine Geschichte, das Leben das auf dem Gürtel aufgezeichnet wurde, weiter lebt.
Dieser Gürtel wurde gemacht um ein Begleiter, eine Aufzeichnung und ein Geschenk zu sein.
Wir sind Abenteurer und wir teilen gerne unsere Geschichten. Egal ob es die Geschichte ist von damals als du dem T-Rex eine verpasst hast oder doch die vom gemeinen Türsteher, die Spuren auf deinem Gürtel sind die Geschichte deines Lebens. Deine Autobiographie hält deine Hose fest.
Wir wollen einen Gürtel auf den wir Stolz sein können, den wir jedem anderen Gürtel vorziehen und den es Spaß macht jeden Tag zu tragen.


Wir haben unsere Prototypen und sie sind großartig geworden aber jetzt brauchen wir eure Unterstützung um den nächsten Schritt machen zu können.

DAS LEDER


Der Tinkerbelt ist aus pflanzlich gegärbten Vollrind Leder.
Das pflanzliche Gerben ist eine sehr alte Tradition und diese klassische Methode bringt immer noch die besten Ergebnisse. Man bekommt ein einzigartiges Leder das mit chemie gegerbten Ledern einfach nicht zu Vergleichen ist.Das gerben passiert in Holzfäßern in denen die natürlichen Säuren von Baumrinde und Blättern dem Leder das helle Braun und einen tollen holzigen Geruch verleihen.Verglichen mit den zwei anderen populären Gerbungsarten die von starken Chemikalien wie Chromium und Aldehyd Gebrauch machen braucht das pflanzliche Gerben erheblich länger. Während die anderen Methoden nur ein oder zwei Tage brauchen, dauert das veg-tanning (pflanzliche gerben) Monate oder sogar bis zu einem Jahr. Die pflanzliche Methode ist dafür komplett Umweltfreundlich und das Resultat ist ein wunderschönes, komplett natürliches Leder.Das 4mm dicke Vollrind Leder sorgt dafür das der Tinkerbelt jeden deiner anderen Gürtel überleben sollte. Vollrind bedeuted das die Lederoberfläche weder geschliffen noch poliert wurde um die natürlichen Markierungen zu entfernen. Die intakte Oberfläche mit ihren Fassern sorgt für Stärke und Haltbarkeit. Ausserdem ist das Leder resistenter gegen Feuchtigkeit da es durch die Maserung besser atmet.
Das natürliche warme Leder ist ideal für lang haltbare Gegenstände. Anstatt kaputt zu werden entwickelt sich langsam eine unglaubliche Patina, die mit der Zeit nur noch besser wird.
Das Leder hat auch einige negative Punkte, unter anderem die lange Produktionszeit und der dadurch hohe Preis aber die vielen Vorteile überwiegen und machen es eindeutig zur besten Wahl.
FARB ENTWICKLUNG:


Diese Bilder, gefunden auf www.leathermilk.com, zeigen wie wunderschön pflanzlich gegerbtes Leder mit Zeit und Benutzung wird.
GRÖSSEN




Den Tinkerbelt Gürtel gibt es in den Größen: 85cm, 90cm, 95cm, 100cm, 105cm, 110cm, 115cm gemessen von der Mitte der Schnalle zum mittleren Loch.
Der Körper der meisten Menschen verändert sich über die Jahre und ich weiß aus Erfahrung das ich keine Ausnahme bin. Wenn ich also einen Gürtel bauen will der dich dein ganzes Leben begleiten soll muss ich diese Veränderungen auch mit einkalkulieren. 
Deswegen hat unser Gürtel nicht die üblichen 5-7 Gürtel Löcher sonder ganze 10. Wir wollen das du den Gürtel auch wirklich so lange tragen kannst wie er hält. Mit 10 Löchern hat man mehr Spielraum.
Miss deine Hüfte oder deinen alten Gürtel von der Mitte der Schnalle bis zum meist benutzten Loch und such dir mit Hilfe unserer Größentabelle den richtigen Gürtel aus.(Jeder der sich einen oder mehrere Tinkerbelt Gürtel als Belohnung ausgesucht hat wird nach dem Ende der Kampagne gefragt welche Größen gewünscht sind.)
WAS WIR MIT EURER UNTERSTÜTZUNG MACHEN


Mit einer Erfolgreich finanzierten Kampagne haben wir genug Kapital um in Produktion zu gehen.
Wir können Schrauben, Schnallen und Leder bestellen und Thomas und sein Team mit der Produktion beauftragen. Das ganze Karlinger Team hat uns bis jetzt gratis geholfen!
Die fertigen Gürtel werden zusammen mit den anderen Belohnungen direkt an euch, unsere Indiegogo Unterstützer versandt.
UNSERE 100 JAHR GARANTIE

Wir haben alles was uns eingefallen ist getan um sicherzustellen das der Tinkerbelt der letzte Gürtel ist den du brauchst oder willst.
Wir sind so überzeugt von diesem Gürtel das wir versprechen jeden Gürtel der nicht mindestens 100 Jahre normalen Gebrauch aushält, zu ersetzen.So lange er als Gürtel benutzt wurde, ersetzen wir jeden Tinkerbelt der nicht mindestens 100 Jahre hält.
BELOHNUNGEN

Hier sind die Schätze!
Als erstes und wichtigstes bieten wir den Tinkerbelt Gürtel den wir mit eurer Hilfe produzieren werden als Belohnung an. Hier auf Indiegogo gibt es den Gürtel für mindestens 40€ unter dem Preis für den wir ihn nach der Kampagne verkaufen werden.
Zusätzlich haben wir uns speziell für Indiegogo ein paar exklusive Belohnungen einfallen lassen: Die Tinker Geldtasche, den Tinker Schlüsselanhänger und den unglaublich coolen Tinker Gitarrengurt.


Danke für euer Interesse und eure Unterstützung! Ihr könnt uns auch sehr helfen indem Ihr unsere Kampagne mit euren Freunden teilt!

story: Katherine and Tori are a team of two college fashionistas on a mission to launch their own business.  They met in high school when they both joined the sewing and knitting club and have since developed their skills and are putting them to good use.  The two girls were inspired while spending time with Tori's nephew one afternoon, and hence, "Posh Baby" was born.  They have plans to become a well-known boutique and a trusted source of comfortable, fashionable, and functional baby clothes and accessories.  The duo has a passion for practical and sensible style and a history together in the world of fashion and crafting.  Check out their work in the video above!

story:
What's DeMarc all about?

We position ourselves among the watch enthusiasts that seek for high quality modern watches, at a fair price.

We don't just design wristwatches that tell the time, we create timeless, minimalist timepieces that step up your wrist game without costing you a fortune.

We create time-telling mechanisms that are simplistic in nature and design. They tell you the time in the most simplest of ways and look good while doing so.

Each watch is crafted using high quality materials, goes under strict quality assurance controls and comes with a warranty.

 

If this is your first time on Indiegogo, there's nothing to worry about, it's super easy! Simply follow the steps below:

  1. Decide how many watches you would like to get and then click the pink button that says "GET THIS PERK" (hover over the perks to see the button)
  2. Choose your favorite watch style - if you have selected a perk with more than one watch(step 1), then at this step you will choose the various colors that you would like to get
  3. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment
  4. Receive your order when production is finished

Our watches are crafted with high quality materials and are handled with extreme care. We aim to deliver you the finest quality at a fair price. All watches go under strict quality assurance controls and come with a warranty for the watch parts and the mechanics. (Warranty does not cover water damage, normal wear and tear, batteries, accidental glass damage, scratches, strap discoloration, or theft).

 

  • CASE MATERIAL:  316L Stainless steel
  • CASE SIZE: 40mm
  • CASE COLORS: Black, Silver, Gold, Rose Gold
  • MOVEMENT: Japan VD35
  • GLASS: Sapphire domed crystal
  • BANDS MATERIAL: Genuine Bamboo Grain Leather / Stainless Steel Mesh 
  • BANDS WIDTH: 20mm
  • DATE FUNCTION: Yes
  • WATER RESISTANCE: 3ATM (30 Meters)
  • PACKAGING: Leather Box

 

 

We Need Your Support!

In order to kick-start our project and bring it to life, we need your support. Not only by pledging for one of our watches, but also by sharing our story with your friends and family through the social media.

 It's important to say that if we don't reach our funding goal, we get nothing! That is, you don't get to put your hands on these awesome watches! 

So, what do you say? Will you help a small business grow?

story:
A LITTLE HISTORY FIRST

Hi guys, my name is Paul Leadbeatter and I live in the North of England, United Kingdom.

I am a part time worker in a local supermarket and am starting this campaign to hopefully get my clothing label, BuiltByNerdz Clothing, off the ground.

Our facebook page has near 400 likes with more adds every day and we have already produced small numbers of t-shirts and beanies which sold relatively quickly, so we know we have a good fan base.

BuiltByNerdz has gamers at its heart but t-shirt designs for everyone can be found with us. Our designs are great and we know people will love to wear them.

It is extremely hard trying to juggle a small income and attempt to fund this lifelong dream of mine and this is where indiegogo comes in.  The sheer simplicity of creating a campaign and telling your story drew me in straight away.

Our page has the help of an awesome graphic designer and great clothing model. Both ready to put their talents to use.

THE INS & OUTS

So the funding amount is £500 and is a very small sum in comparison to what we would get in return. The independent t-shirt market is popular and booming of late, with no sign of dieing down. And we believe we can make it big with a little help.

Here is what the £500 would do for us;

*A total of 75 t-shirts of various sizes and colours (probably white, red and navy blue colours) the 75 will be then split in to 3 batches of 25, with each batch having a seperate design, meaning 3 designs in total.

*20 Beanie hats with a single design in a mutitude of colours (probably 5 each of bottle green, burgundy, bolt gun grey and black)

*50 black silicon wristbands with a white embossed print on them.


The entire funding ammount will be used to print our selection of ready designs on to a variety of coloured t-shirts, vests, beanies and silicon wrist bands.

If the funding goal is not met then no money will be lost on your part.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if funding is something you would not like to do, then just a general shout out on facebook or where ever would be greatly appreciated as every little really does help. The more people to see this, the better!

Also don't forget to use the indiegogo share tools :)
 
Thanks a lot guys! And please check out the facebook page!
 
Paul Leadbeatter & everyone who helps out at BuiltByNerdz :D

story:
BULLY is the first wetsuit washer with a smart internal and external irrigation system - providing an easy to use, durable and efficient way to wash your wetsuit. 
Any wetsuit user from across all water based activities will greatly benefit and enjoy using this product. BULLY gives a hygienic solution that saves time, saves water & is built to prolong the lifespan of your wetsuit!













 


 

DESIGNED & MADE SPECIFICALLY FOR WETSUITS
Developed with particular attention to wetsuit shoulder widths and collar spans, the BULLY anthropometric form ensures the wetsuit hangs and dries swiftly without creases; thus preventing distortion, maintaining the shape and prolonging the lifespan of your wetsuit.
 

SMART INTERNAL & EXTERNAL IRRIGATION SYSTEM
The BULLY wetsuit washer is the first to implement water jets that efficiently rinse the entire wetsuit simultaneously. A shower head element washes the outside of the wetsuit, while the inside is cleaned using a series of pipes that sit within the main hanger.
 

EFFICIENT, STRONG & DURABLE
BULLY features a combination of aluminium and high quality plastic with high impact and UV resistant properties, providing exceptional performance and aesthetic appeal. The main shower head is manufactured from an aluminium plate, pierced prior to forming to ensure the water jets spray in all directions. The pipework contains custom forms and couplings to ensure correct water distribution.
 

SIMPLE & EASY TO USE
BULLY features a universal water supply connection, allowing any hose to easily connect from any water source. BULLY can also be hanged from practically anywhere using a unique 90º rotation hook. It is straightforward and accessible for anyone to use.
 

GREENER FOR THE ENVIRONMENT
Not only is BULLY built with non-toxic materials it also saves water! 1 minute of BULLY uses 14 liters of water and takes 25-60 seconds to thoroughly clean your wetsuit. While hand washing uses 30-40 liters of water and take three times longer! That makes a difference of at least 20 liters of water!

 


                

                  

      


"..I believe the boys are not just onto something bigger but something that could be a real game changer, something that could make a real difference." James from Surf Bunker Dec 2016

"..BULLY is our first best remedy to all that. It’s essentially a hanger and a shower head combined to wash suits inside and out which, let’s face it, most of us do a poor job of.​." Juan from Inertia Dec 2016

"Hang & Wash: Let this hanger wash the sea off your suite. ...The way we treat our surf equipment represents our relationship to the sea and the value we hold for the materials that serve us." Yoav from Streamer Dec 2016


 

Did you know that each person uses about 303-378 liters of water per day?
Are you surprised that the largest use of household water is to flush the toilet? and after that, to take showers and baths? That is why, in these days of water conservation, we are starting to see  technology designed to use less. Why should it be any different with washing our wetsuit?

BULLY helps tackle the water wastage in wetsuit washing!
 




The average hose supply pressure is 50psi.
In urban environments the pressure is up to 80psi.
BULLY can be used with a pressure as low as  24.65psi!

So there’s no need to turn the hose one full, BULLY will efficiently wash your wetsuit with less water!

Next time when your hands play with cold water -
Start to think outside the bucket!



 

 
1. HANG YOUR WETSUIT ON BULLY
Designed and engineered especially for the shape, size and weight of wetsuits		   2. CONNECT BULLY TO WATER SUPPLY The universal connector will fit any hose

 
3. HANG BULLY WHEREVER YOU WANT The hook spins 90º and supports up to 94kg of weight   4. TURN ON WATER SUPPLY For 30-60 seconds, duration depends on the condition and size of the wetsuit

5. CLOSE THE WATER TAP AND LEAVE YOUR WETSUIT ON BULLY TO DRY
The shape generates an airflow that assists the drying process

 

We have invested all of our time and energy to bring the dream this far! We had a great journey full of experiences; from the design process, product development, prototypes and testing. We now have the final prototype in our hands.

We have checked and lined up some of the best factories and manufacturers. Now we need to get you - the user - on board!

This is where we need your support! This campaign will raise the funds for the last piece in the puzzle - manufacture a mold and proceed to a full production line. Help us to make this dream come true so we can bring BULLY to each and every one of you worldwide!





















 

As extreme watersports enthusiasts we breath the sea air and taste its salty waters. Wetsuits are our second skin. Years of surfing, kite surfing, free diving and body surfing - made us determined to find a solution to the problem of cleaning and caring for our wetsuits. And we have!

No matter how passionate you are about going into the water - coming out is a different story! Cleaning your wetsuit after every session is messy & never fun.

We introduce you to the easy, simple and efficient way to wash your wetsuit! No more damp, smelly, dirty, sandy wetsuits! No more splashing around with buckets and cold water! This product has taken our experience to the next level & we want to share it with you!

 

Working together with one of the world’s leading independent product development consultants IDC, and their fantastic industrial design team, we developed BULLY - The first custom made wetsuit washer that thoroughly rinses your suit both inside and out.

From design and engineering to prototyping and manufacturing, we worked together to develop a new product which balanced functionality and aesthetics. Providing a unique solution to our wish and also benefit the watersports industry as a whole.

 




MAOR DAYAN
Co Founder & C.E.O
As the inventor of Bully, this project has been a life changing experience. I’m an adrenalin seeker and have always been inspired by the ocean; throughout the past 20 years of surfing, exploring surf spots around the world and my experience as a professional underwater photographer.

In the last 2 and half years the Bully Wetsuit Washer became my mission. I dedicated myself to create Bully from an idea to a real life product. We are super excited to bring this amazing product to you. This project has become a part of us; we moved to a foreign country to cut back our expenses and sacrificed everything we had to make it happen. We are here to show that the common dude can follow his dreams and make a difference.

 



SHLOMI OVADIA
Co Founder & C.O.O
I come from the world of extreme sports and motorbiking, water sports was a hobby for me. Maor is my best mate, we traveled the world together. One day he calls me up and tells me about an invention that was going to change our lives. I dropped everything and bought a flight ticket and here we are… 2 and a half years later of working on the Bully project 24/7 - I can’t wait to see this product change your life like it changed mine!

 



ADI EINHORN
Co Founder
I am a "Bully“. The meaning of "Bully" is too great to describe in words. Surfing came into my life about 8 years ago. At first it was as a ray of light! Strong, pure, wild, blinding & full of limitless love. The freedom of the ocean, the energy and power of nature, the warmth of the sun... Blue skies and waves, it's knowing time never ends and yet, we have so little of it, a kind of feeling that can't be explained, you must experience it.

Today "Bully" has become a proof of fulfillment of dreams! Someone very wise once taught me - "If you want to.. then do!“ willpower, confidence and perseverance. To me "Bully" is more than a title, It’s a way of life. There's no one happier than me to be part of this crazy family. I’m proud & blessed to be a "Bully"!

 



ALEK MARKUS
Technical Support & Marketing
Years I worked as  IT Manager and  technical support. I was responsible for some major projects for government companies and private companies also. I felt that i need a   change . when  Maor called me and  explained about his product wondering if i want to join Bully family .i fell in love at first sight and I knew that's what I want to do, So I left everything and decided to join Bully family be in charge of marketing for this amazing product  to make a  journey  to spread the word out the world,we gonna show bully is a good thing.




HELIO CARMO
Project Manager & PR
My connection to nature & the waters was there since I can remember. Going back 7 generations of fishermen, salty water runs in my family veins. I fish, dive & surf. Good vibes - just breathing it all in!

Over the years I met all kinds people from all around the world. People come into our lives for a reason, either for a short period of time or a for a lifetime!

I found a special bond with Bully that can't be explained. Since that first moment it's all history, and so today I am an integral part of this team. Go with your beliefs as far as you can to reach your goals. I believe in Bully more than anything!
 

FAQ


Q. Does it matter if cold or hot water is used with Bully?
A. We recommend using cold water as it states on the label of your wetsuit.

Q. How much water is used by Bully?
A. Bully uses 14 liters per minute.

Q. How much time does it take to wash a wetsuit?
A. It depends on the level of dirt on your wetsuit, approx. 60 seconds.

Q. Does Bully automatically stop working after 60 sec?
A. No, the time of working depend on the time you leave the water on.

Q. Can I use Bully in the shower?
A. Absolutely - you can use Bully with any water source that connect with a hose.

Q. Can I hang Bully everywhere?
A. Yes, we built a special hook that spin 90 degrees and can easily be hung anywhere.

Q. Do I need to put something on the wetsuit before washing?
A. No, Bully rinses your wetsuit with fresh water.

Q. Can the hanger hurt or damage my wetsuit somehow?
A. No it can’t. On the contrary; the hanger is engineered especially for the care of wetsuits and their shape.

Q. After washing, is it better to leave the wetsuit hanging on the Bully Hanger?
A. Yes, the special design of Bully helps the airflow dry the wetsuit faster and help to keep the shape of your wetsuit.

Q. Does Bully fit womens’ wetsuits?
A. Yes Bully is unisex, built for both men and women wetsuits.

Q. Does it fit all wetsuit sizes?
A. The Bully Hanger is built for adult wetsuits sized S-XL.

Q. Will it fit my scuba diving suit or is it just for surfing wetsuit?
A. Bully is built for all types of water sports wetsuits!

Q. Do I need to flip my wetsuit inside out after to dry?
A. No there’s no need to flip the wetsuit as Bully washes it from inside as well as the outside.

Q. Why is Bully better than a bucket of water?
A. The Bully hanger saves you dealing directly with cold water, it’s the first washer that doesn't stretch or distort your wetsuit, it saves water and help to dry and store the wetsuit for your next session.

Q. Do the inside and outside jets wash equally?
A. Yes, both the inside and outside washes do the same excellent job.

Q. Do I get a warranty with my purchase?
A. Yes ,Bully comes with a 1 year warranty.

Q. Do you deliver everywhere?
A. Yes, we ship worldwide.

Q. What is the delivery rate?
A. The price of delivery varies according to destination.
story_txt:
BULLY is the first wetsuit washer with a smart internal and external irrigation system - providing an easy to use, durable and efficient way to wash your wetsuit. Any wetsuit user from across all water based activities will greatly benefit and enjoy using this product. BULLY gives a hygienic solution that saves time, saves water & is built to prolong the lifespan of your wetsuit! 
 DESIGNED & MADE SPECIFICALLY FOR WETSUITSDeveloped with particular attention to wetsuit shoulder widths and collar spans, the BULLY anthropometric form ensures the wetsuit hangs and dries swiftly without creases; thus preventing distortion, maintaining the shape and prolonging the lifespan of your wetsuit. SMART INTERNAL & EXTERNAL IRRIGATION SYSTEMThe BULLY wetsuit washer is the first to implement water jets that efficiently rinse the entire wetsuit simultaneously. A shower head element washes the outside of the wetsuit, while the inside is cleaned using a series of pipes that sit within the main hanger. EFFICIENT, STRONG & DURABLEBULLY features a combination of aluminium and high quality plastic with high impact and UV resistant properties, providing exceptional performance and aesthetic appeal. The main shower head is manufactured from an aluminium plate, pierced prior to forming to ensure the water jets spray in all directions. The pipework contains custom forms and couplings to ensure correct water distribution. SIMPLE & EASY TO USEBULLY features a universal water supply connection, allowing any hose to easily connect from any water source. BULLY can also be hanged from practically anywhere using a unique 90º rotation hook. It is straightforward and accessible for anyone to use. GREENER FOR THE ENVIRONMENTNot only is BULLY built with non-toxic materials it also saves water! 1 minute of BULLY uses 14 liters of water and takes 25-60 seconds to thoroughly clean your wetsuit. While hand washing uses 30-40 liters of water and take three times longer! That makes a difference of at least 20 liters of water!                                         "..I believe the boys are not just onto something bigger but something that could be a real game changer, something that could make a real difference." James from Surf Bunker Dec 2016"..BULLY is our first best remedy to all that. It’s essentially a hanger and a shower head combined to wash suits inside and out which, let’s face it, most of us do a poor job of.​." Juan from Inertia Dec 2016"Hang & Wash: Let this hanger wash the sea off your suite. ...The way we treat our surf equipment represents our relationship to the sea and the value we hold for the materials that serve us." Yoav from Streamer Dec 2016 Did you know that each person uses about 303-378 liters of water per day?Are you surprised that the largest use of household water is to flush the toilet? and after that, to take showers and baths? That is why, in these days of water conservation, we are starting to see  technology designed to use less. Why should it be any different with washing our wetsuit?BULLY helps tackle the water wastage in wetsuit washing! The average hose supply pressure is 50psi.In urban environments the pressure is up to 80psi.BULLY can be used with a pressure as low as  24.65psi!So there’s no need to turn the hose one full, BULLY will efficiently wash your wetsuit with less water!Next time when your hands play with cold water -Start to think outside the bucket! 


 




1. HANG YOUR WETSUIT ON BULLYDesigned and engineered especially for the shape, size and weight of wetsuits
 

2. CONNECT BULLY TO WATER SUPPLY The universal connector will fit any hose





 






3. HANG BULLY WHEREVER YOU WANT The hook spins 90º and supports up to 94kg of weight
 

4. TURN ON WATER SUPPLY For 30-60 seconds, duration depends on the condition and size of the wetsuit






5. CLOSE THE WATER TAP AND LEAVE YOUR WETSUIT ON BULLY TO DRYThe shape generates an airflow that assists the drying process
 We have invested all of our time and energy to bring the dream this far! We had a great journey full of experiences; from the design process, product development, prototypes and testing. We now have the final prototype in our hands.We have checked and lined up some of the best factories and manufacturers. Now we need to get you - the user - on board!This is where we need your support! This campaign will raise the funds for the last piece in the puzzle - manufacture a mold and proceed to a full production line. Help us to make this dream come true so we can bring BULLY to each and every one of you worldwide! As extreme watersports enthusiasts we breath the sea air and taste its salty waters. Wetsuits are our second skin. Years of surfing, kite surfing, free diving and body surfing - made us determined to find a solution to the problem of cleaning and caring for our wetsuits. And we have!No matter how passionate you are about going into the water - coming out is a different story! Cleaning your wetsuit after every session is messy & never fun.We introduce you to the easy, simple and efficient way to wash your wetsuit! No more damp, smelly, dirty, sandy wetsuits! No more splashing around with buckets and cold water! This product has taken our experience to the next level & we want to share it with you! Working together with one of the world’s leading independent product development consultants IDC, and their fantastic industrial design team, we developed BULLY - The first custom made wetsuit washer that thoroughly rinses your suit both inside and out.From design and engineering to prototyping and manufacturing, we worked together to develop a new product which balanced functionality and aesthetics. Providing a unique solution to our wish and also benefit the watersports industry as a whole. MAOR DAYANCo Founder & C.E.OAs the inventor of Bully, this project has been a life changing experience. I’m an adrenalin seeker and have always been inspired by the ocean; throughout the past 20 years of surfing, exploring surf spots around the world and my experience as a professional underwater photographer.In the last 2 and half years the Bully Wetsuit Washer became my mission. I dedicated myself to create Bully from an idea to a real life product. We are super excited to bring this amazing product to you. This project has become a part of us; we moved to a foreign country to cut back our expenses and sacrificed everything we had to make it happen. We are here to show that the common dude can follow his dreams and make a difference. SHLOMI OVADIACo Founder & C.O.OI come from the world of extreme sports and motorbiking, water sports was a hobby for me. Maor is my best mate, we traveled the world together. One day he calls me up and tells me about an invention that was going to change our lives. I dropped everything and bought a flight ticket and here we are… 2 and a half years later of working on the Bully project 24/7 - I can’t wait to see this product change your life like it changed mine! ADI EINHORNCo FounderI am a "Bully“. The meaning of "Bully" is too great to describe in words. Surfing came into my life about 8 years ago. At first it was as a ray of light! Strong, pure, wild, blinding & full of limitless love. The freedom of the ocean, the energy and power of nature, the warmth of the sun... Blue skies and waves, it's knowing time never ends and yet, we have so little of it, a kind of feeling that can't be explained, you must experience it.Today "Bully" has become a proof of fulfillment of dreams! Someone very wise once taught me - "If you want to.. then do!“ willpower, confidence and perseverance. To me "Bully" is more than a title, It’s a way of life. There's no one happier than me to be part of this crazy family. I’m proud & blessed to be a "Bully"! ALEK MARKUSTechnical Support & MarketingYears I worked as  IT Manager and  technical support. I was responsible for some major projects for government companies and private companies also. I felt that i need a   change . when  Maor called me and  explained about his product wondering if i want to join Bully family .i fell in love at first sight and I knew that's what I want to do, So I left everything and decided to join Bully family be in charge of marketing for this amazing product  to make a  journey  to spread the word out the world,we gonna show bully is a good thing.HELIO CARMOProject Manager & PRMy connection to nature & the waters was there since I can remember. Going back 7 generations of fishermen, salty water runs in my family veins. I fish, dive & surf. Good vibes - just breathing it all in!Over the years I met all kinds people from all around the world. People come into our lives for a reason, either for a short period of time or a for a lifetime!I found a special bond with Bully that can't be explained. Since that first moment it's all history, and so today I am an integral part of this team. Go with your beliefs as far as you can to reach your goals. I believe in Bully more than anything! 
FAQ
Q. Does it matter if cold or hot water is used with Bully?A. We recommend using cold water as it states on the label of your wetsuit.
Q. How much water is used by Bully?A. Bully uses 14 liters per minute.
Q. How much time does it take to wash a wetsuit?A. It depends on the level of dirt on your wetsuit, approx. 60 seconds.
Q. Does Bully automatically stop working after 60 sec?A. No, the time of working depend on the time you leave the water on.
Q. Can I use Bully in the shower?A. Absolutely - you can use Bully with any water source that connect with a hose.
Q. Can I hang Bully everywhere?A. Yes, we built a special hook that spin 90 degrees and can easily be hung anywhere.
Q. Do I need to put something on the wetsuit before washing?A. No, Bully rinses your wetsuit with fresh water.
Q. Can the hanger hurt or damage my wetsuit somehow?A. No it can’t. On the contrary; the hanger is engineered especially for the care of wetsuits and their shape.
Q. After washing, is it better to leave the wetsuit hanging on the Bully Hanger?A. Yes, the special design of Bully helps the airflow dry the wetsuit faster and help to keep the shape of your wetsuit.
Q. Does Bully fit womens’ wetsuits?A. Yes Bully is unisex, built for both men and women wetsuits.
Q. Does it fit all wetsuit sizes?A. The Bully Hanger is built for adult wetsuits sized S-XL.
Q. Will it fit my scuba diving suit or is it just for surfing wetsuit?A. Bully is built for all types of water sports wetsuits!
Q. Do I need to flip my wetsuit inside out after to dry?A. No there’s no need to flip the wetsuit as Bully washes it from inside as well as the outside.
Q. Why is Bully better than a bucket of water?A. The Bully hanger saves you dealing directly with cold water, it’s the first washer that doesn't stretch or distort your wetsuit, it saves water and help to dry and store the wetsuit for your next session.
Q. Do the inside and outside jets wash equally?A. Yes, both the inside and outside washes do the same excellent job.
Q. Do I get a warranty with my purchase?A. Yes ,Bully comes with a 1 year warranty.
Q. Do you deliver everywhere?A. Yes, we ship worldwide.
Q. What is the delivery rate?A. The price of delivery varies according to destination.

story:
What is My silk story project about?

My name is Katya, I'm from Ukraine. My silk story is a project in which all my thoughts, feelings and sensations are embodied in a gentle silk. Each new collection is a separate story, which I want to share with people. This is my way of interacting with the world.

Why silk? It seems to me that silk is a subtle world and a universe, which is the closest to the soul. It is the same as the soul: there are a lot of unsolved mysteries and secrets. Silk is a field that I can trust my most sincerest and honest stories.

Layout creation process.

When some thought becomes so overwhelming that it is difficult to keep it in mind, the idea of a new collection appears. Before creation of each silk story, I make a series of sketches, where I'm looking for the right images and a colour palette which will represent the mood and essence of the collection in the best way. 

After that I transfer the sketches into computer, modify and detail them. Then I create a layout, which is going to be printed. 

About collections.

And now it is the high time to introduce you My Silk Story collections. Four silk stories have been embodied for the time being of the project.

1. "Interaction"

It's a story about love and understanding. I wish that all of us learn to hear and feel the nature, to be close to it, to be a part of it. Animals, birds, plants and insects on the scarf are not selected randomly. All the characters of this story are included in the Red Book of Ukraine. They are a confirmation and a reminder of what can happen if we don't learn to appreciate the nature and live in harmony with it. Just being a single entity, we can be truly happy. Phrases in Latin, which are located on the perimeter of the scarf, emphasize the concept of the collection "Interaction".

 2. "Dialogue"

It is a completely experimental collection. This is a live format in which a lot of strangers were involved. I knew that the result would be unpredictable! "Let it have its swing" - I said to myself. The creation of the collection began with the question of my interest: "What is happiness for you?". Then everyone could answer it in the social networks. I chose the answer that I really liked: "To love and to be loved" - so said one of the participants of the project - Valeriia. After that, I illustrated my question and the answer of Valeriia. The next question was asked by Valeriia. And so on, one by one, until the entire plane of the first scarf was filled. For the second scarf as the basic question a short but very comprehensive question of Konstantine was chosen: "Who are we?". All interested persons could express their versions. In this case, I illustrated all the answers. So what's the main idea of the project? It's very simple ! It is important to interact with the world. But much more important in life, what is your inner dialogue: what questions you ask to yourself, and how you answer them.

3. "Universe"

"Universe" collection is dedicated to 2017 Fire Rooster Year. The work on the collection began with a thought about an egg or more precisely with a thought of its perfection and uniqueness. It comes as no surprise that it is a symbol of the Universe. That’s how the idea of creating outer space on silk appeared. Roosters inside the eggs symbolize the divine spark, which stands for the creative ability, which every person holds inside. It is the beginning under the influence of thought, which has its roots to action, creating new and unknown. In consequence we have changes too. “True wisdom comes to each of us when we realize how little we understand about life, ourselves, and the world around us.” Socrates.

 4. "Another life"  

Alongside with our lives there is always another reality, another life, where many amazing creatures and energies live. We can’t make an image of them, but due to this they are even more wonderful. Loftiness, fusion in a riot of colours and life is the condition which accompanied the creation of the collection. Everything around is not just alive and growing, it is a start to something new. One energy flows into the other and nothing disappears completely. It continues to live in its other performance, which we may not even suspect. “Another life is another you”.

Characteristics.

All shawls are made of 100% silk (Crepe satin, 54g/m2 density). 

Print is applied by Italian equipment, so the picture is of high detailing and quality.  

All products are sewed with thin neat lock-stitch:

Care of the pure silk products.

Don’t wash silk things in a washing machine. The natural silk product is better to wash with hands in the cool water without soaking, using special liquid detergents for silk care. Usual detergent and soap are harmful to silk products. Rinse your silk thing in the water of the same temperature. During drying silk thing you need to spread it out on a towel on a horizontal surface away from direct sunlight, heaters and lamps with fluorescent light. Silk should be ironed when it’s wet, on “Silk” mode and only on the reverse side of the product. It is not recommended to moisten the dried silk cloth by spraying - drops of water can leave spots.

Why do I need people’s support on Indiegogo?

With your help, I want to start printing in larger editions than I am printing now. It will help me to reduce the prime cost of fabric and therefore the final cost of it (now it is quite high). Thus, the products of the project My silk story will be more accessible to people.

And also I would like to create a website for My silk story project.

What You Get

Any of your help is very important! There are a lot of unique perks for you:

- Thank you - 1$

- 1 postcard 10*15cm - 5$

- Set of 5 postcards 10*15 cm - 10$

- One kerchief 66*66 cm - 50$ (any of these):

- One scarf 46*159 cm - 68$ (any of these):

- One shawl 83*83 cm - 78$ (any of these):

- Two kerchiefs 66*66 cm - 85$ (any kerchiefs that was previously presented)

- Set of two shawls 83*83 cm and one scarf 46*159 cm - 180$ (any shawls and scarf that was previously presented)

- Set of all products currently available: 7 silk shawls (size: 83*83 cm) and 3 silk scarves (size: 46*159 cm). - 520$

- Unique, custom designed shawl or scarf in My Silk Story project style - 700$ (finished silk product: a shawl (size: 83*83 cm) or a scarf (size: 46*159 cm))

Risks & Challenges

My Silk Story project is working with a company that is engaged in printing on natural fabrics for 5 years. During this time they have established themselves as a very responsible and reliable performer.
Italian equipment (on which products are printed) allows to achieve high quality of the picture. 
With proper care of the silk fabric, the pattern will serve for a long time and delight you with its brightness.
The products are stitched in a professional atelier, so the seam always turns neat and smooth.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please, make some noise about My silk story project. Tell about it on facebook instagram twitter. It will be great if more people know about shawls and scarves.

Indiegogo has sharing tools, built in, so it’s really easy to help spread the word!

Thank you!

With best wishes of good and happiness, 

Katya Stepanishcheva - My Silk Story Project Creator, Textile Designer

story:
The World's first bag & backpack with a galosh

We asked ourselves why bags and backpacks are designed for carrying only, when we know that 99% of the time they are left on the floor, leaning against a wall, a chair, or our feet.

Fast forward one and a half year, we have designed a collection of bags and backpacks with an exchangeable silicone galosh that makes the bags stand up by themselves, protecting them from dirt and water, as well as giving them a cool and customized look. If the galosh gets worn out, it can easily be replaced while the bag stays fresh and clean.

Underneath the galosh you'll see a map of Sagene in Oslo. This is where the idea of t|k was born.

Key features

The Backpack Collection

The Roll-top Backpack

 

 

 

The City Backpack

 

 

 

The Bag Collection

The Classic Bag

 

 

 

The Tote Bag

 

 

 

 

The Bow Bag

 

 

 

 

Galosh colors

 

 

Removable and exchangeable galosh

 

Strap the bag to your suitcase

 

Designed for space, not specific objects

An example of the stuff you can fit in the rectangular bag. All bags and backpacks will fit a 15-inch laptop (the boxing gloves is for your hands and not your bag :-)

 

Model size Reference

The male model, Durassie, is 175cm (5'9'') and the female model, Julie, is 180cm (5'11'')

 
 

Technical details

Leather quality: Genuine grained cow leather from India. Chrome tanned leather with 1.3 mm thickness to give strength and durability without adding too much weight.

Use the round-headed button, to avoid loose straps, or to fasten the bag to your suitcase 

Beneath the backpacks, you'll also find the same map as for the bags.

 

Technical specification

 

Personal Item

A personal item is a smaller piece of luggage you can bring in addition to the cabin luggage. 


 

 

Time Line

Why order now?

By backing now you'll get to experienced one of the very first products off the line. As the awesome early adaptor that you obviously are, we would also humbly like to invite you to co-create future generations of the products with us.

 

Where We Ship

We ship worldwide. Shipping is free, but VAT and GST is not included.

 

When We Start Shipping?

Shipping is estimated to start in June.

Tore

 

Karstein

 

 

 

In t|k, we always aim to include functionality into our designs. Being from Norway, we have learned to appreciate demanding weather and natures brute force. We naturally emphasize on simplicity and durability. Enabling natural forms, give the bags a beautiful and warm design - so functional that it disappears into your everyday life. 

This is our second campaign. We delivered what we promised then, and we will deliver what we promise now.

 

Risks & Challenges

 We have had several iterations with our main supplier, and key sub-suppliers, to ensure that they are capable of manufacturing what we need. This has reduced the risk significantly for this project. However, it should be noted that there is always some risk involved when it comes to manufacturing products.

The main risk this campaign faces right now is to reach the Minimum Order Quantity (MOQ) required to get production started.

Other minor risks are; delay due to logistics & customs, delay due to quality issues, or delay due to material sourcing.

Small design changes from product photos must be expected. The backpacks will get additional bolts on for the shoulder strap connection. This will improve durability. The zipper on the backpack galosh will be like the bag galosh, with one zipper on the front side and one on the zipper on the back side - Instead of one zipper going all the way around.

Technical specification

 
Personal Item
A personal item is a smaller piece of luggage you can bring in addition to the cabin luggage. 
 
 
Time Line

Why order now?
By backing now you'll get to experienced one of the very first products off the line. As the awesome early adaptor that you obviously are, we would also humbly like to invite you to co-create future generations of the products with us.
 
Where We Ship
We ship worldwide. Shipping is free, but VAT and GST is not included.
 
When We Start Shipping?
Shipping is estimated to start in June.




Tore

 


Karstein



 
 
 
In t|k, we always aim to include functionality into our designs. Being from Norway, we have learned to appreciate demanding weather and natures brute force. We naturally emphasize on simplicity and durability. Enabling natural forms, give the bags a beautiful and warm design - so functional that it disappears into your everyday life. 
This is our second campaign. We delivered what we promised then, and we will deliver what we promise now.
 
Risks & Challenges
 We have had several iterations with our main supplier, and key sub-suppliers, to ensure that they are capable of manufacturing what we need. This has reduced the risk significantly for this project. However, it should be noted that there is always some risk involved when it comes to manufacturing products.
The main risk this campaign faces right now is to reach the Minimum Order Quantity (MOQ) required to get production started.
Other minor risks are; delay due to logistics & customs, delay due to quality issues, or delay due to material sourcing.
Small design changes from product photos must be expected. The backpacks will get additional bolts on for the shoulder strap connection. This will improve durability. The zipper on the backpack galosh will be like the bag galosh, with one zipper on the front side and one on the zipper on the back side - Instead of one zipper going all the way around.

story:
about US:

Recently graduated from a Bachelor of Business majoring in Entrepreneurship, the "swimsuit designer" Renay Wells has reinvigorated her brand MissManeater Swimwear AKA 'maneater swimwear' for relaunch in 2021!
www.swimsuitdesigner.com

However retailing on Etsy for the past 6 years, although has achieved great SEO, the platform lacks the social interaction that the #maneater customer craves:
https://www.etsy.com/au/shop/missmaneater

Looking to create a new website for:
https://www.missmaneater.com/

Via Shopify to achieve the SHOP insta function is important to our brand and to create more of a presence via our accounts:
https://www.instagram.com/swimsuitdesign/
https://www.instagram.com/missmaneaterswim/
https://www.instagram.com/missmaneaterboutique/


Where we have been + are seen for:
emPOWERing since 2010
for all things sensual
❤️ designer swim made with ❤️
#missmaneaterswim @missmaneaterswim

 

the CHANGE we need:

Converting from WIX to SHOPIFY will allow our global customers to SHOP INSTAGRAM in addition to the following OBJECTIVES:
•    Website Redesign (Elegant. clean. and minimal look)
•    Mobile responsive theming
•    International Shipping
•    Currency Conversion
•    Email marketing capabilities
•    #GLOBALdomination #maneaterSTYLE
 

we NEED you GET:

Seeking "investment" in our brand's website development in exchange you will receive MULTIPLE offers for:

#MissManeaterSwim designer swimsuits with ATTITUDE
[valued between AUD$375.00 -> AUD$350.00] ....if there is any style you know you want please feel free to CONTACT US + we will create the PERK #especiallyforYOU!

OR special offers especially created for this fundraising campaign!

Seeking AUD$17,700 to have our redesigned website active by April 1st 2021, our shopify developer will be at a cost per week of AUD$1540, however the biggest expenses come with the shopify add-ons, converting from USD$ to AUD$ for 3rd party integrations, at an approx cost [currency conversion rate depending] of AUD$11,400 for a calendar year of integrations, such as:
•    lnstagram Shoppable Galleries
•    foursixty (lnstagram Shop)
•    Klayvio Email Marketing
•    Boost Commerce Collection Filter
 

unique PERKS:

We have uploaded AUD$20,528 [retail price] of PERKS for you to choose from!

Apart from special fundraising discounts on MissManeater Australia SEXY styles, 17% of all funds raised will go to my own personal fundraising for the Australian National Breast Cancer Foundation [NBCFAUS] + the 55 SQUAT challenge, starting on March 1st I will be bloggin my SQUAT journey to #builttheBOOTY:
https://fundraise.nbcf.org.au/fundraisers/renaywells/the-55-squat-challenge
 

    there may be RISKS + challenges:

    Promoting this fundraising endeavour for my business primarily via my LinkedIn professional profile, in addition to via social media for the brand both on instagram, twitter + facebook:
    https://www.facebook.com/missmaneater.designerswimsuits

    I will be updating our target + promoting every second day from these platforms, + if you wish I can also email you directly.  With regular promotion of this fundraising campaign I am to reach the AUD$17,700 required within 17 days. 

    If this tagged is not reached I believe Indiegogo will refund you your contribution.
    However if you would like to retain your order for a particular designer swimsuit +/or boutique bikini, I will honour the % offered off the collection via our website.

    Enabling us to create a NEW highly polished website [+ not one that I have built myself :P] will not only aid our social followers to SHOP insta directly but achieve ease of purchase with a seamless process to ecommerce shopping.
     

    YOU can help:

    Just because you do not need to purchase a designer swimsuit + you may be a LONGTIME follower of the brand....doesNOT mean you can't help by spreading the word + #makesomeNOISE!!!

story:
WHAT IS EVERYWEAR ?

My name is Peewara Jitsukummongkol. I work as Social Designer for Thai Social Enterprise office in Thailand, using design as a tool to solve social problem and create social impact. Everywear is the project to help disability wheelchair users in Thailand to have suitable clothing for their body and routine. To prove that Everywear can be a successful business and help many people, I want  to produce and sell first 100 designed pants to wheelchair users. So I would like to ask for support from everyone who want it to happen in Thailand.


WHY EVERYWEAR?

In Thailand, more than 70,000 people live on wheelchair and more 40,000 people have a paralysis. They have many inconvenience in their lives. Many of them don't want to go out because of lacking facilities and assistants. 

“Everywear”, a project which is supported prototype by Thai Social Enterprise Office, encourages wheelchair users to live their life with designing the cloth which suitable for their body and routine. The project starts by designing 2 special pants for wheelchair users with paralysis, as facilities, giving them easier to move, go out, and do their job. To test the business prototype  I have to get 2,500 USD to produce the first 100 pants and sell it in affordable price in online shop.


EVERYWEAR vs Normal pants

Wheelchair users with paralysis don't feel anything on lower body. They don't use toilet but they use urinary bag  with long rubber tube which obstruct them to move their body. Some normal pants is caused of pressure unclers and smelly. 

Looking is  important as  function, many wheelchair users concern about how do they look?. Most of normal pants,which they can wear, is old fashion and too loose. 

Everywear designs functions to serve wheelchair user's need. The pants is easy to wear by themselves, have a hidden pocket for urinary bag, usable pocket for wallet and mobile phone.  On Everywear pants, they look cool and fashionable.

 I make the pants and sent to disbility wheelchair users in Mahathai Foundation, one of disability foundation in Thailand. 100% of them want this pants and believe they will have better living with this pants. 


What's fund for?

I want to sell the pants in affordable price. 50% of the price will come from wheelchair users and 50% comes from donors. Because most of disabled people in Thailand have low income (The government give them only 15 USD /month/person.  ) So your funding will help me testing this model.


For more information  : www.facebook.com/THEverywear

story:
WHAT IS ATROCIOUS WORKS? 

I started Atrocious Works to support the local scene. I wanted to create a company that could help spread the word of those around me, from bands to local artists. After a few years of running Atrocious Works I wanted to expand that vision and not only endorse up and coming artists, but bring a whole new meaning into today's fashion. 

I know it is very important to be unique and stand out, but most of all to not see the same designs done again and again. A lot of Atrocious Works designs consist of what we see today but flipped. Everything is well thought out and designed by independent artists. There is a need for original designs and styles again in today's fashion world, and Atrocious Works wants to give you just that. 


WHERE DID THE IDEA FORM?

As a lover of the darker styles of art and design, I studied a lot of today's trends, horror references, religion, sex appeal and images that scream in your face for attention. So Atrocious Works was birthed from that alone. I wanted to flip what was trendy and give it a whole new meaning. 

Want a clothing line that will bring you nothing but originality? If the answer was yes, then Atrocious Works is for you.

WHY DOES ATROCIOUS WORKS NEED YOU?

To keep it simple, without your help, this project isn't going to happen. I wanted to give the IndieGoGo community a look at what Atrocious Works has to offer, and what we want to accomplish with your help. Your pledges will help fund the new launch of merchandise. Not only is it going to cover the cost of printing the clothing, it will also help me invest in my own screen printing press, so I can not only save money within my own company, but also help with local artists and bands that are looking to get merchandise printed as well. Eventually I want to expand Atrocious Works into something more. Printing limited edition, holiday themed, seasonal, and of course a full line for women. I want Atrocious Works to be for everyone. In order to do this though, I need your help, back this project and #StayAtrocious



This is what Atrocious Works is about. Thank you for taking the time to check out the IndieGoGo project! If you like what you see, I'd really appreciate your pledges. Every cent helps in the end! If you can not pledge please share around with friends and family. With your support, I'll be one step closer to launching the new Atrocious Works clothing. Again thank you and #StayAtrocious!
