story:
Pony Scarves

Hey Everypony, we’re ready for round 2! Let’s make it even bigger and better than the first campaign. This time we’re featuring Pinkie Pie and Rarity. You may notice some small differences between this campaign and the last one. We were a little naïve in our expectations last time, and there were some miscalculations and some costs we never considered. This time around we’re more experienced and have a more realistic approach and outlook. There are going to be 3-4 separate campaigns over the next several months, each featuring 2 scarves.

We need your help to make our dream a reality!

We have several scarf designs finished and ready to be made into physical scarves, funding is all we are missing. With the purchase of either the Pinkie Pie or Rarity scarf, you will be helping us fund the production. The more people we get to help back this project the more scarves we can have made.

Perks

$1 Brohoof

A digital "brohoof" from the Pony Scarves staff. We will send you a heartfelt thank you email.

$5 I Heart Scarves Pin Set

We will send you a set of “I heart scarves” buttons and list your name on the our website as a backer of Pony Scarves.

Pinkie Pie Scarf

$25 - $50 Pinkie Pie Scarf. The scarf is roughly 7" x 54" and made of 100% acrylic. This donation level has 2 options. Each donation level includes the "I Heart Scarves" pin set and your name listed on the our website as a backer of the Project.
$25 One Pinkie Pie Scarf
$50 Two Pinkie Pie Scarves

Rarity Scarf

$25 - $50 Rarity Scarf. The scarf is roughly 7" x 54" and made of 100% acrylic. This donation level has 2 options. Each donation level includes the "I Heart Scarves" pin set and your name listed on the our website as a backer of the Project.
$25 One Rarity Scarf
$50 Two Rarity Scarves

Mix and Match Scarves

Your choice of 4 or 5 scarves from the 2 designs available. Please indicate in the notes which scarves you would like. The scarf is roughly 7" x 54" and made of 100% acrylic. This donation level has 2 options. Each donation level includes the "I Heart Scarves" pin set and your name listed on the our website as a backer of the Project.
$75 Four Scarves
$100 Five Scarves

For international shipping
1 scarf add $15
2 scarves add $20
4 scarves add $30
5 Scarves add $35


About the Scarves

The scarves we will be providing are made by Sports Scarf, a company based in Massachusetts. They have made plenty of very high quality sought after scarves. Including the ones for Portland's Timbers Army. Below are some images of the quality that goes into every scarf they make.

The production design that sports scarf sent us.

Final product Nightmare Moon Scarf.

About the designer.

I am a Soccer fan, and one of my favorite things about soccer is the plethora of scarves there are. One of the other things I’m really passionate about is My Little Pony Friendship is Magic. On top of being a soccer fan and My Little Pony lover I am also a freelance graphic designer. So I came up with the bright idea of combining three of the joys in my life.

Time for delivery

Once our project has been funded we will inform our scarf manufacturer to start production, at that point it will be 6 - 7 weeks before the scarves will be shipped to your door.

story:
We are back with our most meticulously made watch yet, a true high-end watch to carry the brand into a new segment. E.C.Andersson Calypso is completely custom-designed in-house and equipped with the most reliable Swiss automatic movement on the market.

Campaign already fully funded and production started. That means you can enjoy the same delivery time as our early pre-order customers.

Mounted on a tailor-made calf leather strap with custom-made buckle is a sandblasted watch case with polished bevels that harmoniously swirl around the edges from lug to lug, unique modern indices on a radial gradient dial in semi-gloss ocean blue finish, nesting securely under the specially crafted "Bohuslän" arrow hands. The three-tone, one-of-a-kind rotor is displayed proudly thru the sapphire crystal back-plate, powering the Swiss ETA 2824-2 movement. We are so confident in Calypso’s abilities that we set up a Performance Center just to prove the reliability of each individual watch.

Housed in the 40mm diameter case is a radial gradient dial. The color fading from deep to dark ocean blue with a semi-gloss finish. Housed on top are distinctive polished indices, filled with crisp white illumination, glowing ice-blue at night. On the inner end of the indices, a fine bevel reaches down towards the dial, resulting in a sparkling reflection. At 3 o’clock, you’ll find a date window cut in two layers. 

It’s easy to miss it, but if you look at the case’s chapter-ring, you will find our signature “Enslinje-Pattern” engraved, framing the dial.

The hands on the Calypso was originally designed for the E.C.A Bohuslän watch, where the skeletonized segment of the minute hand made it possible to view the dive bezel right thru. We liked the distinctive look and decided to save the hands for a future model. Turned out, roughly two years later and with appropriate customizing, the hands made a perfect complement to the Calypso, which marks the first customer-watch with hands like these. Of course, you will find the same B3 “ice-blue” illumination here as well.

We’ve always put our company’s future first, both by constantly learning of ways to improve and by investing in higher quality components and equipment. Finally, it was time for us to go fully Swiss by using the famous high-end work-horse, ETA 2824-2 Top Grade automatic movement.

Movement and Rotor, a two-stage rocket that separates us from the competition.

The movement has been regulated to top-tier accuracy and been equipped with our own, in-house designed rotor, presented in a trilogy of color treatments: rose-gold, stainless steel and chalk white. You will have as much time as you want to study the works of the movement thru the AR-coated sapphire crystal. 

Although a totally new design, the case has an iconic look to it. Robust, sporty, yet tastefully classy and perfectly suitable for your any day situations, both in durability and style. Made from sandblasted 316L stainless steel with carefully polished edges that run thru the case like the flow of water.

The E.C.A. Calypso is made pressure proof to 10 atmospheres, 100m water depth, thanks to robust built, solid screw-down crown, and thick sapphire crystal glass on top and bottom of the case.

The link between the lugs is our way to connect your watch to our current and future strap options. It not only looks appealing, the use of a connector link makes the strap sit far more secure than on a conventional watch, thanks to the deep spring bar cut and screw-in bar.

Our own calf-leather straps come standard with your Calypso watch, and you have the option to choose between dark chestnut brown and black, (or both of course!), each having wide-grained alligator texture. The width of the strap is 25mm on top, narrowing down to 20mm on mid to bottom end.

No fake stuffing here - our straps are made flat, mostly because it’s better looking, but also to prevent unnecessary foam stuffing. This makes for a slim and comfortable appearance, measuring 2.8mm, a figure specifically chosen to harmoniously fit the watch’s case.

All straps are equipped with our uni-mold buckle of 316L stainless steel, with a polished base and rugged details below the elevated E.C.A. logo text and solid steel buckle pin.

We promised our first customers to deliver a steel bracelet as an option to the Calypso watch, and of course, you will have the same opportunity. The bracelet is in production and will be ready along with the watch. The computer-rendering above illustrates how it will look.

Solid-link steel bracelet. 316L sandblasted stainless steel base, polished mid-links, and beveled edges, all equipped with a folding deployment clasp. All preparations are made to ensure the steel bracelet is delivered along with your watch, if you chose this option.

We care just as much for the watch’s inside as we do for the exterior. Simply, we are not content by the bare knowledge that our watches run correctly, we want detailed numbers of how the watch performs. That’s why we have set up our own performance center, where we measure amplitude, beats error, accuracy, magnetic and pressure resistance in detail. More importantly, we have the tools to perfect those attributes.

When receiving your E.C.Andersson Calypso, there will be a direct transcript print-out from our Timegrapher inside the box. This will show you all detailed facts about accuracy and the well-being of your individual timepiece. Even if you don’t care right now, such information can be both exciting and soothing to have stored. Attached to the transcript is a description of all values, so you can learn more about them. 

We would never send a watch that doesn’t perform absolutely perfect.

The packaging is a vital part of the experience, and of course, we designed the box ourselves as well. 

Made out of wood, coated in a matte deep-blue finish with silver powder and polished logotype, the box makes a perfect match to the E.C.A Calypso watch. Inside, you’ll find a white leather lining, a pouch for important attachment, such as manual, timegraph transcript and E.C.Andersson Club details. In center, of course, is your watch resting on a leather pillow, attached to a custom made hang-tag.

We aim to be a respected, well-known name in the watch community. That means that everything we do has to be completely over-the-top professional. To us, a custom designed hang-tag dots the I’s and symbolizes that dedication, no matter how silly it may sound.

The Hang-tag is your printed proof that the E.C.A. Calypso watch is protected by three full years of warranty. It also bears the name of our watches origin, Göteborg, where all development, testing and quality assurance is located.

The base color of the tag is sandblasted in deep blue with an elevated text of polished silver finish, perfectly reflecting the Calypso dial.

This is an opportunity for you to receive a true high-end watch that will last a lifetime, for a fraction of the price compared to competing brands in the segment, and for 35% less than future listing price starting June. Furthermore, your contribution will help us continue to be one of the few serious independent watch brands out there, and to an exciting future of watchmaking that includes. 

Funding goal has already been reached, meaning all risks are eliminated by the wonderful people who pledged for the earliest pre-orders. This means production has already begun and delivery is guaranteed to all customers.

 Our philosophy is simple and can be described in a single sentence:  

Creating versatile watches with high quality, developed to endure all challenges, occasions, and environments in your daily life. Raised into a proud tradition of sailing, we strive to create watches that match both the harsh climate out at sea and the more formal, social environment once docked in harbor. A people’s brand, fitting most wallets, without compromising quality. Always mechanical automatic, made of durable materials with a progressive, yet sophisticated design.  

Watches made to endure You

The Scandinavian way of design is clean, sophisticated, functional and durable. Northerners simply enjoy products that will last, both in quality and style. E.C.Andersson Watch Co. has embodied the Scandinavian design language, not by studying it, but as a given natural course. Having its head office in Gothenburg, E.C.Andersson Watch Co. is based in the center of Scandinavia, surrounded by the natural beauty of northern climate. The salty ocean winds consistently reminding us of the relentless Northern Sea, pushing its waves up Sweden’s rocky shores, and the breathing pine forests, howling of natural wildlife. 

We are Scandinavia
story_txt: We are back with our most meticulously made watch yet, a true high-end watch to carry the brand into a new segment. E.C.Andersson Calypso is completely custom-designed in-house and equipped with the most reliable Swiss automatic movement on the market.Campaign already fully funded and production started. That means you can enjoy the same delivery time as our early pre-order customers.Mounted on a tailor-made calf leather strap with custom-made buckle is a sandblasted watch case with polished bevels that harmoniously swirl around the edges from lug to lug, unique modern indices on a radial gradient dial in semi-gloss ocean blue finish, nesting securely under the specially crafted "Bohuslän" arrow hands. The three-tone, one-of-a-kind rotor is displayed proudly thru the sapphire crystal back-plate, powering the Swiss ETA 2824-2 movement. We are so confident in Calypso’s abilities that we set up a Performance Center just to prove the reliability of each individual watch.Housed in the 40mm diameter case is a radial gradient dial. The color fading from deep to dark ocean blue with a semi-gloss finish. Housed on top are distinctive polished indices, filled with crisp white illumination, glowing ice-blue at night. On the inner end of the indices, a fine bevel reaches down towards the dial, resulting in a sparkling reflection. At 3 o’clock, you’ll find a date window cut in two layers. It’s easy to miss it, but if you look at the case’s chapter-ring, you will find our signature “Enslinje-Pattern” engraved, framing the dial.The hands on the Calypso was originally designed for the E.C.A Bohuslän watch, where the skeletonized segment of the minute hand made it possible to view the dive bezel right thru. We liked the distinctive look and decided to save the hands for a future model. Turned out, roughly two years later and with appropriate customizing, the hands made a perfect complement to the Calypso, which marks the first customer-watch with hands like these. Of course, you will find the same B3 “ice-blue” illumination here as well.We’ve always put our company’s future first, both by constantly learning of ways to improve and by investing in higher quality components and equipment. Finally, it was time for us to go fully Swiss by using the famous high-end work-horse, ETA 2824-2 Top Grade automatic movement.Movement and Rotor, a two-stage rocket that separates us from the competition.The movement has been regulated to top-tier accuracy and been equipped with our own, in-house designed rotor, presented in a trilogy of color treatments: rose-gold, stainless steel and chalk white. You will have as much time as you want to study the works of the movement thru the AR-coated sapphire crystal. Although a totally new design, the case has an iconic look to it. Robust, sporty, yet tastefully classy and perfectly suitable for your any day situations, both in durability and style. Made from sandblasted 316L stainless steel with carefully polished edges that run thru the case like the flow of water.The E.C.A. Calypso is made pressure proof to 10 atmospheres, 100m water depth, thanks to robust built, solid screw-down crown, and thick sapphire crystal glass on top and bottom of the case.The link between the lugs is our way to connect your watch to our current and future strap options. It not only looks appealing, the use of a connector link makes the strap sit far more secure than on a conventional watch, thanks to the deep spring bar cut and screw-in bar.Our own calf-leather straps come standard with your Calypso watch, and you have the option to choose between dark chestnut brown and black, (or both of course!), each having wide-grained alligator texture. The width of the strap is 25mm on top, narrowing down to 20mm on mid to bottom end.No fake stuffing here - our straps are made flat, mostly because it’s better looking, but also to prevent unnecessary foam stuffing. This makes for a slim and comfortable appearance, measuring 2.8mm, a figure specifically chosen to harmoniously fit the watch’s case.All straps are equipped with our uni-mold buckle of 316L stainless steel, with a polished base and rugged details below the elevated E.C.A. logo text and solid steel buckle pin.We promised our first customers to deliver a steel bracelet as an option to the Calypso watch, and of course, you will have the same opportunity. The bracelet is in production and will be ready along with the watch. The computer-rendering above illustrates how it will look.Solid-link steel bracelet. 316L sandblasted stainless steel base, polished mid-links, and beveled edges, all equipped with a folding deployment clasp. All preparations are made to ensure the steel bracelet is delivered along with your watch, if you chose this option.We care just as much for the watch’s inside as we do for the exterior. Simply, we are not content by the bare knowledge that our watches run correctly, we want detailed numbers of how the watch performs. That’s why we have set up our own performance center, where we measure amplitude, beats error, accuracy, magnetic and pressure resistance in detail. More importantly, we have the tools to perfect those attributes.When receiving your E.C.Andersson Calypso, there will be a direct transcript print-out from our Timegrapher inside the box. This will show you all detailed facts about accuracy and the well-being of your individual timepiece. Even if you don’t care right now, such information can be both exciting and soothing to have stored. Attached to the transcript is a description of all values, so you can learn more about them. We would never send a watch that doesn’t perform absolutely perfect.The packaging is a vital part of the experience, and of course, we designed the box ourselves as well. Made out of wood, coated in a matte deep-blue finish with silver powder and polished logotype, the box makes a perfect match to the E.C.A Calypso watch. Inside, you’ll find a white leather lining, a pouch for important attachment, such as manual, timegraph transcript and E.C.Andersson Club details. In center, of course, is your watch resting on a leather pillow, attached to a custom made hang-tag.We aim to be a respected, well-known name in the watch community. That means that everything we do has to be completely over-the-top professional. To us, a custom designed hang-tag dots the I’s and symbolizes that dedication, no matter how silly it may sound.The Hang-tag is your printed proof that the E.C.A. Calypso watch is protected by three full years of warranty. It also bears the name of our watches origin, Göteborg, where all development, testing and quality assurance is located.The base color of the tag is sandblasted in deep blue with an elevated text of polished silver finish, perfectly reflecting the Calypso dial.This is an opportunity for you to receive a true high-end watch that will last a lifetime, for a fraction of the price compared to competing brands in the segment, and for 35% less than future listing price starting June. Furthermore, your contribution will help us continue to be one of the few serious independent watch brands out there, and to an exciting future of watchmaking that includes. Funding goal has already been reached, meaning all risks are eliminated by the wonderful people who pledged for the earliest pre-orders. This means production has already begun and delivery is guaranteed to all customers. Our philosophy is simple and can be described in a single sentence:  Creating versatile watches with high quality, developed to endure all challenges, occasions, and environments in your daily life. Raised into a proud tradition of sailing, we strive to create watches that match both the harsh climate out at sea and the more formal, social environment once docked in harbor. A people’s brand, fitting most wallets, without compromising quality. Always mechanical automatic, made of durable materials with a progressive, yet sophisticated design.  Watches made to endure YouThe Scandinavian way of design is clean, sophisticated, functional and durable. story:
After manufacturing G-SOCKS, we carried out various pretests targeting people with different feet sizes, and here are those reviews.

 

 

 

Last summer, you would probably get stressed from socks that sagged and slipped down into your shoes under the scorching sun.  

You have probably have bought them because it was advertised as “Never-Slip"    

Why do we have to get stressed from such drooping, slipping socks?   

 

Yes, we focused on a size of socks, as one of the reasons why no show socks slip off that easily. 

 

 

Most socks on the market are made as only one "free size" for all, no matter people have smaller or bigger feet.   

People have different shapes and sizes of feet. But does free size really fit all? 

 

 

Our conclusion is, that free size actually does not fit all and therefore is not comfortable because of a lot of variables, like different shapes and sizes of feet, for example, big or small, wide or narrow. And slip also starts from this inconvenience.   

Then, can socks have varied sizes?

 

 

G-SOCKS will bring you comfort to your feet. Non-slip socks can be realized by comfort that only the right size for your own feet could bring.  

It is available in four different sizes and stylish unisex designs both for men and women, with the optimized wearability.

 

Now, what you have to do is just to choose your right sizes. And G-SOCKS will bring you comfort to your feet.

 

The next step after choosing the right size is colors, 

 

 

 

 

 

We found most colors chosen for socks are simply black and white, in spite of a wide spectrum of colors available in the world.

 

 

Because black and white colors go well with any style of outfits, like suit and casual, and any style of shoes, such as dress shoes and sneakers, in any places.

 

 

 

However, you probably thought that all would have been fine if it didn't slip off, but...

Last summer, slip was not the only problem.

 

 

Many of you would have got stressed from socks that slide down into your shoes under the sizzling sun.

 

 

Or, you may have an experience to try to hide your big toe that pokes out of your sock when you have to take your shoes off.

Well, looking back on last summer brings us memories about so much stresses from socks that easily slide down and get holes.

 

 

 

 

 

 

What you have to do is just to choose your size and color, and G-SOCKS will handle the rest for you.

 

 

 

SILICONE GRIP

 

 

4 Silicone grips at the heel side to fix socks tightly and keep them in position while walking.

 

ELASTIC BANDING

 

 

Elastic band at the middle sole to prevent socks from slipping off and twisting.

 

DUAL BANDING

 

Dual band at the heel side to fix four silicone to the heels in order to prevent socks from slipping off.

 

THICKNESS & DURABILITY

 

 

G-SOCKS guarantees greater durability and wearability with any kind of shoes, like sneakers or dress shoes, as cotton yarn is used more than twice. 

 

 

 LOW CUT LINER

 

 

With a low cut design, it is not exposed beyond shoes, making you look cool and stylish.

 

SIZE INDICATION

 

 

Various sizes, S, M, L, and XL, marked in each sock for great wearability and convenience to easily match pairs of socks after washing.

 

 

NON-SLIP

G-SOCKS available in four different sizes, with advanced elastic bands, four silicone grips, and dual bands, will bring our supporters great comfort free from slipping down.

 

 

NO-SHOW

 

Low cut liner for cool summer style

 

WEARING SENSATION

 

 

Thanks to a great amount of breathable cotton yarn used, G-SOCKS is highly wearable with appropriate thickness and also absorbs sweat quickly.

 

UNISEX DESIGN

 

 

 

As an unisex design both for men and women, you choose just the right size for your feet, and experience the optimized comfort.

 

G-SOCKS MAKING STORY

 

G-SOCKS is made of the highest quality yarn, instead of easily destroyed inferior one.

 

 

High quality yarn goes through a knitting process to build an overall shape of sock with both ends open, and knitted socks pass to a sewing process to stitch up open side for toes. And after fabricating and toll processing, it becomes premium Non-slip G-SOCKS.

 

 

 

 

 

 

SPECIFICATIONS of G-SOCKS

 

  • Brand : G-SOCKS
  • Colors : Black, White
  • Size : S(220~240mm), M(245~260mm), L(265~275mm), XL(280~310mm)
  • Materials : Cotton 80%, Polyester 15%, Spandex 5%
  • Made In Korea

 

Why do we need your support


 

We planned a project to design socks that literally fit for all feet in various sizes, to improve daily inconvenience that people with different sizes of feet have to wear one size only, and finally came up with G-SOCKS. And we decided to start crowdfundiing in Kickstarter to make functional socks in various sizes so that people could find their right size and achieve foot comfort.

 

PERKS

 

 

TIMELINE

 

   

 

  • 2018.09  Production planning of G-Socks
  • 2018. 10  Development Starts
  • 2018. 12   Prototypes tested
  • 2019. 03  Prototype testing completed
  • 2019. 07  Launch of INDIEGOGO Campaign
  • 2019. 08  Production begins
  • 2019. 09  Shipping from the end of Aug

 

DELIVERY

 
  • G-Socks products will have individual packaging for delivery. 
  • Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other applicable country taxes. Backers are responsible    for any and all import fees, VAT, duties, taxes, post office fees and or any other fees their       country or government imposes.
  • Once the delivery starts, we will provide tracking numbers for all the backers.

 

 

About Us

 

Hello from ORCHARD!

 

 

ORCHARD is a company established to design and make a variety of innovative items to improve inconveniences that we have just accepted into our daily lives without question.    

Under the motto "Better Idea, Better Life", we will design and make various products for advanced lifestyle.

story:
Our mission

Where’s Mom was born from our dream about connectivity and a more sustainable fashion industry. We need new fashion standards to balance between fashion's overpriced prestige and underpaid workers. We're here to create quality products at the foundation of every family’s wardrobe. We specialise in one product in addition to do it really well and we want to embrace the connectivity between people with the printed patterns we design.  

 

Where’s Mom's first collection

We both have always been fascinated by the wonders and mysteries of Space. From the vast emptiness of the stars to the possibility of a rich alien life, there's so much to learn and appreciate about our Universe. We've found this to be a perfect metaphor to our desire. We want to connect with the world by discovering and creating the values of tomorrow’s fashion. 

The patterns you see printed on our clothes are the result of unfolding our fantasy around the shapes and symbols of Space.

Shirts are essentials. Non seasonal clothes, made of breathable and sustainable fabrics for any kind of occasion. With the custom printed details you can distinctively  match your outfit with your friends or family members.

The collection contains:

A denim shirt for men.



White shirt with printed details for men.



Denim shirtdress for women.



Denim shirtdress for girls. (Age 4-8)



Baby bodies with 2 different style. (Girl & boy)


 

Where's Mom signature postcards

We find that it is such a romantic gesture to send a postcard these days. To write clichés and cheesy messages that later the postman can read. It's fun when it arrives days after you've already came home and in our digital world you really know someone went above their heads if he or she sends a postcard to you.

Our postcards are also inspired by Space and are made of recycled paper.
Find the right mood for your loved ones and sent them a fun and supportive message!

Our story

Where's Mom is made by two people. Dóra Kovács (W) is an award-winning fashion designer who after her experiences in both high and fast fashion brands decided to make a shift. Her dream of a more conscious and open-minded consumer culture starts by creating a brand that cares about sustainability issues and tries to deal with the toxic and wasteful routine that the fashion industry has.

Joining her is Miklós Esterházy (M) who brings his visual creativity to use with the patterns and postcards he designed for the collection and the videos he created.

Our campaign pictures were shot by Richárd Kovács who is a talented student of London School of Fashion. We were helped and advised by a lot of lovely people including Erika Szabó who is consulting with us about the business side of production and Attila Ács who made our brand visuals.

We oversee everything, we are personally in contact with our suppliers. There's no middlemen or faceless corporations taking their cuts.

We want to make sure that our backers understand how much work and care goes into the making of these shirts. So see below what we are doing exactly to ensure you the product that costs as much as it looks.

 

Challenges of creating a sustainable brand



The issue of sustainability impacts our production process at every level. We want our consumers to understand how, so they can make an informed choice.
Costing something 10 euros actually has a high price. And short clothing lifetimes are generating more demand and more waste. Spending on quality products that last longer is the key. This change is necessary, we see it happening in other sectors. We people have started buying organic food, using energy saving light bulbs, driving hybrid cars, yet we don't care how much waste and misery we cause the world by buying cheap clothes.
In order to change that Where's Mom are doing the followings:

Sourcing materials responsibly

It was really difficult to find the right supplier. We had a lot of questions and sometimes we didn't get our answers. Finally we found an Italian company, who produces high quality shirt fabrics. They have an environmentally friendly production process and they use green energy in their mills. They have complete control of all production stages, that’s how they can guarantee the traceability of every meter of fabric. The greatest attention is paid to saving water, energy and chemicals, in order to reduce the environmental impact of the industrial process.
Of course comparing a fabric coming from Asia, a quality textile coming from a monitored source from Europe is more expensive. You can't compete with prices that are created by using underpaid workers under miserable circumstances. And as a matter a fact you don't have to.

Printing technology

We are working with a French company who helped us developing our sample collection for our campaign. They have a long history and a OEKO-TEX® certificate for printing materials. The more intensive the skin contact of a product and the more sensitive the skin, the stricter are the human-ecological requirements that need to be complied with for that kind of certification.

Producing locally

After the sample collection was made and was photographed we went on finding the company that can produce on a larger scale. When we decide on using a certain company we have an obligation and a responsibility to get to know their methods first. The cutting and sewing of our shirt are done in Hungary. We have the opportunity to go there in person and check the circumstances and also the quality of their work. Making one garment needs many people. From the farmers to those women making the last stiches, everyone is working very hard in this industry. It is really amazing to get to know as many people involved as possible.



Buttons of the future

We use very special kind of button made from Corozo, the seed of a certain kind of palm tree. It is a 100% natural product, its consistency is similar to hard resin. It's non-toxic, child safe and will not crack or splinter. The buttons are made in Panama where they have a completely sustainable and non toxic process. The only additives they use are organic plant based dyes.
 

Packaging and shipping

Our packaging is made 100% from recycled paper and has a lot less impact on the environment. But in terms of shipping it is hard to enforce sustainability since we have to use the same logistics and networks that everyone else uses.


 

Our campaign - Opening up a dialogue

 

We are on a journey to build a sustainable company. It means we have to take on the tough issues. We've learned a lot and we still some further left. Transparency and traceability means for us to have an accurate picture of the ethical  and environmental impact of our product.
We want to open a dialogue and create a more honest brand experience.
We hope our customers will respond positively to our efforts and help motivate and drive us to keep doing better.

With your contribution here at Indiegogo you'll help us continue developments and make validation for the future of this company.

If you would love to know more about us, don’t hesitate to contact us.
We would love to hear your opinion too!

info@whereismom.hu


Thank you very much for supporting Where's Mom!


We would like for everyone to find their right size with the help of this size chart. If you have any questions regarding your size, feel free to ask us! The measures are in centimeters.

We want to make sure that our backers understand how much work and care goes into the making of these shirts. So see below what we are doing exactly to ensure you the product that costs as much as it looks.
 
Challenges of creating a sustainable brand
The issue of sustainability impacts our production process at every level. We want our consumers to understand how, so they can make an informed choice.Costing something 10 euros actually has a high price. And short clothing lifetimes are generating more demand and more waste. Spending on quality products that last longer is the key. This change is necessary, we see it happening in other sectors. We people have started buying organic food, using energy saving light bulbs, driving hybrid cars, yet we don't care how much waste and misery we cause the world by buying cheap clothes.In order to change that Where's Mom are doing the followings:
Sourcing materials responsibly
It was really difficult to find the right supplier. We had a lot of questions and sometimes we didn't get our answers. Finally we found an Italian company, who produces high quality shirt fabrics. They have an environmentally friendly production process and they use green energy in their mills. They have complete control of all production stages, that’s how they can guarantee the traceability of every meter of fabric. The greatest attention is paid to saving water, energy and chemicals, in order to reduce the environmental impact of the industrial process.Of course comparing a fabric coming from Asia, a quality textile coming from a monitored source from Europe is more expensive. You can't compete with prices that are created by using underpaid workers under miserable circumstances. And as a matter a fact you don't have to.
Printing technology
We are working with a French company who helped us developing our sample collection for our campaign. They have a long history and a OEKO-TEX® certificate for printing materials. The more intensive the skin contact of a product and the more sensitive the skin, the stricter are the human-ecological requirements that need to be complied with for that kind of certification.
Producing locally
After the sample collection was made and was photographed we went on finding the company that can produce on a larger scale. When we decide on using a certain company we have an obligation and a responsibility to get to know their methods first. The cutting and sewing of our shirt are done in Hungary. We have the opportunity to go there in person and check the circumstances and also the quality of their work. Making one garment needs many people. From the farmers to those women making the last stiches, everyone is working very hard in this industry. It is really amazing to get to know as many people involved as possible.Buttons of the futureWe use very special kind of button made from Corozo, the seed of a certain kind of palm tree. It is a 100% natural product, its consistency is similar to hard resin. It's non-toxic, child safe and will not crack or splinter. The buttons are made in Panama where they have a completely sustainable and non toxic process. The only additives they use are organic plant based dyes. 
Packaging and shipping
Our packaging is made 100% from recycled paper and has a lot less impact on the environment. But in terms of shipping it is hard to enforce sustainability since we have to use the same logistics and networks that everyone else uses. 
Our campaign - Opening up a dialogue
 
We are on a journey to build a sustainable company. It means we have to take on the tough issues. We've learned a lot and we still some further left. Transparency and traceability means for us to have an accurate picture of the ethical  and environmental impact of our product.We want to open a dialogue and create a more honest brand experience.We hope our customers will respond positively to our efforts and help motivate and drive us to keep doing better.
With your contribution here at Indiegogo you'll help us continue developments and make validation for the future of this company.If you would love to know more about us, don’t hesitate to contact us.We would love to hear your opinion too!info@whereismom.hu
Thank you very much for supporting Where's Mom!We would like for everyone to find their right size with the help of this size chart. If you have any questions regarding your size, feel free to ask us! The measures are in centimeters.

story:
We see a problem and we want to fix it

It’s not difficult to fall in love with a minimalist design. Science tells us that we see beauty in simple symmetry. The minimalist aesthetic is something that appeals to many. Here lies the problem.

You buy a nice watch. Your new watch attracts compliments and admiration from everyone. The problem is – it’s too easy to like. Before long, everyone else has one. You attend a party and there are than two people wearing the exact same watch. That’s not cool, and this happens all too often with popular brands.

Enter Anonymous Wares. 

What we do differently

If you’re reading this, you probably like minimalist watches like we do. We want to change the rules of the watch scene. We will work directly with independent designers to bring you new models produced in limited production runs not exceeding 1000 pieces per model. Each watch we produce will be serial-numbered so no two watches will ever be the same. 


Designs you'll love

We designed these watches over the past year to be versatile and classy with a minimalist feel. After months of design revisions and sample production, we finally chose a reputable manufacturer to produce our designs. Using many of the same (if not better) materials found in our competitors, our watches are built to look good and work reliably. 


The case is made from high quality stainless steel, rated water resistant up to 5ATM. It is 40 mm wide and 8 mm thin. From our tests, this is the optimal size for most wrists. 


Our watches feature a domed crystal over its face. The convex surface of the glass makes it tougher and more scratch resistant.


On the inside, we chose the incredibly durable Miyota 2035 movement. It's made in Japan and built to last. Powered by a single battery that lasts for years, this watch is both beautiful and low-maintenance. 



Presenting our first two models

001 comes with either a brown or black leather strap.


002 comes with either a brown or black raised leather strap.



We need your help!

By backing us, you're not just buying a watch. You are buying true exclusivity, and that is priceless.
The funds raised here will go towards funding our first (and only) production runs for our first two models. Both are based off the same case and you can get either one (or two! or three!)
As a way of saying thanks to our early subscribers, we are offering an early bird perk which gives you an additional strap. 

Other ways to help

A watch like this makes a great gift. Perhaps you know someone who will be interested. 

For a small brand like us, word-of-mouth is essential and we would be infinitely grateful if you could get the word out and share/tweet/post anything about us.

story:
The two sets of blades have a good flatness and high precision grinding,  matched with 18 double layer blades.

The result is that the razor is more tightly fitted to the face without stubble, and the shaving is short and thorough.

Ultra thin precision blades shave the beard (and not only) comfortably and thoroughly counter directional inner blades offer a quite shaving with reduced vibrations.

story:
The Scotch of Style

 

Bespoke Style Braces - No Tailor Required

 

Traditional suspenders, “braces” for the sartorially inclined, are like the Scotch of Style.

The way the leather transitions the linen straps to your waistband is timeless, but unless you have your own tailor you most likely think they’re reserved for A-list actors or high finance.

The suspenders you wore to your best friend’s wedding felt more like a novelty; cheap elastic and tacky metal clips shimmer while yanking up, awkwardly, on your waistband.  You certainly didn’t feel like Marlon Brando in “A Streetcar Named Desire.”

Stratton Suspender Company has bridged this gap between the timeless look of traditional button-on braces without the hassle of tailoring.

 

Men's fashion accessories serve a purpose, they project confidence, competence, and personality; they are functional, functional to the narrative you tell about who you are before you even say a word.

 

Stratton Suspender Co. uses a Patent Pending “Modular Twin-Magnetic Clasp System” to give the user the look of traditional button-on suspenders with the convenience of clips; yet with a comfort and versatility unmatched in history.

 

  • The magnets are more than strong enough, we could have gotten away with half the magnet clasps but it would not have that classic look.
  • Guaranteed to not come off or your money back.

 

More than that, the modularity of Stratton Suspenders allows you to interchange different straps adding an entirely new dimension to men’s style.

One set of Stratton Suspenders guarantees you’ll have the perfect look for any occasion.

 

Nothing too showy, mind you (the goal isn't to look like a peacock), but just noticeable enough so that a trained eye can recognize - and admire - the finer points of what makes your style special.

 

Stratton Suspenders - The Subtlety is Magnetic

Traditional button-on suspenders appeal to a certain kind of man, the capable, confident, and in control.

 

The perfect intersection of form and function - Stratton Suspenders

 

This powerhouse accessory defines many of Hollywood’s most iconic roles.  So what is it about these classic suspenders that leave such an impression?

  • Suspenders reinforce good posture, reminding the user to pull his shoulders back and down, opening the chest up for a more commanding and confident presence.
  • Suspenders streamline your torso making you appear taller, unlike a belt, which chops your torso in half.
  • Suits were never made for belts. The buckle at the opening of your suit coat creates a distraction in an otherwise sleek, natural look.
  • The vertical suspender straps make your shoulders appear broader.
  • Traditional button-on suspenders use a twin-button leather attachment instead of the distracting eyesores that are metal clips.
  • The Leather enhances any style, you can dress it up or down; leather goes with everything and is ideal for any occasion.

But the real reason, the only reason that matters, is that traditional button-on suspenders signal irreverence.

 

We are grown-ups now - Now we can dress like it, even in a t-shirt

 

You don’t seek permission; you set the tone.  You don’t crave acceptance with brand names plastered across your chest.  You’re you; you wear plain t-shirts, jeans, and well-tailored suits.

People are drawn to the way you make the ordinary look extraordinary.

 

An Austin Original

 

Convenient Style - No Tailor Required

Having just sang the praises of the look of traditional button-on suspenders/braces, there’s one glaring problem, and it has more to do with our modern lifestyle than anything.

Men tend to value convenience over style, but the two don’t have to be mutually exclusive.

 

Stratton Suspenders hopes to give men a reason to get creative with their style again - Get the look you love with the convenience you need without a tailor.​

 

You want the look of traditional button-on suspenders, but the thought of having to choose which pants are going to be your “suspender pants,” and then taking them to a tailor only to lose a button later makes this option not worth most men’s time or effort.

The market is awash with patents attempting to solve this problem, but in every case the cure is worse than the disease.

The last project I funded through Kickstarter was exactly what I needed to bridge the gap.  I had patented a magnetic clasp with the ideal magnet and enclosure to provide maximum pull force without compromising on the strength of material.  I just didn’t realize the best use for my creation was in fashion not fitness.

 

Product Testing Day - The Magnets are PLENTY Strong Enough

 

They Told Us It Wouldn't Work - So We Had To Do It Ourselves

“We’ve taken a look at your drawings and your description and our designers said that it won’t work.” - Largest Fashion and Design Product Development and Production Company in Texas

This was the reply I received after submitting my design and product description to a fashion product developer specializing in prototypes for fashion start-ups.

 

"Quit Lyin'?! It totally works!"

 

Years of research into magnets and textiles had uniquely positioned me to see an opportunity in the men’s accessory industry that no one in fashion could.

The twin-magnetic clasp of Stratton Suspenders is the product of a lot of trial and error in finding the perfect magnet, covering, and casing to ensure proper strength.

 

Exact Design Delivered to the "Experts..."

 

Stratton Suspenders are so strong that they are comparable to the strongest clip-on suspenders, but with the soft mesh inside they will not rip the waistband of your dress pants like the sharp teeth of clips.

 

Custom Leather - Handpicked, Handmade, and Hand Stitched in Austin, Texas

 

Modularity - Any Style, Any Setting

After the “suits” at the big textile manufacturers told us it couldn’t be done, and then we did it, and having them turn out incredible, we decided to go all in.

Each pair of Stratton Suspenders is handmade at our Austin studio in the heart of Texas.  This affords us a great deal of flexibility in patterns and styles, the kind of customization we could never afford with a manufacturer.

But how do we translate that into something truly value-added to our customers?

 

Stratton Suspenders' unique modular design allows the user to remove the straps and interchange a color or pattern more befitting to your specific circumstance.

 

Well, the Stratton Suspenders “Modular Twin-Magnetic Clasp” is exactly that, modular.  The drop down leather “tongue” with stud is removable from the suspender strap itself, and the “ears” (the twin-magnetic clasp) are removable from the drop-down tongue.

 

We will be taking custom "Wedding Runs" to make sure your Wedding is seamless

 

This allows our customer the unique ability to purchase multiple “Stratton Suspender” straps without having to purchase an additional set of magnetic clasps.

 

Continually releasing new small batch, limited run colors and patterns to build your collection for any occasion.

 

We will constantly be updating our strap patterns and fabrics so our customers can continue to mix and match the straps and leather for the perfect look for any occasion.

 

The Classic Bespoke Look of Leather and Linen

Stratton Suspenders were designed with versatility in mind, and that is our commitment.  The leather and linen straps of Stratton Suspenders will never be “out of style.”

 

Not only is it much comfortable than the constricting feeling of a belt and tie, but let's be honest? It looks much better!

 

The actual straps of Stratton Suspenders are made out of woven linen fabric; very rare in today’s world of “fast fashion” and cheap trends.

 

Leather and Linen - Goes with anything, you get the picture.

 

The linen fabric in addition to the leather clasps are what give Stratton Suspenders that classic bespoke look that allows them to be worn with just about anything stylists would consider a man’s “staple” wardrobe.

 

Whatever you're doin', you'll be doin' it right...

Suspenders can make formal more casual or casual more formal.

 

 

Dress up a t-shirt in the heat or use them in place of a vest and tie for comfort.  You can wear them up over your shoulders or down depending on the mood.  Suspenders offer men exactly what they want, versatility.

 

T-shirts have just become "Business Casual."

 

What makes Stratton Suspenders so unique is its potential to add an entirely new dimension to men’s style that hasn’t existed?

 

Fireman Style

 

Aside from the different colors, patterns, and leather; Stratton Suspenders, due to the twin-magnetic clasp design, allows the user to slide the straps off of the shoulders wearing them down, falling directly over the waistband naturally, just like the aforementioned photo of Marlon Brando in “A Streetcar Named Desire.”

 

Closing Time at Old Gruene Hall

 

PRE-ORDER - Choose Your Strap and Leather Combination

Choose your Leather and Linen Strap Combination as per your Reward tier - You can mix and match any leather with any strap.

 

ABOVE: Tan (Light Brown) Leather with Beige Linen Straps

 

ABOVE: Cognac Brown Leather with Blue Linen Straps

 

Black Leather with Black Linen Straps

 

The Most Popular Groomsman Accessory Just Got A Huge Upgrade

When we think suspenders in the U.S. we think… Weddings, and yes, while suspenders are excellent wedding accessories (in place of vests/waistcoats), Stratton Suspenders make for the most impressive groomsman accessory while doubling as the perfect groomsman gift.

 

Custom Wedding Patterns with Personalized Leatherwork on the back patch

 

Look, "Always the Groomsman, never the Groom" has plenty of hip-flasks and pocket knives...​

 

Ladies, the guys in your wedding are going to look great, and gentlemen, your groomsmen, they're going to love them.

Outside of weddings, Stratton Suspenders are perfect for just about anything, from Wall Street in Manhattan to 6th Street in Austin.  It’s the Scotch of Style.

 

 

Keep Creating - It's What Brings Us Together

 

 

Thank You to Everyone Who Helped Make this Project a Reality!

 

Our vision has always been, no matter your background, where you work, or what you like to do for fun; Stratton Suspenders will make you look and feel great.

 

 

At Stratton Suspender Co. we’re NOT simply giving you new elastic patterns in another attempt to reintroduce a trend that’s already proven to fail. Stratton Suspenders have actually succeeded where myriads of other larger companies have failed over the last century.

 

 

Stratton Suspender Co. is completely doing away with that awful clip idea altogether, we’re also not entertaining a spin on leather straps (ears) with clips on the ends made to simply look like tailored button-on suspenders because let’s be honest, you’re not fooling anyone. Stratton Suspenders is creating something new, fresh, with the traditional masculine leather style of the tailored button-on suspenders without the need for a tailor or having to choose which pants will be your “suspender pants.”

 

 

Please Follow us On Social Media for Updates and New Patterns as We Begin the Fulfillment Process!

http://www.strattonsuspenders.com

story:
*Please note this feature is not applicable to Vintage Leather Cufflinks.

Hand-Sewn Saddle Stitching vs Machine Lock Stitching

Hand-sewn saddle stitching uses the “running stitch” technique that offers a stronger construction for our products. Technically, hand-stitched line uses a single thread with needle on both end. Two independent thread intertwine with each other that will not unravel. As a result, the leather will not be separated even if one side of the thread happens to break.

In contrast, other products made by sewing machine with the “lock stitch” technique is more vulnerable since the entire thread will potentially unravel if the thread happens to break, as a result, separate the leather pieces.

EDGES 

All of the edges of our products are carefully painted, burnished and polished by our professional crafters, using heat and friction, to create a stiff, smooth and shiny edges. The robust edges protect the stitching and lead to durability. 

 

Hi, we’re the team of THE RAW, Louis and Cherie. We are two working professionals who are impressed by the handcrafting culture and obsessed with the finest handcrafted leather goods.

We appreciate for your interest in our first Kickstarter project and we hope that you would share our ideas and visions of promoting the culture of using handcrafted leather products.

We aim at connecting with more potential and professional crafters around the world to join THE RAW CRAFTERS and we are grateful to have your support in our co-branding idea.

If you are interested in reaching us, feel free to contact us via Kickstarter direct message. We are excited to hear from you and share our story and idea with you.

Thank you.

 

Thank you for your support
story_txt:
*Please note this feature is not applicable to Vintage Leather Cufflinks.

Hand-Sewn Saddle Stitching vs Machine Lock Stitching
Hand-sewn saddle stitching uses the “running stitch” technique that offers a stronger construction for our products. Technically, hand-stitched line uses a single thread with needle on both end. Two independent thread intertwine with each other that will not unravel. As a result, the leather will not be separated even if one side of the thread happens to break.
In contrast, other products made by sewing machine with the “lock stitch” technique is more vulnerable since the entire thread will potentially unravel if the thread happens to break, as a result, separate the leather pieces.

EDGES 

All of the edges of our products are carefully painted, burnished and polished by our professional crafters, using heat and friction, to create a stiff, smooth and shiny edges. The robust edges protect the stitching and lead to durability. 


 

Hi, we’re the team of THE RAW, Louis and Cherie. We are two working professionals who are impressed by the handcrafting culture and obsessed with the finest handcrafted leather goods.
We appreciate for your interest in our first Kickstarter project and we hope that you would share our ideas and visions of promoting the culture of using handcrafted leather products.
We aim at connecting with more potential and professional crafters around the world to join THE RAW CRAFTERS and we are grateful to have your support in our co-branding idea.
If you are interested in reaching us, feel free to contact us via Kickstarter direct message. We are excited to hear from you and share our story and idea with you.
Thank you.





 
Thank you for your support

story:
IRONEVE™ is redefining women’s olympic weightlifting footwear.

Every detail was examined to ensure only top quality materials went into this shoe-top to bottom and inside to out!  

  • Super light handmade construction.
  • Durable cowside leather uppers come in 3 inspiring metallic color combinations.  You are guaranteed to stand out!
  • Flexible forefoot design enables full range of motion. 
  • Natural alder wood heel to provide a stable lifting base.
  • Unique, non-slip Vibram® rubber outsoles to securely land your lifts.
  • Moisture management Dri-Lex® linings keep you cool and dry. 
  • Women’s specific sizing.  
  • The only olympic weightlifting shoe Made in the USA!


The new IRONEVE shoes will be offered in 3 different color combinations - The Patriot, Medalist and Classic.

The Patriot - White upper with Metallic Blue and Silver overlays finished off with a Metallic Red strap.

Patriot 

The Medalist - Show off your American Pride with this Metallic Red, White and Blue combination.

Medalist


The Classic - An electric color combination of White and Metallic Purple with Lime Green overlays.

Classic


Made in USA!


Help us make our vision of Made in the USA weightlifting shoes a reality!  IRONEVE is seeking to raise $20,000 through our Indiegogo campaign.  Over the past year, we moved from product sketches, to prototypes, to specifications, and 3 rounds of samples in order to perfect the form, fit and function of our shoes. 

Without raising the money, we will not have the resources required for bulk production and you will be refunded.  Your pledges will go towards:

  • Lasts:  Purchase 20 additional pair of our customized lasts across the size range to allow for more efficient production.
  • Cutting Dies:  Convert our paper patterns into cutting dies for each size.
  • Material: Purchase the leather, textiles, wooden heels, midsoles, outsoles, internal shoe components and shoelaces needed for bulk production.  
  • Labor: Prepayment terms established with factory to bring IRONEVE's to market.

Upon successful funding of our Indiegogo campaign, shoes will take 10 weeks for delivery.  

  • 4 weeks to produce and deliver the lasts, cutting dies and materials to our factory.
  • 6 weeks to cut the pattern pieces, stitch the uppers, form to lasts, affix the midsole, heel and outsole, and finally ship to YOU!


IRONEVE Perks!

Each and every dollar IRONEVE raises through this campaign will be greatly appreciated and recognized.

Contributions of $5 or more will be mentioned on our Facebook page

Contributions of $15 or more will also receive a hand written thank you.

Contributions of $40 or more will receive a Made in the USA, soft, combed ringspun cotton IRONEVE T-Shirt- designed exclusively for this Indiegogo campaign!  

IRONEVE T (Front)

The first 50 people contributing $200 or more will receive their choice of IRONEVE shoes in either the Classic, Patriot, or Medalist model as seen above.  

Contributions of $225 or more will receive their choice of IRONEVE shoes in either the Classic, Patriot, or Medalist model.

Contributions of $575 or more will receive all three IRONEVE models.  Hey, we know every woman needs more than one pair of shoes!  Here's our permission to express your mood & style on training days!

story:
Arrow Project Sandal Wooden Watch (Encore Campaign) 

Arrow Project's first project on Indiegogo in 2013 was a success! We reached and exceeded the funding goal, with the help of amazing supporters through personal network, and Indiegogo Representatives. 

After project success there's been an overwhelming demand of these watches, and those who knew of the running campaign missed out on the opportunity to support and wanted one. 

There's a demand, and now it's back on Indiegogo!

The demand came after the first campaign, the production, product design and the delivery process, the success of the first project sparked interests in those who missed out. 

This universe works in strange ways, one doesn't have it and others want it! 

This now brings us this Encore Campaign, to give others the opportunity to support and receive their watch reward below retail value.

Those who supported the campaign received their watch rewards, which meant Arrow Project potential supporters missed out on the watch rewards, technically being, sold out! 


It feels awesome on your skin as the watch is made from the highest grade sandalwood, which is not affected by the weather, such as heat or cold.

Another great feature of sandalwood is it has a luxurious lasting natural aroma. And the wood gives you long life durability unlike leather bands.

It's extremely light weight, in that it's not heavy on the wrist. It's natural, unique, simple and one of a kind. It's fashionable and looks great on!

Note: This is a fashion watch; being a feature to your style. It's not a sport, swimming, exercising watch, etc. Not meant to be used during times of heavy duty activity, it can effect the wood flexibility, i.e., picking up furniture, or wrestling. 

Design. 

Package design. 

(This took weeks to finalize the box design. It was imperative the overall packaging appeared the way I envisioned it for Arrow Project.)

Prototype design. 

Final package design. 

What do you get from supporting this encore project? 

  • Supporting the campaign, you receive your reward perk below the retail value. 
  •  If you missed out on the first project, this is now your chance to support and get one! 
  • These rewards perks are based on rewards for supporting the campaign. 
  • This is an all-or-nothing campaign, which means all funds received once campaign success, and production begins! 

Specifications:

  • Watch band is adjustable (can take off 4 links) 
  • Quartz Movement (Japanese quartz movement is an extremely accurate electronic movement developed in Japan that utilizes the natural frequency of vibrations to regulate the operation of the timepiece. Quartz movement refers to vibrations that take place in a watch as a result of a specially designed battery. The battery activates a quartz crystal in the watch which in turn causes vibrations up to 33 times per second. These vibrations are then translated into impulses which result in the movement of the watch's hands.)
  • Hypo-allergenic
  • Watch band: 8 3/4” (222 mm)
  • Face with wood frame: 1 9/16" (42 mm) & 1/2" (12.75 mm) thick
  • It's not water-proof or water resistant in that you go swimming or hop into a river with it. Light rain or water splashes is fine.

Why an encore campaign ?

  • Almost 1 year later, Arrow Project's watch continued to hold it's campaign legacy, created from a crowd of supporters who still talk about Arrow Project Wooden watches. 
  • The demand became apparent, and therefore running another campaign to fit for their reach gives others a chance to support and get it below retail value. 
  • You can take a look at the first project, and watch the original video. 

Feedback & Reviews. 

"Thank you! I've had a lot of friends comments on it." 

"I love the watch, a lot of friends like it too!" 

"My grandfather is allergic to metal backing watches, and this was the perfect gift for his 80th Birthday." 

Risks & Challenges

Challenges is mainly time and letting shipment to occur. The first project was quite close to Christmas, which meant there was demand for shipping. 

  • You'll be updated accordingly, based on time line of production. 
  • Ensure all raw material are ready for manufacturing, with design precision. 
  • And delivery process is key. Very. 

If you like the campaign, but can't support. You can help with sharing! 

  • If you like it but can't support, you can share this project with someone who might be interested. 
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools as this helps with ranking pages, and campaign exposure! 

Thank you.

story:
Socks PRo is an 10 in 1 sock which specifically designed for any kind of indoor or outdoor sport activities. Socks PRo can tremendously enhance your sport performance, while providing you with extreme protection and comfort. The SPo Fiber used in Socks PRo is an unique and epochal that out-stands any other standard fabric in the market.

Different Length | Different Experience | Same Functions | Same Comfort

When doing sport…

 

A pair of good sock plays the role to

  • Prevent blisters
  • Protect your feet from impact and pressure
  • Remove waste from muscles 
  • Improve muscle stamina
  • Recover faster
  • Prevent foot odor

 Socks PRo can be worn for gym, traveling, wrestling, running, all kinds of ball games, martial art, causally or even to work, you name it! So, one fits for all needs !

Why a pair of perfect socks is important ?

A pair of perfect socks provide cushioning so that our feet don’t rub directly against the lining of the shoe, and they also help to keep them dry.  When feet are exposed to prolonged moisture, there is a potential for foot fungus to develop. Foot fungus thrives in places that are warm, dark and moist, which is exactly what the environment inside of a shoe is.

The ergonomic design of Socks PRo is engineered by our professional designer. This design can provide comprehensive strength support to your feet and at the same time reduce unnecessary friction. It can also helps to increase your flexibility and agility which will directly facilitate your sport performance.

One of the most important elements to determine whether a pair of sock is of high quality or not is by looking at its stitching. Socks PRo's production process utilizes seamless sewing technology and build every single sock with 212 stitches. 

Also, with the X stitching technique and rounded stitching technique, Socks PRo possesses excellent breathability, wonderful evaporative cooling ability, as well as perfect injury prevention ability.

Socks PRo is designed to endure strong stretching and regular washing. According to our experiment, Socks PRo can be washed for at least 120 times without any shape deformation and fade of color. The elasticity of the socks can also be sustained.

Apart from sport use, Socks PRo can also be worn everyday. With the fashionable design of Socks PRo, it can become one of your stylish clothing. Socks PRo is so easy to match. You can effortlessly match Socks PRo with different colors of shoes.

SPo Fiber - Our most functional and unique fiber

SPo Fiber is our epochal technology used in Socks PRo. It outperforms almost all other kinds of fiber in the current market. In terms of Quick Dry work rate, SPo Fiber outperforms other materials such as cotton, nylon and polypropylene. SPo Fiber is the perfect material for sport wears. It maintains your body temperature in the optimal level. It is the major materials for Socks PRo which allows Socks PRo to deliver the 10 in 1 functions incorporating the features of Performance, Comfort, Protection, Durability and Style in one. 

*Size will be selected in the backer survey.

 

Get your Socks PRo today ! Wear it because you care !

Shipping arrangement

In 72 hours of your order being shipped, you will get your shipping confirmation with your shipping details (if available). If you do not receive your order within the timeline mentioned, please tell us so that we can file a claim with the shipping company.

Delivery policy

If our shipping team attempts delivery to you but you do not get it because you are not present, incorrect address, moved place without informing us, and the package returns back to the warehouse, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order.

story:
Short Summary

5thread is a classic, simple and elegant wallet for a streamlined lifestyle. The perfect blend of design and function.

Like your keys and phone, the wallet was designed to become unique part of your everyday carry. 

This new design has STRAIGHT-CUT edges to save on bulk. The edges are smoothed then coated with a UNIQUE SEALER that is durable. 

A wallet designed to be a staple in your daily life. We refined the best ideas from card cases into a wallet, equipped to sleekly store your everyday-use cards , few coins or keys and neatly organize your cash, while maintaining a low profile in your pocket. 

Start to use this nice, good looking, unique, natural product which will serve you for years.

**Note : this minimalist is made of premium grade leathers !



Able to hold up to 5 cards


Able to hold up to 15 pieces of notes. (Notes used in this picture are USD 10, THB $1000, SGD 50, RM $50.)


Able to hold one card or few coins and keys.

Measurement : 97mm(length) by 72mm(width)


the thickness of 5thread minimalist wallet is just 3mm

5thread minimalist wallet is smaller than an Iphone.( shown in the photo)

What We Need & What You Get

Help 5thread: USD $5

Early Bird: USD $49 (first 30 supports) -one Red 5thread wallet

Early Bird: USD $49 (first 30 supports) -one Black 5thread wallet

Promotion Price: USD $59 -one Red 5thread wallet

Promotion Price: USD $59 -one Black 5thread wallet

Promotion Package: USD $165 -one Red & two Black 5thread wallet 

Promotion Package: USD $165 -one Black & two Red 5thread wallet

FREE International Shipments (registered mail)-worth USD $6
